Merhaba, Kazanmaya hoş geldiniz.


Çoğumuz işinin ehli insanlardan eğitim alıyor videolar izliyor ve tüm karmaşık detayları aklımızda tutup yapamayıncada pes ediyoruz. Fakat bu eğitimde sizlere tamamen otomatik bir şekilde kripto para borsasından nasıl kazanç elde edebileceğinizi anlatıyor olacağım. Ve ayrıca kendi oluşturmuş olduğum Rolinlong Pro ve Pro+ indikatörlerini sizlere ücretsiz olarak bu eğitimi aldığınız için hediye ediyor olacağım bunların nasıl kurulduğunu ve ayarlarını anlatıyor olacağım. Yani sizlere haydi artık eğitim bitti gidip indikatör bulup uğraşıp deneyin demek yerine zaten kazancı ve çalışma sistemi olan bu indikatörleri sizlere vermiş olacağım. Sadece onları kurarak bile kazancınızı oturtabilirsiniz ve bu eğitimin amacıda asıl onlar üzerine. İndikatörlerin kullanımı olsun osilatörler olsun göreceli ve strateji indikatörleri gibi türleri sizlere anlatıyor olacağım. Biliyorum kafanızda madem bu kadar kazandırıyor neden indikatörleri satıyorsun? Tarzında sorular var ve ilk değilsiniz gelin bunları eğitimde tek tek konuşalım...

Bu eğitim sonunda benimle iletişime geçmek isterseniz diye gurubumuzun linkini paylaşacağım eğitimi aldım bitti diye bir durum kesinlikle yok çünkü youtube kanalımız ve indikatör kullanıcıları için guruplarımız var her türlü sorunuzu oradan yanıtlıyor olacağım..

Aklınızı kullanarak Kripto Para Borsasından ömrünüzün sonuna kadar kazanç sağlayabilirsiniz diyenler çoktur fakat aklınızı kullanabilmeniz sizi 7/24 uyanık ve piyasa başında tutamaz o yüzden tamamen algoritmalara göre hareket eden hiç durmadan uyumadan çalışan bu pasif gelir sistemine dahil olun..

في حين أن هناك إمكانية كبيرة لتحقيق أرباح من تداول العملات المشفرة ، إلا أن هناك أيضًا مخاطر خسارة كبيرة في جميع عمليات التداول. تنطوي جميع عمليات التداول على مخاطر عالية بفقدان استثمارك بالكامل. يجب أن تقرر مدى ملاءمتك للتداول.

In this video series we will guide you through in detail how to be a part of the growing network of Livepeer. Livepeer aims to be the decentralized video infrastructure of the world and you too can be a part of growing the network by dedicating GPU power and getting paid through rewards in this decentralized protocol.
Livepeer is a leading protocol in the web3 ecosystem that has been in development since 2017. Livepeer plans to incorporate the decentralized transcoding service into the emerging web3 stack and has already proven it's proof of concept by offering decentralized transcoding service for over 3 years.
By completing this course, you will be apart of providing decentralized visual computing power to the web3 ecosystem.
Bought to you by the Livepeer grant program, this guide will teach you how to connect your machine to be a part of the smartest online retina the has ever seen.
Deepen your knowledge base of blockchain and cryptocurrency, or get started in this exciting and progressive field.
Once you have completed this course and have a fully operational Orchestrator node, you can find further support and resources by joining the Livepeer Discord and Telegram where community members can help you grow and improve your node.

requirements: No es necesaria experiencia previa
courses.description:
La mayoría de cursos de trading rara vez te muestran operaciones de la estrategia de forma transparente, o si las muestran, siempre son las posiciones ganadoras. Y más raro aún que te muestren esas operaciones de forma cronológica.
La filosofía de este curso es mostrarte operaciones de trading en Binance - Futuros de forma consecutiva, tanto de posiciones ganadoras como aquellas que resultan en pérdidas, para que al final puedas corroborar cómo un verdadero trader opera en términos de probabilidades, resultando en una estrategia rentable a largo plazo.
De acuerdo a las estadísticas, sólo un 5% de aquellos que lo intentan logran convertirse en traders rentables. La satisfacción no es tanto el dinero que se puede hacer, sino el de especular movimientos de un activo y que resulten correctos en la dirección que se esperaba mientras se consigue la libertad financiera.
Así como un médico cirujano, el trader es una profesión que requiere tres elementos fundamentales para lograr el éxito:


Estudio y preparación: En este curso yo te voy a presentar la teoría necesaria para operar el mercado cripto y que te van a permitir pensar como un trader: La teoría del caos, la teoría de Dow & la teoría de Elliot. Todas de una forma totalmente clara, dinámica y con ejemplos concretos. Este conocimiento será la base para presentarte mi estrategia rentable y con la cual tengo ingresos pasivos. Además, también vas aprender la interface Binance - Futuros así como conceptos de margen, liquidación, apalancamiento, margin call, ratio entre otros.
Control emocional: Ningún curso te va a poder preparar en este aspecto. La única forma de aprender a controlar las emociones es operando en el merado. Sin embargo, yo te voy a explicar como puedes comenzar a operar el mercado cripto usando futuros sin miedo, estar nervioso, ansioso o la necesidad de ver el gráfico cada 5 minutos.
Gestión de riesgo: ¿Sabes por qué muchos traders terminan quemando su cuenta? La mayoría que usa apalancamiento, pone hasta el 100% de su capital en una operación pues se dejan llevar por la codicia. ESO ES TOTALMENTE INCORRECTO, el apalancamiento (o los futuros) se usan por grandes instituciones para maximizar las ganancias con POCO capital y bajo riesgo. El mercado de futuros muchos lo ven de alto riesgo, pero la realidad es que no: Es tu mejor aliado para conseguir tu libertad financiera. Por eso, aquí te voy a revelar cómo operar con futuros de forma correcta, gestionando tu capital y usar el stop loss de forma inteligente para minimizar pérdidas al estilo de grandes institucionales.
¿Sabes que es lo mejor? Los tres puntos anteriores los pongo en práctica en operaciones de trading reales, en tiempo real, y de forma cronológica explicadas a detalle usando mi estrategia. Al final, estos resultados se analizan de forma objetiva donde tu mismo vas a comprobar que sí es posible vivir del trading. De éste análisis se concluye que un trader principiante fácilmente puede duplicar su capital en cuestión de meses, pero este ritmo se acelera con la experiencia y la magia del interés compuesto.
No esperes más y comienza hoy mismo tu camino a operar el mercado cripto de forma rentable y alcanzar la libertad financiera!
Te garantizo que el costo de este curso es nada comparado con lo que puedes ganar al volverte un trader rentable!
target_audience: Aquellos que buscan alcanzar la libertad financiera o generar ingresos pasivos de forma CONSTANTE con una estrategia rentable de trading
Aquellos que están a punto de darse por vencidos pues han tenido malas experiencias (o quemado su cuenta) haciendo trading en el mercado de futuros: Este curso es para ti!
IMPORTANTE: Si buscas un curso para hacerte rico de la noche a la mañana o duplicar tu capital en cuestión de días en el mercado cripto, probablemente este curso no es para ti

courses.description:
Price action, Türkçe deyimiyle, fiyat hareketi...


Price action,  bir alım satım / trade konsepti olup her türlü menkul kıymetin alınıp,  satılmasında kullanılabilir bir yöntemdir.


Marketteki aşağı ya da yukarı yönlü "hareket "; tipik olarak fiyat değişikliklerinin verileri ile temsil edilir.
Price action, market şekillendiricinin gözüyle fiyatı yorumlamayı kolaylaştırır.


Geleneksel olarak,  price action yöntemini kullananlar "çıplak" bir tabloya güvenirler yani direkt olarak fiyatı yorumlarlar ve dolayısıyla gösterge ve indikatörlerin sinyallerinin gecikmeli olduğunu düşünürler; price action'a göre, ürün fiyatlandıktan sonra gösterge ve indikatörlerin sinyal ürettiği savunulur, yani price action yönteminde fiyat hareketini doğru yorumlayabilmek her şeydir.


Price action konseptlerinde, trendler, mum kalıpları,  formasyonlar, kurumsal fiyat seviyeleri ( arz ve talep bölgeleri )  ve çok sayıda bilgi ve veri birlikte değerlendirilerek işleme giriş stratejileri oluşturulur. Price action, komplike bir sistemdir ancak oldukça başarılı stratejiler üretmeyi kolaylaştırır.


Bu eğitimde,  price action konseptleri ile grafik çizimi, yorumlanması ve işleme giriş stratejileri üzerinde durulacak ve örnekler verilecektir.


Herkese başarılar dilerim.


Sevgi ve saygılarımla.


Berke ÖZTEKİN


Price action, Türkçe deyimiyle, fiyat hareketi...


Price action,  bir alım satım / trade konsepti olup her türlü menkul kıymetin alınıp,  satılmasında kullanılabilir bir yöntemdir.


Marketteki aşağı ya da yukarı yönlü "hareket "; tipik olarak fiyat değişikliklerinin verileri ile temsil edilir.

Price action konseptlerinde, trendler, mum kalıpları,  formasyonlar, kurumsal fiyat seviyeleri ( arz ve talep bölgeleri )  ve çok sayıda bilgi ve veri birlikte değerlendirilerek işleme giriş stratejileri oluşturulur. Price action, komplike bir sistemdir ancak oldukça başarılı stratejiler üretmeyi kolaylaştırır.


Bu eğitimde,  price action konseptleri ile grafik çizimi, yorumlanması ve işleme giriş stratejileri üzerinde durulacak ve örnekler verilecektir.

requirements: Todos os iniciantes em criptos que já tenham conta em exchanges como binance por exemplo
courses.description:
O que são Finanças Descentralizadas?


Um novo conceito no mundo cripto que garante aos investidores a liberdade patrimonial, rentabilidade, sem depender dos sistemas bancários abusivos e dos governos corruptos que nos escravizam. O conceito de DEFI é o que há de mais novo no mundo dos investimentos e vão se beneficiar aqueles que conhecerem suas oportunidades o quanto antes.


Posso me tornar um banqueiro e oferecer empréstimos e receber bons pagamentos?


Sim, é exatamente o conceito mais aplicado em DEFI, VOCÊ SE TORNA SEU PRÓPRIO BANCO, e juntamente com outros investidores, oferece seu capital e ganha juros, pagamentos justos, e garante renda passica com seus criptoativos.
Obviamente todo investimento tem seu risco, e neste curso você conhecerá os riscos e formas de analisá-los e minimizá-los.


O que vou aprender neste curso?


Neste curso você irá aprender tudo sobre investimentos no mercado DEFI. Investimentos, conceitos, segurança, estratégias, análise de protocolos, retabilidade de criptos, empréstimos, seja seu próprio banco e muitos outros benefícios e oportunidades de fazer dinheiro com criptomoedas.


Por que devo conhecer o mercado de criptomoedas e DEFI?


Mais que alvo de especulação, o mercado cripto está se tornando uma realidade no mundo todo e vão perder oportunidades de mudar a vida financeira, aqueles que não se atualizarem e buscar o conhecimento necessário para atuar e trabalhar com criptomoedas.
Possibilidades ilimitadas aguardam cripto investidores no universo das Finanças Descentralizadas - DEFI - e você não pode ignorar essa chance.


Como foi elaborado o material do curso?


Neste curso você encontrará um material dedicado e bem segmentado, separado por assuntos e especificidades, informação do básico ao avançado, com qualidade de áudio, vídeo e didática. Operações feitas na prática e segredos e estratégias serão revelados durante o decorrer do curso, e assim te dando a oportunidade de conhecer o que realmente pode mudar sua visão de mercado cripto.
target_audience: Investidores em criptos, traders e especuladores de mercado.
Interessados em trabalhar como banqueiros, fornecendo empréstimos e obtendo renda passiva
Interessados em conhecer formas extremamente valiosas de como lucrar com criptomoedas

courses.title: 5 ADIMDA FİNANSAL ÖZGÜRLÜK-TEKNİK ANALİZ-GÜNCEL STRATEJİLER
courses.bio: Teknik Analizin Gücünü Keşfet, Yatırımlarını Bilinçli Yönet, En Güncel Teknik Analiz Stratejileriyle hayallerine ulaş!
objectives: Teknik analizi temelden ileri seviyelere kadar öğrenip kimseye bağımlı olmadan kendi yatırım stratejilerini oluşturabileceksin
Grafiklere göre alım-satım noktalarını belirleyebileceksin
Bağımsız bir şekilde yatırım yapmayı öğreneceksin.
Yatırımını korumayı ve büyütebilmeyi öğreneceksin.
Yatırım stratejileri üreteceksin.
Yatırımlarını bilinçli bir şekilde yönetebileceksin
Finansal piyasaların ruhunun yansıdığı grafikleri tanıyacaksın

5. ADIM: MULTIPLE TIME FRAME ANALYSİS-Çoklu Zaman Dilimi Analizi

requirements: HERHANGİ BİR DENEYİME SAHİP OLMADAN BORSA VEYA KRİPTO PİYASALARINA HAKİM OLABİLİRSİN
courses.description:
Hayatın boyunca çalışıp didinerek birikim yaptın. Peki, bu birikimlerin seni finansal özgürlüğe taşıyacak kadar hızlı ve güvenli büyüyor mu? Yoksa piyasanın iniş çıkışları seni endişelendiriyor, doğru kararları vermekte zorlanıyor musun?
Artık endişelenmeye SON! 5 Adımda Finansal Özgürlük Teknik Analiz Eğitim Kursu, sana piyasaların fısıltılarını anlama ve yatırımlarını bir profesyonel gibi yönetme yeteneği kazandırıyor. Bu kurs, seni karmaşık grafiklerin ve indikatörlerin dünyasında kaybolmaktan kurtarıp, bilinçli ve kazançlı yatırımlar yapmanın anahtarını sunuyor.
Unutmayın! Teknik analiz sadece çizgi ve grafiklerden ibaret değildir. Teknik Analiz, milyonlarca yatırımcının psikolojisidir, bu psikolojinin matematiksel formüllerle grafiklere yansımasıdır...
İşte 5 Adımda Finansal Özgürlüğe Giden Yol:
* Temelleri Sağlamlaştır: Teknik analizin ne olduğunu, neden önemli olduğunu ve finansal piyasalarda nasıl kullanıldığını en basit ve en etkili haliyle öğren. Mum grafiklerinden destek-direnç seviyelerine, temel kavramları ezberlemeden, MANTIKLI bir şekilde kavra.
* Göstergelerin Gücünü Keşfet: Hareketli ortalamalar, RSI, MACD, STOKASTİH RSI, DMI, ADX... Kulağa karmaşık mı geliyor? Bu göstergeleri senin için anlaşılır hale getirdik. Hangi indikatörün ne zaman, nasıl kullanılacağını ÖRNEKLERLE öğren, piyasanın nabzını tut.
* Formasyonları Tanı, Fırsatları Yakala: Bayrak, flama, omuz-baş-omuz, FİBONACCİ kavramları... Bu formasyonlar sana ne anlatıyor? Gelecekteki fiyat hareketlerini tahmin etmenin ipuçlarını keşfet, doğru zamanda doğru hamleleri yap.
* Risk Yönetimini Öğren, Sermayeni Koru: Kazanmak kadar, kaybetmemek de önemli! Paranızı nasıl yöneteceğinizi, riski nasıl minimize edeceğinizi ve potansiyel kayıpları nasıl sınırlayacağınızı öğrenin. Unutma, finansal özgürlük, KONTROLLÜ risk almaktan geçer.
* Strateji Oluştur, Uygula ve Kazan: Öğrendiklerini bir araya getir, kendine özgü bir yatırım stratejisi oluştur. Gerçek piyasa koşullarında stratejini test et, hatalarından ders çıkar, KAZANÇLI bir yatırımcıya dönüş.
Neden Bu Kursu Seçmelisin?
* Uzman Eğitmenler: Alanında deneyimli, piyasaları yakından takip eden profesyonellerden öğren.
* İnteraktif Eğitim: İhtiyacına yönelik olarak, öğrenmek istediğin ne varsa bir mesajınla eğitime dahil edilecek ve sürekli güncel olacak.
* Esnek Öğrenme: İstediğin zaman, istediğin yerden derslere eriş, kendi hızında öğren.
* Ömür Boyu Erişim: Kurs materyallerine ve güncellemelerine sınırsız erişim hakkın var..
* Topluluk Desteği: Diğer kursiyerlerle etkileşim kur, deneyimlerini paylaş, BİRLİKTE öğren.
Finansal özgürlük hayal değil! Bu kursla, piyasaların dilini çöz, yatırımlarını bilinçli yönet ve hayallerine bir adım daha yaklaş.
Hemen Kaydol, Geleceğini Şekillendirmeye Başla!


Borsa bir okyanustur, yüzme bilmeyeni yutar, yok eder. Kursu tamamladıktan sonra hiç kimseye ihtiyacın olmadan bu okyanusta en güzel şekilde yüzebilecek ve okyanusun güzelliklerinin tadına varacaksın...
HEPİNİZE HAYIRLI VE BOL KAZANÇLAR...
target_audience: BORSALARDA YATIRIM YAPARAK EKONOMİK ÖZGÜRLÜK KAZANMAK İSTEYEN
KRİPTO PİYASALARINDA YATIRIM YAPARAK EKONOMİK ÖZGÜRLÜK KAZANMAK İSTEYEN
FİYATLARIN YÖNÜNÜ TAKİP EDERKEN BAŞI DÖNENLER

requirements: لست بحاجه الى خبرات سابقة سنبدء الشرح من الصفر
courses.description:
هذه ليست مجرد دورة، إنها استثمار في مستقبلك المالي! بعد ان تم اختيارنا كسفراء لاكبر شركة سايبر سكيورتي في عالم العملات المشفرة شركة سيرتيك اطلعنا على الكثير من الاسرار والخبايا في هذا  المجال فقررنا ان نٌلخص لكم خبرتنا في هذه الكورس علما بأن اغلب محتويات الكورس هي الاولى من نوعها في المحتوى العربي
حيث سنشرح لك ايضا كيف استطعنا تحقيق 60 ضعف من رأس المال وساخبرك بجميع الاخطاء التي وقعنا بها وساكون معكم في دعم مباشر  لاي استفسارات .
تضم هذه الدورة الكثير من الاقسام ولكن اهما قسم التحليل الامني للعملات الرقمية الاول من نوعه   حيث سنعتمد على تحليل العملات المشفرة امنيا وبرمجيا بطرق مبسطة دون اي تعقيد بالرجوع الى شركات التدقيق الامني المعروفة مثل شركة سيرتيك

ويوجد اقسام اخرى مهمة في هذه الدورة مثل قسم متعلق بنفسية المستثمر والمراحل النفسية التي يمر بها اثناء الاستثمار وتقلب الاسعار والقرارات الخاطئة  ويوجد الكثير من المواضيع المهمة الاخرى مثل طرق تأمين العملات الرقيمة وحمايتها من السرقة وقسم التحليل الاساسي ايضا الاول من نوعه
بعد انتسابك لكورس شرح العملات الرقمية ستحصل على هدية وهي عضوية مجانية مدى الحياةفي مدرسة ويب ثري سكور على التليغرام حيث ستحصل على دعم مجاني ومباشر   لجميع مشاكلك التقنية .
ملاحظة هذه الدورة تحدث بشكل مستمر ويتم تبديل وتحديث الدروس ان لزم الامر وايضا يتم اجابة استفسارات جميع المشتركين اذا كان لديك اي سؤال لا تتردد في طرحه في مجتمع ويب ثري سكور

courses.title: Kryptowährungen verstehen - Für Anfänger & Fortgeschrittene
courses.bio: So wird Jeder zum Profitrader!
objectives: Grundlagen des Krypto-Handels
Kaufen / Verkaufen von Kryptowährungen
Einrichten einer Hardwarewallet (Ledger)
Meine geheimen Strategien & Mein PORTFOLIO

Meine Erfahrungen: COINS, DIE ICH IM BLICK HABE!

requirements: Es sind keine Vorkenntnisse notwendig!
courses.description:
In diesem Kurs können Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene ihren Wissenstand erweitern. In passenden Lektionen wird vermittelt, wie man Kryptos kauft, diese lagert und worauf man achten sollte.
Zusätzlich veröffentliche ich erstmals mein Portfolio und erkläre, wie ich ein erfolgreicher Trader wurde.
Nach diesem Kurs kann man sowohl Kryptos kaufen, diese verstehen als auch diese auf einer externen Wallet speichern.
Ich selbst bin seit 2017 in dem Krypto-Markt und habe seit dem viele Erfahrungen sammeln können. Diese Erfahrungswerte habe ich in diesem Kurs zusammengefasst und möchte es allen Leuten mitgeben.
Auf Youtube publiziere ich Videos, in denen es um die News im Krypto Markt und um Analysen von einzelnen Coins geht. Dort gibt es jeden Tag um 18 Uhr ein Video, welches die aktuellen Geschehnisse im Markt widerspiegelt. Zusätzliche gebe ich meine Meinung zu den Themen ab und prognostiziere, was als nächstes passieren Könnte.
FÜR ANFÄNGER UND FORTGESCHRITTENE!


Alles was in diesem Kurs gesagt wird ist meine persönliche Meinung. Ich bin KEIN Finanzberater und übernehme keine Haftung für Gewinne oder Verluste, die entstehen. Man sollte immer seine eigene Recherche betreiben und niemals blind etwas kaufen oder auch verkaufen, nur weil Jemand anderes das sagt.


Vielen Dank und wir sehen uns im Kurs!
target_audience: An Anfänger, die mit Kryptowährungen anfangen wollen & Fortgeschrittene Trader, die ihren Horizont erweitern wollen!

courses.title: A CRYPTO-Trader's Guide to Technical Trading.
courses.bio: An easy to understand course for trading Crypto Currencies using simple Price analysis which all can understand

Introduction: Getting Ready for Technical Trading in CryptoCurrencies
THE CORE Concepts: Drawing Trend lines correctly on Cryptocurrency charts
FIBONACCI Retracement - Knowing extent of corrections.
Combining the tools - CaseStudy 1 - Trend analysis and Retracement combined
Trade Entry and Momentum Analysis: Trade entry in Crypto Currencies using Moving averages
Understanding Price momentum using MACD indicator
REAL LIFE Case Study -2 Combining ALL to: Real life case study of LiteCoin as on 2nd Aug 2018

requirements: A Beginner's understanding of Trading in Crypto currency is sufficient.
Some Knowledge using price charts will be an added advantage , but not essential.
courses.description:
Welcome to this is a Unique and practical examples filled Course for CryptoTraders as it guides you to the concepts and tools of technical trading with easy to understand explanations.
By the end of this course you shall be able to identify TRENDS in Cryptocurrencies you trade or want to trade , know WHEN to buy or sell and also be able to judge the MOMENTUM of the market.
The course is loaded with  real life price chart of various Cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Lite Coin ,Ether etc.
You will thus be able to relate to the concepts and tools more easily .
The HIGHLIGHT of the course is the Real Life CASE STUDIES explained in detail.
target_audience: Those who trade or invest OR who want to trade or invest in Crypto currencies
Even if you are already an experienced CryptoCurrency trader - the tools and techniques discussed will be quite useful

Rastgele, sağdan soldan duyduğu verilerle işlem yapmayı istememek

courses.description:
EYLÜL 1 2021 İTİBARİYLE ÖZEL GRUPLARA ALIM BİTMİŞTİR.
EYLÜL 1 2021 İTİBARİYLE ÖZEL GRUPLARA ALIM BİTMİŞTİR.
EYLÜL 1 2021 İTİBARİYLE ÖZEL GRUPLARA ALIM BİTMİŞTİR.
Selamlar, bu eğitim içeriğimizde son günlerde oldukça popüler olan kripto paralar ile ilgili bilmediklerinizi size öğretmeyi hedefledik. İlginin ve sermayenin iyice, son sürat aktığı bu mecrada özellikle bilinçsiz yatırımcılar belki yılların emeklerini belki de sadece bir aylık harçlıklarını kaybediyorlar.. Kaybettiğimiz para olsun ama bu kursumuzda, umarım, hem paradan hem de zamandan kazanmayı öğreneceğiz.


Kripto pump gruplarında işlem yapmaktan, 2 alıp 3 vermekten, sadece sembollere bakarak al/sat yapmaktan daha farklı ufuklara ve vizyona sahipseniz hoş geldiniz.


Eğitimden öğreneceğiz bilgilerin hayat ve yatırım kalitenizi arttıracağından hiç şüphemiz yok. Bu kursun sonunda kendi göbeğinizi, kendiniz kesebilecek ve hiç kimseye ihtiyaç duymayacaksınız.


Bu eğitim serimizde,
Kripto para borsalarında trade ederken ihtiyacınız olabilecek tüm videolu ve yazılı materyalleri size veriyoruz. Bu eğitimi bitirdikten sonra, bir eğitimden beklendiği şekilde kendi başınıza işlemlerinize yön verebilecek ve başarıya giden yolda birkaç basamak daha ilerlemiş olacaksınız.
Kripto paralar gibi hızlı bir şekilde veri akışı olan bir konuda elbette şuan size verilen bir bilginin 2 gün sonra bir hükmü kalmayacaktır. O yüzden her an eğitimimiz yeni yazılı kaynaklar ve videolarla güncellenmektedir. Hükmü geçen bilgiler ise imha edilmektedir.
Ayrıca birebir, hızlıca temas kurmak için, haber paylaşımı yapacağımız bir telegram grubuna sizi alıyoruz. Kesinlikle ortamın bir pump grubuna dönüşmesine engel olacağız. Teknik ve temel analiz paylaşımları ve güncel haber akışıyla kursiyerleri, kendi kendilerine yetene kadar destekliyoruz.
EYLÜL 1 2021 İTİBARİYLE ÖZEL GRUPLARA ALIM BİTMİŞTİR.

EYLÜL 1 2021 İTİBARİYLE ÖZEL GRUPLARA ALIM BİTMİŞTİR.

courses.title: A-Z™ | Bitcoin - Kripto Para - Blockchain ve Trading Eğitimi
courses.bio: Uluslararası Finansal Bitcoin ve Kripto Piyasasında Para Kazanan Profesyonel Trader Olun!
objectives: Blockchain & Bitcoin teknolojisine hakim olacaksınız
Bitcoin alım satımı için gerekli olan işlemleri yapabilir hale geleceksiniz
Diğer kripto-paralar konusunda fikir sahibi olacaksınız.
Hangi kripto borsaları kullanmalıyız
Bir çok ek faydalı finans bilgisi öğrenecekler
Parite teknik analizleri ve futures vadeli işlemler nedir nasıl yapılır
Ön satışlara Nasıl Katılacağız
Dikkat edilmesi gereken püf noktalar

Kripto Ve Bitcoin Teknolojisi: Forex Piyasası ile Kripto Borsanı'nın farkları nelerdir ?
Blockchain ve Altcoinler: Bitcoin Madenciliği (Mining) Nedir ve Nasıl Yapılır?
Altcoin Nedir? Ne İşe Yarar? ve Ethereum (ETH)
Litecoin ve Ripple Nedir? Nasıl Üretilir?
Bitcoin Alım & Satımı: Bitcoin Alış Satış İşlemleri Nasıl Yapılır?
Kripto Para Piyasalarını Kullanmak: Paypal-BTC-Yandex ve b | Kripto Al Sat Gönder

requirements: Herhangi bir ön bilgiye ihtiyaç duyulmamaktadır
courses.description:
Herkese Merhaba Arkadaşlar!
Piyasadaki en geniş kapsamlı A-dan Z-ye Bitcoin Kripto Para trading kursuma hoş geldiniz!
Ben Reşat Gafarov.
Finansal piyasalarda alim satım işlemlerinde uzun yıllar tecrübeli ekonomistim ve alanımda Hacettepede yüksek lisansım var, yerli yabancı bir çok borsada çalıştım. hem Forex piyasasında hem de Kripto borsalarda teknik ve temel analiz, elliot dalgaları teorisi ve futures yani vadeli işlemler dersleri vermekteyim.
Konumuz A-dan Z-ye en geniş kapsamlı kripto paralar ve borsalar, spot, margin ve en önemlisi teknik analiz ile futures vadeli işlemler de alım satımlar olacaktır.
Bu kursu satın aldığınızda bitcoin ve kripto paralar hakkında hiç bir bilginiz olmasa bile, Herşeyi A’dan Z’ye öğrenecek ve hiç kimseye ihtiyacı olmayan bilinçli bir kripto para yatırımcısı haline geleceksiniz.
Bitcoin'i sürekli günlük hayatında duyanlar, yatırım yapmak isteyenler, belki yatırım yapanlar ama bir türlü Blockchain nedir düzgün bir açıklama bulamayanlar için ideal!

Bitcoin’in çok iyi bir gelecek vaadeden sağlam bir yatırım olduğunu duydunuz ve bunu kullanmak istiyorsunuz öyleyse neye yatırım yaptığını bilmeyen kaybedenlerden olmayın veya ufacık bir kar elde edebilmek için sürekli başkalarının tavsiyelerine muhtaç bir yatırımcı olmayın. Bu kursu tamamlayın ve bilinçli bir kripto para yatırımcısı olmanın keyfini yaşayın.
Başlangıç olarak bitcoin ve blockchain gibi teknolojilerin neler olduğunu anlayarak konsepti anlamaya başlayacaksınız. Kurs özellikle yeterli ve net olması size en kolay yoldan bu kavramları öğretebilmek için tasarlandı. Bu kursta öğrendiğiniz bilgileri pratik edebileceğiniz birçok sınav ile de karşılaşacaksınız.
Aklınıza takılan soruları soru & cevap bölümüne koyabilir, hem kurs öğrencileriyle bilgi paylaşımında bulunabilir hem de eğitmenden yardım isteyebilirsiniz.
Eğitimimiz yeni trend ve teknolojilere göre belirli periodlarla güncellenecekdir. Sorularınız olursa sormaktan çekinmeyin en kısa sürede cevaplandıraçağım.

-Dersleri sınırsız erişim ile hiç bir zaman sınırı olmaksızın takip etmek mümkündür.
-Kursları rahatça nerede olursanız olun bilgisayarınız veya mobil cihazınızla takip edin.
-Kurs derslerini mobil cihazlarınıza indirebilir ve internet olmadan izleyebilirsiniz.
Bu kursu tamamladığınızda kendinizi Kripto dünyasının içinde bulacaksınız. PRYM Academy'ye katılın!
Eğer hazırsanız hemen başlıyalım.
target_audience: Blockchain teknolojisinin ne olduğunu öğrenmek isteyenler
Bitcoin'in nasıl ortaya çıktığını merak edenler
Bitcoin kültürüne hakim olmak isteyenler
Bitcoin ve Altcoin alım satımının nasıl yapıldığını öğrenmek isteyenler
Kripto-paralara yatırım yapmak isteyen ancak kulaktan doğma bilgiler ile yatırımında ekstra riske girmek istemeyenler.
Madenciliğe (mining) başlamak için hem donanımsal hem finansal yönü olan; ayrıca gerçek hayattan uygulamalı bir eğitim almayı tercih edenler.
Eğer kripto dünyasında yeniyseniz bu kurs ile doğru başlangıç yapacaksınız.

courses.title: Introduction To Cryptocurrencies
courses.bio: Learn about a part of the exciting new world of Emerging Technologies
requirements: An interest to learn more about the world of Emerging Technologies
Having heard anything about Cryptocurrencies
courses.description:
In the rapidly ever-changing world of Emerging Technologies, understanding the vast amounts of new technological advancements can be overwhelming when you have no idea where to begin your journey. The amounts of information available on various emerging technologies can be overwhelming without the information being made accessible to the understanding of even the newest keen learner. The financial world is not immune from the changes going on globally. Cryptocurrencies are an exciting part of the Fourth Industrial Revolutions impact on financial transactions. The opportunity for emerging technologies to be inclusive to people who were previously excluded by the traditional financial systems such as banks et cetera.  Understanding Cryptocurrencies can be a maze without a guide through the maze of information.
Our course has been created so that even the newest of people to the world of Emerging Technologies can understand some of the topics we will introduce to them. Cryptocurrencies have burst into the mainstream media with the involvement of various large organisations and governments, which are attempting various methods of using the technology to their benefit. Understanding how these technologies can be used to your own benefit can be useful as the technology will be used within mainstream financial ecosystem.
target_audience: Anyone who may have an interest in Cryptocurrencies but may not know where to start
Beginner investors looking into getting an understanding of Cryptocurrencies

courses.description: دورة العملات الرقمية تطرق الى تعريف ومفهوم العملات المشفرة حيث والتي تعد نوع من العملات المتاحة فقط على شكل رقمي، وليس لها وجود مادي (مثل الأوراق النقدية والنقود المعدنية). ولها خصائص مماثلة للعملات المادية ولكنها تسمح بالمعاملات الفورية ونقل الملكية بلا حدود. وعلى غرار الأموال التقليدية، يمكن أن تستخدم هذه العملات لشراء السلع والخدمات، ولكن يمكن أيضا أن تقتصر على مجتمعات معينة مثل للاستخدام داخل لعبة على الإنترنت أو شبكة اجتماعية و العملة الرقمية هي رصيد مالي مسجل إلكترونيا على بطاقة ذات قيمة مخزنة أو جهاز آخر. وهناك شكل آخر من أشكال الأموال الإلكترونية هو أموال الشبكة، تسمح بنقل القيمة على شبكات الحاسوب، ولا سيما شبكة الإنترنت وسوف نقدم فى هذا الكورس المحتوى التالى ما هى العملات الرقمية مدى قانونية العملات الرقمية فى البلد المقيم فيها ما هى هى شريعة البيتكوين ما هو البيتكوين مفهوم البلوكتشين الية شراء البيتكوين محافظ البيتكوينالمحافظ الخارجية تعدين البيتكوين اداوت تعدين البيتكوين  كيف تحصل على معدات التعدين  أسعار معدات التعدين مواقع شراء معدات التعدين  كيفية حساب ارباحك من التعدين مزارع البيتكوين منصات العملات الرقمية افضل منصات العملات الرقمية  التحليل الفنى للبيتكوين  افضل العملات الرقمية للاستثمار  ما هو الأفضل هل التداول ام الاستثمار  ما هي اراء رجال الاعمال في العملات الرقمية و البيتكوين ما هي المواقع التي بدأت في استخدام العملات الرقمية

courses.title: Blockchain Essentials for Finance Professionals
courses.bio: Master Blockchain Technology: Explore Smart Contracts, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Ethereum Development
objectives: Define the core principles of blockchain technology, decentralized systems, and digital ledgers in financial applications.
Analyze the impact of blockchain on banking, payments, trading, and investment, including the rise of DeFi and tokenization.
Develop and deploy smart contracts on Ethereum using Solidity, while exploring blockchain platforms like Bitcoin and Hyperledger Fabric.
Apply blockchain solutions to real-world financial challenges, leveraging hands-on tools and frameworks to optimize business operations.

Blockchain Technology: The Essentials: What Is Blockchain Technology? A Comprehensive Beginner’s Guide
Hands-On-Lab: Setting Up an Ethereum Wallet & Sending Transactions
Decentralized Systems and Digital Ledger: Hands-On-Lab: Creating and Querying a Hyperledger Fabric Network
Smart Contracts and Blockchain Tools: Solidity Basics: Writing a Smart Contract
Writing & Deploying a Smart Contract on Ethereum
What is DeFi? A Beginner's Guide to Decentralized Finance
Hands-On-Lab: Interacting with a Smart Contract using Web3.js
Blockchain in Financial Industry: Blockchain Cross Border Payments: Ultimate Guide for 2025
Hands-on-lab: Exploring Smart Contracts in Financial Applications
Wrap-Up and Capstone: Capstone Project: Building a Decentralized Financial Application (DeFi DApp)

requirements: Basic Finance Knowledge: Understanding financial transactions, trading, and investment concepts.
Basic Tech Skills: Comfort with using online tools and software (no coding experience required for most parts).
Interest in Blockchain & Innovation: A curiosity about how blockchain is shaping the future of finance.
courses.description:
Course Description:
The financial landscape is evolving and blockchain technology is disrupting finance like never before. Do you know, as per PWC, by 2030, the global blockchain market is expected to reach $1.76 trillion fueled by innovation in financial, marketing and customer engagement industries1. A 2022 Deloitte Global Blockchain Survey found that over 60% of financial institutions are actively investing in blockchain solutions, highlighting its increasing importance in the industry2. If you’re in finance, banking, trading, or fintech, understanding blockchain is no longer optional—it’s essential.
This course is designed to help you bridge that gap and harness blockchain's potential to revolutionize finance. This course goes beyond theory guiding you through blockchain fundamentals to hands-on implementation with real-world financial applications. Whether you’re a trader, finance professional, or entrepreneur, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to apply blockchain in your industry.
Here are the key concepts that we will cover in this course:
Blockchain Basics: How blockchain ensures security, transparency, and decentralization.
Decentralized Systems & Digital Ledgers: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, and private blockchains.
Smart Contracts & DApps: Writing and deploying Solidity smart contracts on Ethereum.
Financial Applications of Blockchain: Crypto payments, stock trading, tokenization, and DeFi.
Hands-on Projects: Setting up wallets, exploring Bitcoin transactions, launching smart contracts, and building real blockchain solutions.
By the end of this course, you will:

Gain a solid foundation in blockchain technology and discover how it is transforming finance.
Dive deep into real-world applications, exploring how blockchain is revolutionizing banking, payments, and stock trading.
Get hands-on experience developing and deploying smart contracts using Solidity on Ethereum.
Navigate leading blockchain platforms like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Hyperledger Fabric, equipping yourself with industry-relevant skills.
Tackle real-world financial challenges through hands-on projects, empowering you to implement blockchain solutions with confidence.
How does this course help you?
Stay ahead in finance and fintech – Gain in-demand blockchain expertise to enhance your career in banking, payments, and trading.
Develop hands-on blockchain skills – Learn to build and deploy smart contracts, work with DeFi applications, and use blockchain tools effectively.
Understand blockchain's real-world impact – Analyze how blockchain is transforming global financial systems, from stock markets to cross-border payments.
Prepare for high-paying blockchain roles – Position yourself for emerging opportunities in blockchain development, fintech startups, and decentralized finance.
Apply blockchain to business solutions – Explore how enterprises are leveraging blockchain for automation, security, and cost savings.
This 4-hour practical course is structured into six sections with a mix of talking-head explanations and engaging screen-share tutorials to ensure you not only learn but also apply blockchain in real-world finance.
target_audience: Finance professionals
Traders and investors
Technology and financial technology enthusiasts
Business leaders and entrepreneurs

courses.title: Bitcoin do zero - P2P e compras anônimas
courses.bio: Aprenda na prática como criar sua carteira fria caseira, comprar e vender via p2p anonimamente e a usar a Lightning
objectives: Comprar e vender bitcoin em corretoras
Realizar pagamentos utilizando a Lightning Network
Comprar e vender diretamente via p2p
Criar sua carteira fria
Comprar e vender bitcoin anonimamente
Realizar swaps entre Lightning Network e Onchain

Conceitos e Lightning Network (LN): O que tem de tão diferente nesse tal de Bitcoin?
Criando sua carteira de bitcoin na Lightning Network
BTC On-Chain: Criando uma cold wallet usando dois celulares
Criando uma cold wallet com um pendrive - Parte 1
Criando uma cold wallet com um pendrive - Parte 2
Transferindo BTC de uma carteira para outra
Envio e recebimento entre redes (swaps): Envio via LN através da Blink

requirements: Utilização básica de aplicativos e pagamentos via pix
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao fascinante mundo do Bitcoin, onde a revolução financeira ganha vida! Em nosso curso dinâmico e 100% prático, mergulhe no universo da criptomoeda mais popular do mundo.


Prepare-se para desvendar os segredos da compra e venda direta, sem intermediários, através de plataformas P2P, dominando os fundamentos essenciais para se tornar um trader independente e bem-sucedido. Descubra como gerenciar seus ativos com segurança e confiança, aprendendo a criar e manter sua própria carteira fria num pendrive usando Tails + Electrum, garantindo proteção máxima para seus preciosos bitcoins e podendo guarda-los para o longo prazo e com baixo custo.


Mas não paramos por aí. Aprenda a navegar pela Lightning Network, a rede de pagamento instantâneo e de baixo custo do Bitcoin, desbloqueando todo o potencial da criptomoeda para transações rápidas e eficientes em qualquer lugar do mundo. E para os mais avançados, explore os intricados meandros dos swaps entre Lightning e Blockchain, ampliando suas habilidades e perspectivas no ecossistema Bitcoin.


Aqui os conceitos serão abordados durante as práticas, evitando termos complicados e técnicos demais, afinal, você não precisa ser um especialista para usar o Bitcoin. Este curso é a chave para desbravar o universo do Bitcoin com confiança e maestria. Junte-se a nós e embarque nesta jornada emocionante rumo ao futuro das finanças digitais!


Obs.: Entre em contato por e-mail ( contato@fametec.com.br ) se quiser realizar o pagamento do curso em bitcoins.
target_audience: Qualquer um que deseje aprender sobre Bitcoin

multiplicar sus ganancias en cada semana

Creación billetera Metamask y configuración Red Binance

courses.description:

You’ll learn how the Forex and crypto markets work, what makes them different, and how real traders actually make money. We’ll dive deep into technical analysis — from trends and reversals to price inefficiencies and key levels. You’ll explore fundamental analysis and how breaking news can shift the market in seconds.

¿Quieres empezar a invertir en Forex pero no cuentas con una estrategia confiable?
O tal vez, ya invertiste algunas veces pero no lograste el resultado que esperabas...
Si es así, ¡estás en el lugar indicado!
Bienvenido al curso "Trading Forex: Comienza a invertir en el Mercado de Forex"
En donde aprenderás los conceptos y herramientas necesarias para operar en el mercado de divisas.


¿Qué aprenderás?
Qué es el mercado de Forex.


Qué es el Análisis Técnico y cómo utilizarlo para obtener beneficios.


Aprenderás a identificar oportunidades de inversión con EJEMPLOS REALES.

Qué es el Apalancamiento y el Márgen. Cuáles son sus riesgos.
MANEJO DEL RIESGO de una posición especulativa.
...Y más!

¿Qué es FOREX?
Forex, también denominado FX, o mercado de divisas, es el acrónimo de "Foreign Exchange".
Y es simplemente el proceso de cambiar una divisa por otra. Por ejemplo, cambia Dólares por Euros.
Lo más probable es que ya hayas operado en Forex anteriormente, ya sea de manera directa o indirecta. ¿Alguna vez compraste un producto o servicio de otro país por internet? ¿Alguna vez viajaste a un país con otra moneda?
Si es así, ya operaste en Forex.
El trading de forex, es una actividad mediante la cual se compran y venden pares de divisas para especular con su precio y así obtener beneficios. Ésta actividad, se encuentra abierta a cualquier persona que disponga de una computadora, internet, y un mínimo de capital.


¿Qué es el Análisis Técnico?
El análisis técnico es el estudio del movimiento de los mercados financieros, principalmente mediante el uso de gráficos e indicadores matemáticos y estadísticos, con el objetivo intentar anticipar el comportamiento futuro de los precios de los activos financieros.
El análisis técnico no solo se suele utilizar en el mercado de Forex, sino también en acciones, indices, commodities, bonos, criptomonedas, y en prácticamente cualquier tipo de activo.
En otras palabras, el análisis técnico bien hecho, es una herramienta que nos ayuda a decidir:
QUÉ comprar, qué vender
CUÁNDO comprar y cuándo vender.

Fiscalidad del sector Fintech, criptomon: ¿Dónde tributa? Lugar de realización de las operaciones

Categorización legal de las criptomonedas y del comercio de las mismas

requirements: Ninguno, no es necesario tener conocimientos previos para poder aprovechar al máximo el curso.
courses.description:
La legalidad y regulación de una materia, para los que son técnicos en la misma, suele ser una de las partes más aburridas. No obstante, y pese a ello, es necesario conocerla o tener un acercamiento a la cuestión que permita analizar y conocer la normativa aplicable a las acciones que se llevan a cabo y el marco legal que ampara la actividad realizada, conociendo los límites pero también los derechos y facultades que se tienen al respecto.
La legislación siempre ha ido por detrás de la tecnología. Pocos aspectos han sido regulados de manera paralela a su evolución, sino que siempre se encuentra un paso por detrás, dejando a algunos ámbitos en una situación de alegalidad que, igualmente, hay que conocer y a la que hay que adaptarse. Pese a todo, el auge que han tenido las fintech recientemente ha permitido que, bien a nivel nacional o bien a nivel internacional, se haya ido desarrollando un marco legal básico del que partir y con el que continuar la evolución de la regulación conforme evoluciona la técnica y tecnología.
De hecho, España es uno de los países más avanzados en regulación de cuestiones como los Sandbox.
Por su parte, y como no puede ser de otro modo, a toda operación o proyecto le acompaña su fiscalidad, lo que es necesario conocer para evitar sustos y para poder valorar correctamente la rentabilidad o no del proyecto.
target_audience: Desarrolladores y personas interesadas en el blockchain, fintech y legaltech.

requirements: While no prior blockchain or cryptocurrency experience is required, having a basic understanding of finance, technology, or investing concepts will be helpful. This course is designed to take motivated beginners and those with some foundational knowledge to an advanced level. courses.description:
Welcome to the Advanced Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Full End-to-End Course, your complete guide to mastering one of the most transformative technologies of our time.
This course is designed for motivated beginners, tech enthusiasts, and professionals who want to deeply understand blockchain and cryptocurrency—not just as buzzwords, but as powerful tools shaping the future of finance, business, and the internet.
You'll start with the fundamentals of blockchain technology, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and wallets, then quickly move into more advanced topics like DeFi, NFTs, smart contracts, staking, Layer 1 vs Layer 2 chains, DAOs, Web3, and beyond. You’ll also learn how to analyze crypto projects, evaluate tokens, manage risks, navigate exchanges, interpret on-chain data, track market trends, understand tokenomics, assess whitepapers, explore yield strategies, and make informed decisions in the fast-moving world of digital assets.
Whether you want to invest, trade, build, work in the industry, or simply understand this revolutionary space, this course will give you the knowledge and confidence to navigate the crypto ecosystem from end to end.
By the end of the course, you'll be equipped to explore decentralized applications (dApps), identify real opportunities, avoid common pitfalls, and engage with blockchain technology in a meaningful way. I hope you learn a lot from this course!
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to build a deep understanding of blockchain and cryptocurrency, from motivated beginners to intermediate learners looking to advance their knowledge. It is perfect for investors, tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs, developers, finance professionals, and anyone curious about the future of digital assets and decentralized technology. Whether you are looking to trade cryptocurrencies, work in blockchain, launch a crypto project, or simply understand this revolutionary space, this course will guide you step-by-step from the basics to advanced concepts.

Introdução: A motivação por trás do Bitcoin e sua origem

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos.
courses.description:
Neste curso você aprenderá como funciona o mundo das criptomoedas e conseguirá responder a pergunta-chave: Afinal, quanto vale um Bitcoin? Será que, de fato, conseguimos precificar o Bitcoin? A resposta para esta pergunta é: Sim, é possível. Se olharmos para os parâmetros corretos, conseguimos tirar conclusões bem concretas a respeito do valuation do Bitcoin.
Iniciamos o curso entendendo o contexto da criação do Bitcoin. É fundamental estudarmos a história para compreendermos o que fez Satoshi Nakamoto criar esta tecnologia que está mudando a forma como o mercado financeiro se comporta. Em seguida, exploramos o conceito de blockchain e de mineração. Para isso, usamos um simulador da blockchain e até exploramos a blockchain real do Bitcoin.
Finalmente, chegamos no Bitcoin e aprendemos como comprar e vender a criptomoeda, além de discutir sobre a sua segurança enquanto ativo de reserva de valor. Em seguida aprendemos como precificar (valuation) o Bitcoin. Certamente esta é a aula mais importante do curso.
No final, exploramos outras tecnologias que surgiram após a popularização do Bitcoin, como o Ethereum. Nesta nova plataforma, o conceito de contratos inteligentes e de ICO (Inicial Coin Offering) começaram e se desenvolver. Então, discutirmos como essas novas tecnologias podem impactar as nossas vidas no futuro. Spoiler: os cartórios podem estar com seus dias contados...
target_audience: Interessados em conhecer mais sobre criptomoedas

courses.description:
Sıfırdan başlayaraq peşəkar səviyyəyə doğru olan kriptovalyuta kursumuza xoş gəlmisiz.


Mən Kamran Rzayev , Compass youtube kanalının sahibi.
Ölkəmizdə birçox insan kriptovalyuta ilə maraqlanmaq istəyir.Ama demək olar ki , böyük bir kütlə yetəri qədər məlumatı olmadığı üçün haradan və necə başlamalı olduğunu bilmir.Digər insanların verdiyi qarışıq məlumatlara əsasən ilərlədikləri üçün birçox səhvlər edir və uğurlu ola bilmirlər.
Buna görə də 3 ildən artıq olan təcrübəmə və birçox məşhur borsalar ilə olan əməkdaşlığıma əsasən bu sahədə olan bilgilərimi sizinlə paylaşıb kriptovalyutanı ən sadə və səmimi şəkildə sizə öyrədəcəm.Ortalama 70 videodan ibarət kursumuzda , siz hərşeyi sıfırdan başlayaraq lazım olan bütün detaylı məlumatları öyrənmiş olacaqsız.Hər birinizə indidən uğurlar və kursumuzun sonunda isə bol qazanclar arzu edirəm :)


Kursumuzda dərs mövzuları bunlardır:
1) Kriptovalyuta nədir ?
2) Kriptovalyuta ilə pul qazanmaq
3) Coin alıb-satmaq
4) Günlük və aylıq qazanclar
5) Bank kartı ilə yatırım və çıxarış etmək
6) Coin analizi
7) Elektron hesabların istifadə qaydası
8) Binance və digər borsalar
9) Borsalarda hesab təstiqi
10) Mining nədir cə necə pul qazanmaq olar ?


Gördüyünüz bu 10 mövzu haqqında olan dərslərimizi izlədikdən sonra artıq kritpvalyuta haqqında bütün bilgiləri öyrənərək sertifikat əldə edəcəksiz.Və coinlərin ümümi məntiqini peşəkar səviyyədə başa düşərək gündəlik və aylıq qazanclar öyrənə bilərsiz.Birdaha qeyd edim , bütün dərslər tətbiq edilərək göstərilir.Təbii ki , bizim qazanc yerimiz təkcə kriptovalyuta deyil.Həmçinin mining nədir ? Ümumiyyətlə mining ilə necə pul qazanmaq olar ? bütün bu suallara cavab taparaq həm bu sahədə olan bilginizi daha da artıracaqsız həmçinin pul qazanmağın bütün sahələri üzrə bilgərə yiyələnmək bacarığı yaranacaq sizdə.
Məşhur borsalar Currency , Bityard və bundan başqa Bamboo şirkəti ilə etmiş olduğum əməkdaşlıqlar sizə bu sahədə daha çox bilgi verməyimə kömək edəcək.Bunlardan başqa Binance və digər borsaların ( birjaların ) istifadə qaydası ilə yanaşı hesab təstiqini də öyrənəcəksiz.
Kriptovalyutanın nə olduğunu bildiyimizə görə sıra gəlir elektron hesablara.Trust Wallet , Payeer və digərləri ilə hesab açmaq və ümümi istifadə qaydasını öyrənərək həm coinləri orda saxlaya bilərsiz həmçinin transfer qaydasını öyrənərək elektron hesabdan borsaya göndərib , burada satıb dollara çevirə bilərsiz.


Bütün  bilgiləri öyrəndiyimizə görə , artıq kursumuza başlayıb dərslərdən yararlana bilərsiz. Hər birinizə uğurlar

courses.description:
Are you ready to unlock the potential of "Magic Internet Money"? This beginner-friendly course is your gateway to understanding the fundamentals of investing, with a special focus on cryptocurrency. Whether you're curious about Bitcoin, market trends, or how to navigate this exciting world safely, this course has everything you need to get started.
What You'll Learn:
The Basics of Investing:
Grasp the essentials of investing, including the golden rule of "buy low, sell high" and why cryptocurrency is one of the fastest-growing opportunities in the financial world.
Cryptocurrency Research & Market Dynamics:
Learn how to research cryptocurrencies, understand what drives price movements, and discover why Bitcoin stands out among the rest.
Essential Tools & Resources:
Explore the most trusted websites like CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, and Bloomberg to gather insights. Navigate platforms like GlassNode, Tokenist, and X to stay ahead in the game.
Avoid Common Pitfalls:
Protect yourself from scams, overpriced courses, and unsafe practices. Learn general security tips to safeguard your investments.
Wallets & Exchanges:
Get introduced to trading platforms, exchanges, and popular wallets like Phantom Wallet, Magic Eden Wallet, and Tangem Wallet, with a focus on showcasing best practices.
How to Invest for Profits:
Master proven strategies like Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA), understanding market cycles, and diversifying your profits. You'll also dive into market psychology and planning for long-term success.
target_audience: Beginners curious about cryptocurrencies and digital investments.
Anyone looking to understand how to start investing safely and profitably.
Individuals seeking to avoid scams and navigate the crypto world securely.

ビットコインに限らず、”お金”に関する基本的知識（金融リテラシー）を身につける事ができる。

requirements: 特にありません
courses.description:
最近、ビットコインをはじめとした仮想通貨（暗号通貨）が話題です。

大きく値上がりしている、というニュースを聞いたことがあるかと思いますが、
「いったいどういうものかよくわからない」
「なんだか怪しい」
といったイメージを持っていらっしゃる方も多いのでは無いでしょうか。

私は金融機関向けのコンサルティング業務をやっています。そのため、普段から”通貨”については、仕事上も身近に扱っております。職業上、金融機関の担当者が定期的に実施している勉強会などにも出席したりしております。

暗号通貨技術は、単に投資や投機の対象、という訳では無く、かなり画期的な技術であり、今後は私たちの生活に必須となる技術となる可能性がとても高いと考えております。

本講座では、ビットコインに関する基本的仕組みを初心者の方にもわかりやすく解説します。また、ビットコインに限らず、”お金”や”投資”に関する基本的知識（金融リテラシー）を身につける事ができるように幅広く解説していきたいと思います。

ビットコインやアルトコインといった各種暗号通貨（仮想通貨）の基本的仕組みを理解できます。暗号通貨による投資運用についても、FXや信用取引、取引所間アビトラージといった積極的運用はもちろん、ドルコスト平均法、積立等の安定的手法まで解説します。

対象はお金･金融･ビットコイン等の基礎知識は殆どない、初心者の方向けの講座となります。
target_audience: ビットコインやその他の様々な暗号通貨を使って、投資や送金、買い物をしてみたい人
ビットコイン・暗号通貨という言葉は聞いたことがあるが、いったいどういうものなのか知ってみたいと思っている人
新しい技術や仕組みが好きで、知ってみたい・触って見たい・体験してみたいと思っている人
自分の資産にビットコイン等の暗号通貨を組み入れることにより、安定した資産形成を実現したい人

courses.title: 【投資初心者向け】仮想通貨（暗号資産）の税金の基礎知識／55％で課税される人、されない人
courses.bio: 多額の含み益を抱えた「億り人」はシンガポールに行くべきか？
objectives: 投資家が仮想通貨（暗号資産）を売るとどのような税金がかかるか（最高税率は55％）、そして、その利益がどのように計算されるかをを学びます。
仮想通貨（暗号資産）を１）現金化した場合以外に、２）仮想通貨（暗号資産）でモノやサービスを購入したり、３）他の仮想通貨（暗号資産）に交換する（アルトコインを取得する）場合も「利益の確定」（リカク）の対象になることを学びます。
いわゆる「億り人」がどうすれば外国の居住者（非居住者）として認められ、全く税金を払わずに済むかを学びます。
数百人いると言われる、2017年と2018年の「億り人」が、国税局と税務署にどのような税務調査を受けるのかを学びます。そして「億り人」の一部の方が税務調査により、なぜ、破産状態等深刻な状況にあるのかその理由を学び、自分がそのような状況に陥ることを防止できるようになります。

このコースの目的、対象、細川 健（ほそかわ たけし）の自己紹介とコース制作理由及: 4自己紹介とこのコースの制作理由

10どのぐらいの税金がかかるのか

requirements: 特にありません。
courses.description:
仮想通貨（暗号資産）を国内で売却するとどのぐらいの税金がかかるのか、具体的にどのように計算されるかを知りたい投資初心者向けのコースです。どのような人が55％で課税されるのでしょうか？
そして、多額の含み益を抱えた「億り人」がシンガポール等に移住して外国の居住者（非居住者）になり、現地で仮想通貨（暗号資産）を売却することにより全く税金がかからないためにはどのようなことが必要かを学びます。
仮想通貨（暗号資産）の高騰により、2017年、2018年には数百人の「億り人」が生まれました。その多くが既に、国税局や税務署による所得税の税務調査の対象になっていると言われています。そして、「億り人」の一部の人は、税務調査の結果、破産状態等の深刻な状況に追い込まれているという報道もあります。
このコースを受けることにより、なぜ、「億り人」の一部が破産状態等の深刻な状況に陥ったかその理由を学び、このコースを受けた方がそのような状況に陥ることを防止することを学びます。そして、多くの「戻り人」がいる理由について考えます。
コースの最も重要部分については、条文や重要判例等の原文を示した上で、かみ砕いて、分かりやすく説明します。
target_audience: 仮想通貨（暗号資産）を売るとどのような税金がかかるのか、そして、それはどのように計算されるのかを知りたい投資家のためのコースです。
現在、仮想通貨（暗号資産）で億単位の含み益を抱えていて、どうすれば、シンガポール等の外国居住者（非居住者）と認められ、税金を全く払わずに済むかるを知りたい投資家のためのコースです。
2017年、2018年の「億り人」が国税局や税務署からどのような税務調査を受けているのかを知りたい投資家のためのコースです。そして、なぜ、「億り人」の一部が破産状態等深刻な状況にあるかを知り、自分がそうなることを防止したい投資家のためのコースです。

courses.title: Die komplette Krypto-Mining Masterclass
courses.bio: In diesem Kurs lernst du alles um dein erstes eigenes Mining-Rig zu bauen: Theorie, Hardware, Software & Sicherheit!
objectives: Grundlagen des Krypto-Minings: Kryptowährungen, Blockchain und Proof of Work
Grundlagen über Hardware, technische Anforderungen und Sicherheit
Ein Rechenbeispiel zur Rentabilität
Wir bauen zusammen ein Krypto-Mining-Rig
Installation & Einstellung von Software: Hive OS, Overclocking, Bios-Modding, Mining-Pool, Miner
requirements: Es sind keine Kenntnisse oder Erfahrungen mit Kryptowährungen & Krypto-Mining erforderlich.
courses.description:
Erst waren sie verpönt, dann war man skeptisch, jetzt sind sie nicht mehr wegzudenken. Große namenhafte Unternehmen behaupten, dass Kryptowährungen ein fester Bestandteil unseres Lebens werden. Die Analysen und Studien großer Finanzhäuser prophezeien gewaltige Nutzungs- und Kursanstiege.

Du bist auch überzeugt von Kryptowährungen und möchtest proaktiv als Krypto-Miner an den Netzwerken teilnehmen? Oder bist du einfach auf der Suche nach einem spannenden und lukrativen Investment? Dann ist Krypto-Mining und dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich, denn das Schürfen des digitalen Golds ist ein großartiger Weg, um sich ein passives Einkommen aufzubauen und Teil des Krypto-Spaces zu werden! Das spannende beim Krypto-Mining ist außerdem, dass man tatsächlich einen physischen Vermögenswert besitzt und das Risiko eines Totalverlusts - wie bei reinen Krypto-Investments mit Kursspekulationen - relativ gering ist.


Nun aber genug geschwärmt, jetzt geht’s ans Eingemachte. In diesem Kurs wirst du lernen:
was Kryptowährungen und die Blockchain (Proof of Work) sind und warum man Krypto-Mining braucht,
welche Hardware du dafür benötigst (eine benutzerdefinierte PDF-Einkaufsliste gibt’s auch) und wie man diese sicher betreiben kann,
wie man eine Rentabilitätsanalyse durchrechnet (ein detailliertes Excel-Dokument befindet sich bei den Materialien),
wie du dir dein erstes eigenes Mining-Rig baust,
wie man die Mining-Software (bspw. Hive OS, Miner usw.) einrichtet und GPUs overclocked oder bios-modded
und wie du dein Wallet einrichtest, was ein Mining-Pool ist und wie du letztendlich deine verdienten Kryptowährungen gegen Fiatgeld (Euro oder Dollar) auszahlen lassen kannst.


Um euch den größtmöglichen Mehrwert zu bieten, baue ich für euch ein Mining-Rig von null an auf. Dabei gehen wir langsam und detailliert Schritt für Schritt durch den Aufbau, vom Einkauf, über die Hardware bis hin zur Software.


Dazu zeige ich euch, wie ihr ein Rig 24/7 sicher betreiben könnt und warum Mining ein fantastisches Investment ist. Dabei ist es egal, ob du schon ein wenig Basiswissen in diesem Gebiet hast oder ein blutiger Anfänger bist. Wir fangen bei 0 an und am Ende des Kurses werdet ihr alles über das Schürfen des digitalen Golds wissen.


Den Return of Investment (ROI) erzielt man - je nach Einkaufspreis der Hardware - nach teilweise wenigen Monaten. Im Vergleich zu anderen Investments (bspw. Immobilien) wird der ROI beim Krypto-Mining sehr schnell erzielt, was eine Investition in ein Mining-Rig so attraktiv macht. Und was gibt es Schöneres, als sich mit wenig Einsatz zurückzulehnen und Geld zu verdienen? Richtig, nichts! Also los geht’s!
target_audience: An Krypto-Mining- oder Investment-Interessierte, die ein Mining-Rig bauen und passives Einkommen generieren wollen

courses.description:
En los últimos años, se ha hablado mucho sobre el mercado de las criptomonedas y sobretodo la moneda digital por excelencia llamada Bitcoin ha aparecido en todos los canales de televisión y prensa digital. Hubo una burbuja a finales de 2017 en la que mucha gente ganó mucho dinero pero, en cambio, otra gente perdió sus ahorros, incluso préstamos personales.
¿Buscas la clave maestra para ganar dinero en el mercado de las criptomonedas? Pues siento decirte que no existe ninguna clave maestra. Sin embargo, sí existe la manera de aprovechar las diferentes oportunidades conociendo bien el mercado, el proyecto en el cuál invertimos, cómo funciona la herramienta de inversión, y qué ventajas y desventajas podemos usar para cambiar el rumbo a nuestro favor.
Este curso te será indispensable para poder invertir en Criptomonedas.
¿Por que? - Porque para invertir en criptomonedas necesitas dominar un exchange que las ofrezcas.
¿Y qué me va a aportar este curso? - El conocimiento al 100% del exchange Binance, el que más criptomonedas tiene y más volumen de transacciones se generan.
¿Como me puedo asegurar que sabes todo esto? - Soy usuario de Binance desde el año 2016, mucho antes de la burbuja. He visto la evolución del exchange a lo largo de estos años y te puedo asegurar que no tiene nada que ver con el Binance de 2016. Ahora es una grandísima herramienta de inversión en criptomonedas que no sólo te ofrece comprar y vender, sino también realizar tus análisis técnicos e incluso operar con apalancamiento.
¿Qué garantías tengo de tener beneficios una vez domine Binance con este curso? - El conocimiento de la plataforma no te asegura ganarte unos beneficios extra, sino tu mentalidad y cumplir con una estrategia bien clara. Te voy dejando algunos consejos y tips a lo largo del curso para que puedas también ser existoso en este mercado.
¿Algo diferencial que me puedas ofrecer y no ofrezcan los demás? - El último módulo es una muestra de gratitud hacía mis alumnos ya que enseño a cómo programar un robot de trading, si tienes algunas nociones de programación, y también pongo a tu disposición un método de inversión que me funciona de manera muy positiva. Son conocimientos que tienen un elevado coste y, en este caso, tengo la buena noticia de incluirlos en este curso como forma de agradecimiento hacía ti.
Si tienes mentalidad aprendedora y con ganas de abrir nuevos horizontes, especialmente al mundo fascinante de la inversión de criptomonedas, no lo dudes más, éste es tu curso.
Te doy las gracias de antemano por haber tenido la molestia de leerte esta descripción y, aunque te inscribas o no, desearte mucho éxito en la vida.
target_audience: Personas que buscan la libertad

courses.description:
Aprende a crear un vídeo (NFT) con Final Cut Pro y Adobe Premiere para la plataforma Opensea. Opensea es una de las plataformas NTF más grandes y no requiere invitación para acceder.
En este curso, te guiaremos desde la creación de un NTF de video, que cumpla con los requisitos de la plataforma hasta el final, donde podrás acuñar tu arte digital en la cadena de bloques conocida como Tecnología blockchain.
Te enseñaremos los conceptos básicos de la criptomoneda, incluido cómo comprar ethereum, qué sitios usar para hacer intercambios y cómo transferir tu ethereum a tu billetera para financiar la transacción de su primer NFT.
Tambien aprenderemos como comprar y vender NFT's en subasta, que son los "drops" y como revender NFT's en las plataformas más conocidas.
Te guiaremos paso por paso en la creación de un NFT de video, de imagen y de audio, como acuñarlo e incluso como hacerlo sin pagar Gas en la plataforma Minteable.
Los tokens no fungibles (NFT) son una aplicación impulsada por la criptomoneda Ethereum. En 2021 se han vuelto muy populares en el mundo del arte digital. Este curso será su guía para conseguir tu primer NFT acuñado, ya sea una imagen digital o un archivo de audio, pero nuestro enfoque estará en el NFT de video.

courses.title: ブロックチェーンの仕組みをひとつひとつ図解 - 仕組みを紐解きながら最新状況・今後の活用方法まで体系的に
courses.bio: 現役エンジニアがブロックチェーンの仕組みを1から丁寧に図解。暗号技術、トランザクション、プルーフ・オブ・ワーク、スマートコントラクトなどの重要概念に加え、ブロックチェーンの現状と課題、今後の展望まで学びます！
objectives: ブロックチェーンの仕組みについて深く理解できるようになります
ブロックチェーンで何ができて何ができないのか、ビジネスへの活用方法が分かるようになります
ブロックチェーンの特性と課題を学びます
トランザクションの仕組みが分かります
プルーフ・オブ・ワークとマイニングの仕組みを学びます
スマートコントラクトの作成方法と実行方法が分かります
requirements: 特別な事前知識は不要です。
courses.description:
★ ブロックチェーンの仕組みをひとつひとつ丁寧に図解して学んでいきます
本コースは、ブロックチェーンを根っこの仕組みレベルから理解することを目的としたコースです。
ブロックチェーンの仕組みを深く理解した上で、現状何ができていて、何が課題で、今後どのように発展していくのかを図解しています。

★ 本コースが目指すこと
「ブロックチェーンってなんか難しそう」
「ブロックチェーンって実際何ができて、何ができないの？自分のビジネスにどう活用できるの？」
ブロックチェーンに対してそう思われたことはありませんか？
ブロックチェーンは仕組みの部分に暗号技術を用いているため、難解なイメージを多くの方が持たれています。
実際、ブロックチェーンの入門書ですと、表面的な仕組みの解説にとどまり、結局何ができるのかがイメージつかみにくいです。
一方で、エンジニア向けの本ですと、技術的な詳細部分にフォーカスが当たっており、プログラミングを学習されたことのない方には難しい内容となってしまっています。
そこでこのコースでは、ブロックチェーンの仕組みをゼロから解きほぐしていくことで、プログラミングの知識なしでも、ブロックチェーンの仕組みを深く理解することを目指しました。特に、ブロックチェーンの生みの親であるビットコインと、スマートコントラクトのプラットフォームであるイーサリアムについては、仕組みの具体例として取り上げながら詳しく解説しています。
仕組みを深く理解することで、ブロックチェーンの今何が課題なのか、今後どうなっていくのか、どう活用できるのかを判断できるようになります。
★ 本コースで学ぶこと
ブロックチェーンを仕組みからしっかり理解することを目指し、次の内容を扱います。
【ブロックチェーンの全体像】では、ブロックチェーンの概要と歴史、仕組みの全体像を学んでいきます。
【アドレスを作成する】から、ブロックチェーンの仕組みをひとつずつ具体的に学んでいきます。ここでは、お金の送付先であるアドレスの作成方法を紹介します。合わせて、公開鍵暗号、電子署名、 ハッシュ関数など、ブロックチェーンを支えている暗号技術についてもかみ砕いて説明しています。
【トランザクションで取引する】では、取引履歴であるトランザクションの構造を紹介します。ブロックチェーンは取引履歴を記録したものなので、トランザクションの構造の理解はブロックチェーンを理解する上で非常に重要です。
【ネットワークでデータを共有する】では、どのようにしてノードがP2Pでつながっていくのかを学びます。ノードの種類によってつながり方が異なるので、それぞれ学んでいきます。
【マイニングしてブロックチェーンを形成する】では、マイニングとブロックチェーンの仕組みについて学びます。どのような流れで合意形成するのか、プルーフ・オブ・ワークとはどのようなアルゴリズムなのかを、深く学んでいきます。
【スマートコントラクトで自動取引】でいよいよ、スマートコントラクトの仕組みについて学びます。最初にスマートコントラクトと通常のブロックチェーンの仕組みの違いについて学んだ上で、スマートコントラクトの作成方法と実行方法を学んでいきます。また、スマートコントラクトのアプリケーションであるDappsについても紹介します。
【ブロックチェーンの現状と展望】では、ブロックチェーンが現状どのようになっていて、今後どのようなインパクトを社会に与えるのかということについて解説します。ブロックチェーンが実現できていること、ブロックチェーンの利点、ブロックチェーンの課題、課題への取り組み、ブロックチェーンの展望を順に見ていきます。
【Q&A】では、皆様からいただいた質問をベースに、追加トピックの解説を行っております。今ですと、「コインチェック社のNEM不正流出事件の原因」について解説しています。
※【アドレスを作成する】〜【マイニングしてブロックチェーンを形成する】ではビットコインの仕組みを例に、【スマートコントラクトで自動取引】ではイーサリアムの仕組みを例に解説しています。
★ ボーナス
本コースを受講した人限定で、本コースで解説している全スライドをまとめたPDFをダウンロードできます。
ブロックチェーンの重要な概念を素早くマスターするのに最適です。
ビットコインやイーサリアムを支えている仕組みを一からしっかり学んでいきましょう。
target_audience: ブロックチェーンをビジネスに活用したいと考えている経営者・ビジネスマン
ブロックチェーンの仕組みを理解したいエンジニア
ブロックチェーンの本を読んで大まかなことはわかったけど、もっと仕組みを深く理解したい方
スマートコントラクトを今後活用されたい方

requirements: Interested in Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency

courses.description:
Welcome!
This class is designed as a beginner's guide to Bitcoin & Crypto Self-Custody & Security.
The number one threat we all have when buying and storing crypto is ourselves, -not just hacking or third-party exchange breaches.
There is no gold standard of crypto security that applies to everyone, so remember to stay within your own range of security comfort, and hopefully, this lesson will have moved the needle a little bit further for you in understanding the importance of self custody and personal crypto security.
When you install a Bitcoin wallet on your mobile device or desktop, you are taking the radical responsibility of self-custody. This means that you and you alone are responsible for your bitcoin.
Luckily, the technology available today by developers and entrepreneurs around the world has made the task of self-custody a lot more streamlined and easy by providing multiple methods and security grades for storing your assets. This brings decentralized and independent ways for you to take control of your digital money by providing a high level of private and durable security in protecting access to your coins on the blockchain.
So in this class, will be covering Hot & Cold storage methods, exchanges, self-custody, and standard crypto security hygiene.
In addition, we will underline the security measures you can easily handle, and provide you with a self-custody checklist so you can devise your own security model that best suits your needs for Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency storage.
target_audience: Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency Investors
Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency Traders
Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency Users

courses.title: Crypto Trading Made Simple

requirements: You don't need prior knowledge, only a desire to make money with crypto trading is needed
courses.description:
Welcome to our Crypto Trading Course! Whether you're new to cryptocurrency or have some experience, we're excited to guide you through this journey. Developed by the renowned Elite-Trading-Academy, our course covers everything from the basics to advanced strategies.


Cryptocurrency trading can seem daunting, but with our step-by-step approach, you'll quickly grasp the essentials. We'll start by introducing you to blockchain technology, the underlying technology behind cryptocurrencies. Understanding blockchain is crucial as it forms the backbone of the entire crypto ecosystem. Don't worry if you're unfamiliar with technical jargon; we'll break it down into simple terms.


Next, we'll delve into market analysis. You'll learn different ways to analyze the market, including fundamental and technical analysis. Fundamental analysis involves evaluating the intrinsic value of a cryptocurrency based on factors such as its technology, team, and adoption. On the other hand, technical analysis focuses on analyzing price charts and patterns to predict future price movements. By mastering these techniques, you'll be able to make more informed trading decisions.


But trading isn't just about analysis; it's also about managing risks. That's why we'll dedicate a section of the course to risk management strategies. You'll learn how to protect your capital and minimize losses, essential skills for any successful trader. Additionally, we'll discuss the importance of having a trading plan and sticking to it, helping you maintain discipline in your trading approach.


As you progress through the course, you'll have the opportunity to explore advanced trading strategies. Whether you're interested in day trading, swing trading, or long-term investing, we'll cover techniques suited to your preferred trading style. Plus, we'll provide practical tips on how to execute trades efficiently and effectively.


But the learning doesn't stop there. As a member of our trading community, you'll gain access to exclusive resources and ongoing support. Connect with fellow traders, share insights, and stay updated on the latest market trends. Our community is here to help you succeed, every step of the way.


So why wait? Don't miss out on this chance to explore the exciting world of crypto trading! Enroll now and let's get started on this journey together. Whether you're looking to build wealth, expand your knowledge, or simply enjoy the thrill of trading, our course has something for everyone. Join us and unlock your full potential as a crypto trader!
target_audience: Everyone who wants to make money with crypto trading

courses.description:
Depuis 2009, l’arrivée de la technologie Blockchain et des cryptomonnaies représente une évolution remarquable dans l’histoire d’Internet, ce qui révolutionné plusieurs domaines.
Cette formation sur les cryptomonnaies s’adresse à toute personne débutante désireuse de se familiariser avec la blockchain et les cryptomonnaies et voulant identifier les secteurs d’activités concernés par cette révolution technologique. Que vous soyez débutant ou non, avec cette formation l'univers des cryptomonnaies n'aura plus aucun secret pour vous.
Grâce à cette formation sur les cryptomonnaies d’initiation, vous allez pouvoir comprendre la notion de blockchain. Durant cette formation sur les cryptomonnaies, le formateur vous présentera plusieurs démonstrations pratiques dans une blockchain privée.
Vous allez apprendre à acquérir, gérer et stocker de manière sécurisée des cryptomonnaies. Un chapitre est entièrement consacré aux différentes arnaques dans le monde des crypto monnaies.
Ensemble nous allons décrypter l'univers des NFT. Qu'est ce qu'un NFT ? Comment acheter et vendre un NFT de manière sécurisé ?
Vous voulez vous lancer dans la finance décentralisé DEFI ? Grâce à cette formation vous allez connaître tous les secrets de la finance décentralisé et vous allez apprendre à mettre en place un revenu passif grâce à vos actifs numériques .
Que vous traitiez des cryptos, du forex, des actions, des matières premières, des options, des ETF... ce cours vous donnera un aperçu de l'avantage concurrentiel que donnent le trading, l'analyse technique et le volume actif.

courses.description:
Welcome to Cryptocurrency Trading and Investing Mastery, your ultimate gateway to the dynamic world of digital currencies. Whether you're a beginner curious about cryptocurrencies or an experienced investor aiming to sharpen your trading strategies, this course is your ticket to mastering the art and science of crypto trading.


What You'll Learn:


Cryptocurrency Fundamentals: Gain a solid understanding of blockchain technology, digital wallets, and the most popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and more. We'll demystify complex concepts, ensuring you grasp the core foundations.
Technical Analysis Techniques: Learn to read crypto market trends like a pro. Explore in-depth technical analysis, deciphering charts, identifying patterns, and understanding key indicators that drive profitable trades.
Effective Trading and Investment Strategies: Dive into various trading styles, including day trading, swing trading, and long-term investing. Discover proven strategies to maximize profits while managing risks wisely. We'll cover everything from setting up your first trade to advanced portfolio management techniques.
Risk Management and Security: Understand the risks associated with crypto trading and explore strategies to protect your investments. Learn about secure trading platforms, wallets, and safeguarding your assets against potential threats.
Ethical Trading Practices: Delve into the ethical considerations of crypto trading. Understand market integrity, legal regulations, and responsible trading practices. Learn to navigate the crypto landscape responsibly and ethically.


Why Enroll:


Led by seasoned experts in the field, this course offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and hands-on practical insights. Interactive quizzes, real-life case studies, and simulated trading exercises will reinforce your learning, ensuring you gain confidence in your trading decisions.
By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the skills and knowledge to make informed cryptocurrency trades, build a robust investment portfolio, and navigate the ever-changing crypto market landscape with confidence.
Don't miss this opportunity to embark on your crypto journey. Enroll now and unlock the secrets to successful cryptocurrency trading and investing!
target_audience: This cryptocurrency trading course is designed for a broad audience, catering to individuals with various backgrounds and interests. It is suitable for:

Beginners: People who are new to the world of cryptocurrencies and trading. The course will start with the basics and gradually introduce more advanced concepts, making it accessible for those with limited prior knowledge.

Investors: Individuals interested in diversifying their investment portfolio by including cryptocurrencies. The course will provide insights into how cryptocurrencies can be a part of a well-rounded investment strategy.

Traders: Those looking to actively trade cryptocurrencies for profit. The course will cover technical analysis, trading strategies, and risk management techniques essential for day trading, swing trading, and long-term investing.
100x coins hunters: People who want to learn how to find and buy high-risk, high-rewards crypto projects

How to Trade Bitcoin and Altcoins – Learn how to buy, sell, and trade popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other altcoins.
Market Analysis and Trends – Discover how to analyze market trends and make informed trading decisions.

courses.description:
"Cryptocurrency for Beginners: Trading Bitcoin and Altcoins" is the perfect course for anyone looking to break into the world of cryptocurrency trading. With Bitcoin and altcoins gaining significant attention as investment opportunities, it’s essential to understand how the market works and how to trade effectively. This course is designed specifically for beginners, making complex concepts easy to understand and helping you build a solid foundation in cryptocurrency trading.
In this course, you will learn the basics of cryptocurrency, including what Bitcoin and altcoins are and how they function within the broader financial system. You’ll discover how to set up a secure cryptocurrency wallet and select the right exchange to buy and sell your digital assets.
The course covers essential trading strategies, including technical analysis, trend spotting, and risk management techniques, so you can make informed decisions in the volatile crypto market. We’ll also delve into the psychological aspects of trading, teaching you how to manage your emotions and maintain discipline to ensure long-term success.
By the end of the course, you’ll feel confident navigating the cryptocurrency market, whether you’re looking to invest in Bitcoin or explore other altcoins. Whether you’re aiming for long-term growth or short-term profits, this course equips you with the tools you need to trade smartly and profitably. Start your crypto journey today and unlock the potential of digital currencies.

Welcome to Crypto Unlocked, your all-in-one crash course into the exciting, fast-evolving world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. Whether you're curious about Bitcoin, confused by blockchains, or wondering if you’ve missed the boat—this course is designed for you.

What is blockchain and why it’s a revolution
The history and future of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and altcoins
How crypto wallets, exchanges, and tokens work
The difference between investing, trading, and HODLing
Real-world use cases of crypto in finance, gaming, and beyond

But this isn’t just about theory. You’ll get real insights from someone who started as a skeptic and became a full-time crypto advocate. I’ll share personal stories, industry secrets, and practical tools you won’t find in a Google search.
Still think you’re late to crypto? Think again. The next bull run is always around the corner, and those who understand the fundamentals are the ones who benefit the most.
Whether you’re looking to invest, build, or simply understand what all the hype is about—this course is your gateway.
Don’t stay in the dark. Join now and get ahead in the new financial era.

We kick off by teaching you the art of purchasing Ethereum, and the best part is, we've got you covered with two major exchanges: Coinbase and Kraken. The beauty here lies in your choice – use one or both, tailored to your preferences.


As you master buying Ethereum with your bank account, we'll dive into the realm of wallet management. We'll guide you through the secure installation and operation of the Digicoins app, ensuring the safety and accessibility of your Ethereum holdings.


But we don't stop at the fundamentals. Our journey takes you through advanced concepts, including subscriptions and participation in Token ICOs. You'll discover how to strategically manage your Ethereum, swapping ETH for USDT and seamlessly transferring funds between your spot and contract accounts, building your confidence in crypto trading.


And that's not all. We demystify ICOs and equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to actively participate in this exhilarating world of blockchain and digital assets.


Our mission is clear: to empower you to make informed decisions, master cryptocurrency tools, and confidently navigate the ever-evolving Ethereum and blockchain ecosystem. Are you ready for this thrilling adventure? Join us, and together, we'll unlock the potential of cryptocurrency investment.

courses.title: Ultimate Course on Cryptocurrency, Trading, Blockchain, NFT
courses.bio: Ultimate Cryptocurrency and Stock Market, Trading, Blockchain, NFT, and Bitcoin Crypto Currency Trading Mastery Course
objectives: Understand the cryptocurrency market and its underlying technology, blockchain.
Evaluate the risks and benefits associated with investing in cryptocurrencies.
Gain practical knowledge on how to trade and store cryptocurrencies.
Learn about emerging trends and the impact of regulations and taxes on cryptocurrency investments.
requirements: Basic knowledge of how to use a computer and navigate the internet
Familiarity with financial concepts and investment terminology
A desire to learn and understand the concepts and technologies behind cryptocurrencies and the crypto market
courses.description:
This course is designed to provide a comprehensive and in-depth introduction to the world of cryptocurrencies and the crypto market. With the rapid growth of this emerging asset class, it's more important than ever for investors and entrepreneurs to have a solid understanding of the market and its underlying technologies. This course starts by providing an overview of the cryptocurrency market, including an introduction to blockchain technology, which is the foundation of all cryptocurrencies and their trading.
After establishing this foundation, the course delves into the history and origin of cryptocurrencies, giving learners insights into the origins of Bitcoin, the first and most well-known cryptocurrency. From there, the course explores the risks and benefits of investing in cryptocurrencies, including the unique features of this asset class, such as decentralization, security, and anonymity.
Learners will also gain an understanding of the pros and cons of cryptocurrencies and explore practical trading and investment strategies. The course covers topics such as securing digital assets, analyzing fluctuations and trends, and understanding non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and decentralized finance (DeFi), which are emerging and rapidly growing areas of the crypto market.
Finally, learners will gain an understanding of the taxation of cryptocurrencies in India, including regulations and compliance requirements. With this comprehensive overview of the crypto market, learners will be equipped to make informed investment decisions and take advantage of the many opportunities presented by this exciting and innovative asset class.
This course is suitable for beginners who are looking to gain a foundational understanding of cryptocurrencies and the cryptocurrency trading market, as well as experienced investors and entrepreneurs who are seeking to refine their knowledge and strategies in this dynamic and rapidly growing field.
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in gaining a foundational understanding of the cryptocurrency market and its underlying technologies

Pensando nisso resolvi desenvolver este guia, para que você não seja enganado e consiga investir com segurança e sem medo...
