courses.title: Crashkurs: Blockchain, Kryptowährungen & NFT für Anfänger
courses.bio: Mit Fachwissen zu Kryptowährungen wie dem Bitcoin, Ethereum & Co. zu nachhaltigen Renditen!
objectives: Du verstehst die Technologien & den Markt
Du kennst Fachbegriffe wie Altcoin, Wallet, Transaktion, Kryptobörse, Volatilität, Gebühren, Tausch, Marktkapitalisierung uvw.
Du kannst dich auf CoinMarketCap eigenständig informieren und wichtige Informationen filtern.
Du kannst den gesamten Krypto-Markt in Kategorien einteilen und Coins zu den Kategorien finden, auswerten und für dich interpretieren
Du hast die Fähigkeit ohne Hilfe zwischen tausenden von Coins den für dich passenden zu finden
Du kennst fortan deine Gründe bzw. dein WARUM für alle deine Investitionen
requirements: Für eine Teilnahme benötigst du einen sicheren Umgang mit deinem PC/Mac und Grundkenntnisse wie z.B. Registrierung und Login auf Internetseiten.
Englisch-Grundkenntnisse sind ebenfalls von Vorteil.
courses.description:
Wenn die Themen Blockchain, Kryptowährungen & NFT neu für dich sind, du Kryptowährungen wie den Bitcoin und Ethereum oder NFTs bisher ohne großen Plan gekauft hast oder dich einfach nur für die Technologien dahinter interessierst, ist dieser ARTISTTOKEN Crashkurs: Blockchain, Kryptowährungen & NFT genau richtig für dich!
In diesem Online-Kurs lernst du mithilfe von einfachen und verständlichen Modellen/Beispielen, Übungen und Aufgaben das notwendige Grundlagenwissen und die wichtigsten Fachbegriffe. Einige wichtige Fachbegriffe, die du für die Grundlagen auf jeden Fall einmal gehört haben solltest, sind FIAT & Altcoin, Wallet & Kurs/Preis, Kursverlauf & Volatilität, Transaktion & Tausch, Kryptobörse & Gebühren, Marktkapitalisierung und vieles mehr. Nach diesem Kurs kannst du eigenständig jeden Coin anhand der Technologie bewerten und dich auf Seiten wie zum Beispiel CoinMarketCap informieren. Mit der ARTISTTOKEN Stufen-Argumentation zeigen wir dir, wie du den Gesamtmarkt über Kategorien, bis zu einzelnen Coins auflösen kannst. Mit dieser Methode erhältst du gleichzeitig dein individuelles WARUM für eine Investition in einen spezifischen Coin.
Damit du die Fachbegriffe und die Technologien im Hintergrund wirklich richtig verstehst, erkläre ich dir komplexes Fachwissen auf Grundlage von Beispielen aus deinem alltäglichen Leben.
Im Schnelldurchlauf erhältst du so die wichtigsten Informationen in aller Kürze. Gleichzeitig lernst du mehr über den Markt für Kryptowährungen und erhältst einen Ausblick auf die zukünftige Entwicklung.
Ziel dieses Kurses ist es, dein persönliches Fundament unabhängig von Rendite-Wünschen für deine individuelle Weiterentwicklung in der digitalen Welt aufzubauen. Denn nur mit Fachwissen zur Technologie & dem Markt, wirst du langfristig Erfolge erzielen.
Ich freue mich, dich auf deinem Weg in die digitale Welt begleiten zu dürfen!


*Hinweis: In diesem Grundlagen-Kurs lernst du nicht, wie du Kryptowährungen kaufst. Das nötige Grundlagenwissen ist jedoch zwingend erforderlich und vor dem Kauf & Einstieg in den Markt zwingend zu empfehlen. Keine Anlageempfehlung.
target_audience: An Einsteiger & Technologie-interessierte Personen, die nicht nur Rendite in der Thematik, sondern auch die Hintergründe einfach verstehenden wollen.

courses.title: The Complete Crypto Trading For Beginners
courses.bio: Learn crypto basics, technical analysis, trading strategies, and risk management to trade like a pro.
objectives: Understand the fundamentals of cryptocurrency trading and how the market works
Navigate and set up tools like TradingView for market analysis
Apply Fundamental Analysis (FA) to evaluate coins and projects
Use Technical Analysis (TA), including indicators like RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, and Moving Averages
Identify support, resistance, and trendlines to make better trade entries and exits
Recognize and trade chart patterns
Implement different trading strategies
Trade crypto futures with leverage

Introduction: Benefits and risks of crypto trading
Getting Started with Crypto Trading: Most used tools for crypto trading
Test Your Understanding of Crypto Basics
Fundamental Analysis: Hidden secrets to find profitable coins
TradingView Tutorial: How to use watchlists, and alerts
Technical Analysis: How to combine indicators for better decisions
Trading Strategies: Choosing a style that suits your goals
Hidden Trading Secrets Other Traders don’t Tell you
Futures Trading: Difference between Isolated and Cross Margin
How to Enter Long & Short Trades

requirements: No prior trading experience required
A computer, tablet, or smartphone with internet access
A willingness to learn, practice, and apply trading strategies
courses.description:
Cryptocurrency trading is one of the most exciting financial opportunities of our time — but it can also be one of the riskiest if you don’t know what you’re doing. Many beginners jump in without a plan, get caught up in hype, or rely on random tips from social media… and end up losing money.
This course is designed to change that. Whether you’re a complete beginner or someone who has dabbled in crypto but wants real structure, this Crypto Trading Masterclass will give you the skills, tools, and mindset you need to succeed.
We’ll start with the foundations of cryptocurrency — what it is, how it works, and the risks involved. Then we’ll move into practical training: setting up your accounts, learning to use TradingView, and understanding the difference between spot and futures trading. From there, you’ll dive deep into Fundamental Analysis (FA) to evaluate coins and projects, and Technical Analysis (TA) to read charts, identify trends, and make better trading decisions.
You’ll master essential indicators like Moving Averages, RSI, MACD, and Bollinger Bands, while also learning how to combine them for stronger confirmations. We’ll cover chart patterns and show you how to spot high-probability setups. And because every trader is different, you’ll explore multiple trading styles — day trading, swing trading, scalping, and HODLing — so you can find the one that fits your lifestyle and goals.
But this course isn’t just about strategies. You’ll uncover the hidden secrets that professional traders use, such as liquidity traps, risk management methods, and the psychological habits that make or break a trading career. You’ll also learn how to create a trading journal to track your progress, refine your strategies, and stay disciplined.
target_audience: Beginners who want to start trading cryptocurrency from scratch
Anyone interested in understanding how crypto markets work and how to profit from them
Traders coming from forex/stocks who want to transition into crypto trading
Intermediate crypto users who know how to buy/sell but want to learn analysis and strategies

No necesitas tener ninguna experiencia previa, solamente las ganas de aprender y ser parte de esta fenonemo que esta explotando.

courses.title: Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP) - 500 Exam Questions
courses.bio: Prepare for the CBP exam with 500 expert-level questions and detailed explanations on Bitcoin concepts and practices.
courses.description:
Get ready for the Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP) exam with this complete set of practice tests. This course includes 5 full-length practice exams with a total of 500 questions, each accompanied by clear and concise explanations. The questions are designed to reflect the style and structure of the actual exam, helping you measure your knowledge and identify areas that need improvement.
This course covers a broad range of topics included in the CBP exam and is suitable for anyone seeking to validate their understanding of Bitcoin technology and its applications in the real world.
You’ll work with different types of questions, including:
Multiple choice
Fill-in-the-gap
True or false
Real-world scenario-based questions
These questions provide comprehensive exposure to the key subjects, helping you build familiarity with the kinds of problems that will appear on the actual test.
Topics covered in the practice exams:
History and evolution of Bitcoin
Bitcoin protocol, transactions, and blocks
Wallets, private/public keys, and address generation
Mining fundamentals and proof-of-work
Regulatory environment and legal considerations
Buying, selling, and storing Bitcoin
Security, fraud prevention, and user protection
Real-world applications and use cases of Bitcoin
Blockchain structure and distributed ledger basics
Bitcoin network participants and ecosystem
Each question is followed by a detailed explanation to help you understand why the correct answer is right and how to approach similar questions in the future. These explanations also offer context for deeper learning and support your exam preparation.
This course is useful for self-assessment, structured review, and final exam preparation. However, to maximize your success, it is strongly recommended that you combine this course with additional study materials such as official CBP study guides, whitepapers, and video tutorials.
Disclaimer:
This practice test is an independent resource and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by C4 (CryptoCurrency Certification Consortium). All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
Use this set of practice exams to improve your readiness, reinforce your understanding of key Bitcoin concepts, and gain confidence before taking the Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP) exam.
target_audience: Individuals preparing for the Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP) certification exam.
Finance and tech professionals seeking to validate their Bitcoin knowledge.
Crypto enthusiasts aiming to demonstrate their understanding of Bitcoin fundamentals.
Students or self-learners exploring certification in blockchain and cryptocurrency.

courses.description:
Versuchst du immer noch erfolglos, mit Kryptowährungen zu handeln?
Bist du dir unsicher, wann du kaufen oder verkaufen solltest?
Kannst du bei mehr als 3 Kryptos noch den Überblick bewahren?


Stell dir ein Leben ohne schlaflose Nächte vor, auch wenn du mit Kryptowährungen handelst. Stell dir vor, du würdest 40 Coins gleichzeitig handeln, ohne auch nur eine Chance zu übersehen und ohne vor dem Kauf eine technische Analyse in Betracht zu ziehen. Stell dir vor, dass diese 40 Bots so wie 40 Angestellte wären, die für dich arbeiten. Die weder schlafen, noch ruhen, noch eine Pause machen, nicht einmal mit der Wimper zucken und das 24 Stunden am Tag, 7 Tage die Woche. Sie bekommen keine Sozialleistungen, du musst kein Gebäude mieten, Strom und Wasser bezahlen oder Ähnliches. Und doch verdienst du das gleiche Einkommen wie die meisten Firmenchefs, die sehr hart arbeiten, um ihr Unternehmen zu halten.


Das ist die Zukunft. Das macht dich zu einem Gewinner. Schreib dich ein, melde dich jetzt an und erlebe den besten Tag deines Lebens. Vergewissere dich, dass du alle Voraussetzungen erfüllst, hier ist der "Kryptowährungen: BTC Trading mittels Technischer Analyse von Vorteil, (aber keine Pflicht) um deine Erfolge zu maximieren. Deine Einschreibegebühr ist nichts im Vergleich zu dem Gewinn, den du erwirtschaften wirst.


Inhalt und Überblick
Dieser Kurs zum Kryptowährungshandel richtet sich an Anfänger und erfahrene Trader, die ihre Handelsfähigkeiten auf die nächste Stufe bringen wollen.
Handle Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin oder jede andere Kryptowährung, mit der Nummer 1 Plattform: Binance. Der Handel mit Bitcoin war mit Hilfe der KI-Technologie noch nie so einfach. Trader können sich jetzt entspannt zurücklehnen, das System, das du dir wünschst, auf deine Bots anwenden und so bei der Arbeit zu Hause oder im Büro ein passives Zusatzeinkommen für dich erwirtschaften.
Die Trading Bots können an den folgenden Börsen eingesetzt werden: Coinbase Pro (GDAX), Binance, Binance US, FTX, Bybit, Bitmex, Deribit, Bitrex, Binance DEX, Binance Futures USDT-M, Binance Futures COINS-M, Binance Margin, Bitfinex, Bitstamp, Cex, Etherium Wallet, Exmo, FTX US, gate io, Hitbtc, Huobi, Kraken, kucoin, Okex, Poloniex, Tron Wallet, Yobit u.v.m...


Was wirst du in dem Kurs lernen?


Was ist ein Trading Bot? Wie kann uns dies helfen?
Welche Parameter je nach Marktbedingungen zu jedem Zeitpunkt am besten sind
Wie du mit dem Kryptowährungshandel beginnst, wenn du ein absoluter Anfänger bist
Wie du auf einem virtuellen Konto testest, bis du mit den Strategien zufrieden bist
Welche Plattform für dich die beste ist:
Cryptohopper | 3Commas | Bitsgap oder doch halbautomatisch
Lux Algo
...
Es sind keine IT-Kenntnisse erforderlich


Algorithmischer Handel kann schwierig sein, erst recht, wenn du versuchst, echte und beständige Gewinne zu erzielen. In diesem Kurs lernst du alles, was du wissen musst, um automatisierte Handelsstrategien zu entwickeln und zu starten. Dabei nutzt du kostenlose und quelloffene Tools, die dir nicht nur die Entwicklung erleichtern, sondern dir auch viel Zeit und Geld sparen werden.
Es sind keine Vorkenntnisse im Programmieren erforderlich. Dieser Kurs wird dir Zeit, Geld und Mühe ersparen. Ich gebe dir eine Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung, wie du das MAXIMUM an Rendite aus deinem algorithmischen Handelssystem herausholst.


Wenn du dich für diesen Kurs registrierst, hast du:
Lebenslangen Zugang zum Kurs
Zugang zu allen neuen/zusätzlichen Lektionen (Meine Kurse sind immer auf dem neuesten Stand!)
Zugang zu unserem Q&A Bereich für immer!
Übrigens: Du hast eine 30-tägige, 100%ige Geld-zurück-Garantie, ohne Fragen zu stellen, also hast du nichts zu verlieren. Du kannst mir jederzeit schreiben und mich kontaktieren, wenn du Fragen hast oder Feedback auf dem Weg brauchst. Du stehst nicht alleine da!
Es ist Zeit, aktiv zu werden! Mache den nächsten Schritt und lerne, wie man am automatisiert handelt.
Klicke auf den "Jetzt kaufen" Button, oben rechts und schreib dich ein in den Kurs.
- Dein Dozent -
Christoph Neuwirth
Ich freue mich darauf, dich im Kurs zu sehen!

courses.description:
Möchtest du in die spannende Welt der Kryptowährungen eintauchen, aber hast wenig Zeit zur Verfügung? Der "Krypto Crashkurs" ist die perfekte Lösung, um in kurzer Zeit erfolgreich in digitale Währungen zu investieren, selbst wenn du keine Erfahrung hast.
Der Kurs konzentriert sich auf die folgenden Schlüsselaspekte:
1. Mindset für den Erfolg: Wir beginnen mit der Entwicklung des richtigen Mindsets. Du wirst lernen, wie wichtig es ist, Geduld, Risikobereitschaft und analytisches Denken in der Kryptowelt anzuwenden.
2. Bitcoin und Ethereum verstehen: Ich führen dich in die Welt der Kryptowährungen ein, beginnend mit den beiden Giganten: Bitcoin und Ethereum. Du wirst verstehen, was sie einzigartig macht und wie du sie sicher halten und handeln kannst.
3. Wallets und Sicherheit: Deine Sicherheit steht an erster Stelle. Wir werden dir zeigen, wie du Krypto-Wallets einrichtest und deine Investitionen schützt.
4. Marktplätze und Transaktionen: Wir decken die verschiedenen Kryptowährungsmarktplätze ab und zeigen dir, wie du Kryptowährungen kaufen, verkaufen und versenden kannst.
5. Marktzyklen erkennen: Verstehen, wie Marktzyklen funktionieren, ist entscheidend. Ich zeige dir, wie du Trends und Muster erkennst, um kluge Investitionsentscheidungen zu treffen.
Der Kurs ist speziell für Menschen entwickelt, die wenig Zeit haben. Du kannst die Lerninhalte in kurzen, effizienten Modulen absolvieren, die in deinen engen Zeitplan passen.
Das Ziel ist es, dich in kürzester Zeit fit für den Kryptomarkt zu machen, ohne dass du wertvolle Stunden für umfangreiche Schulungen opfern musst. Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses wirst du in der Lage sein, deine eigenen Investitionen zu tätigen und das Potenzial der Kryptowährungen für dich zu nutzen.
Lerne die Grundlagen, investiere klug und sei bereit für die Zukunft!


Beste Grüße
Siggi

courses.description:
Investors should find ways to stay disciplined when it comes to researching new investments.
One of the ideal ways to research new investments is by using checklists. Just as train drivers have used checklists to eliminate avoidable accidents. Investors can use checklists to obtain better results.
By using Checklists, an Investor follows a disciplined approach whilst researching new investments. The Investor performs due diligence which produces long-term investment success. If an investment did not do well, the Investor can modify the Checklist based on the lessons learned.
Checklists can help preserve gains and avoid chasing bad ideas by not allowing investors to get carried away with Investments based on gut feeling or Decisions based on Emotions/Hot story.
Investors often buy or sell Cryptocurrencies too quickly. When the Investor does not take time to thoroughly research, understand the Coin/Token he/she is buying, it can lead to costly mistakes. You need to implement a disciplined investing strategy through a series of checklists.
This course will teach you to pick great projects based on my Checklist

requirements: 1 year of technical sales engineering or enterprise architecture.
courses.description:
Course Description - Enterprise Blockchain Solution Architectures
About the Course
Blockchain technologies are now more than just a trial run. They are transitioning from a Proof of Concept to a Production use case.
Blockchain is consistently one of the highest-paying IT fields, where developers and architects can earn between $150,000 and $175,000 on average per year as salaried employees.
Blockchain architecture refers to the role of designing, solution selling and even building blockchain architectures. Blockchain architecture is a skillset that encompasses a wide range of skills such as Linux, networking, databases, security, programming and much more.
Overall, it aims to leverage the unique features of blockchain technology to address challenges and generate opportunities for the organization and its customers.
Welcome to the Enterprise Solutions Blockchain Architecture Whiteboard course.
As a solutions architect, pre-sale engineer, enterprise architect, or a data architect, this course will provide you with significant insight into how blockchain architecture should be approached, as well as providing a significant number of examples in a whiteboard format.
In this course, I will provide you a brief introduction to the major enterprise blockchains in a manner that is meant to be brief. Then the course will then provide you a brief introduction to each major enterprise blockchain from an adoption perspective. The course will then proceed to provide numerous whiteboard discussions from an architectural perspective. The major blockchain platforms covered are Ethereum, Polygon, Hyperledger Fabric and R3 Corda. Other blockchains such as Ripple, EOS, Tezos, Solana are covered from a high level due to the lack of significant adoption or niche markets.
Several demonstrations on AWS provide you insight into deploying a blockchain as well on that platform.
What we will cover to get you enabled in blockchain architecture
The main objectives are:
Understand what the value points of blockchain and why enterprises use them.
Understand the common major enterprise blockchain use cases.
Learn how to determine the best “blockchain fit” for your enterprise or customer.
Learn about what smart contracts and DApps bring to the table for enterprise application use cases.
Learn to architect an enterprise blockchain for solutions architecture and enterprise architecture requirements.
This training course is for you because...
You are a solutions-focused engineer or architect who is learning blockchain and would like to understand the major blockchains from an enterprise use case perspective.
Course Recommeded Prerequisites
1 year of technical sales engineering or enterprise architecture.
This Course Includes
47 lectures (Lecture, Demos, Whiteboards, Discussions)
2.5 hours plus off on-demand video
3 downloadable resources (Free eBook, CheatSheet, Course Presentation)
Certificate of Completion


Why you should take this course.
You want to consider a career in blockchain and want to find out if its right for you.
You want to understand what the common use cases are for a blockchain
You want to have an understanding of the technology involved in blockchain architecture
You need to determine what a "blockchain fit" is for your enterprise or your customer.
You want to learn the high level concepts of enterprise blockchains
You want to understand what a blockchain smart contract is.
target_audience: You are a solutions focused engineer or architect that is learning blockchain and would like to understand the major blockchains from an enterprise use case perspective.

courses.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Explained
courses.bio: A Brief Introduction
requirements: No prerequisites required.
courses.description:
Universities are hubs for cutting-edge thought and visionary ideas. Premised on this idea, Blockchain at Berkeley brings together an eclectic team of individuals--ranging from computer scientists to business leaders--to develop what we see as the technology of the future: blockchain. While still in its infancy and often misunderstood, blockchain offers the potential for massive disruption in many industries. By positioning ourselves as the bridge between academia and the public sphere, Blockchain at Berkeley provides the knowledge and education this rapidly-evolving space so desperately needs.
In the current crypto trading climate, we realized that there is a massive amount of misinformation. Many individuals are being taken advantage of by hype and get rich quick schemes with little basis in reality. In order to combat this we are expanding our efforts into the realm of crypto trading.
We currently teach two courses at UC Berkeley on Blockchain technology and development. In addition to this we offer educational courses on blockchain technology to executives and companies that collaborate with us. Blockchain at Berkeley attempts to open source as much of this content as possible to increase the amount of information accessible to the community. The material from one of our technical courses can be found . We are currently working with four different corporations on Blockchain projects including Airbus, Exxon, and Qualcomm as well as several Blockchain platforms such as Cosmos and IOTA. We maintain a position of being blockchain agnostic and seek to stay at the forefront of where this fast paced industry is headed.
target_audience: The ideal individual for this course is someone who has heard about crypto trading but has no idea where to start. This space can often be overwhelming and if you’re looking for a presentation that gives you a brief overview of exchanges and where to start learning about this fast-paced industry then this is the course for you! This is not intended for individuals who have traded crypto before. Although there might be some beneficial tips that you haven’t heard, much of it is a basic introduction to the topic and familiarization with the space. I highly recommend our advanced course if you fit in this category.

파이썬으로 배우는 가상화폐 알고리즘 거래 종합강의!
사상 최초 100% 데이터를 기반으로한 가상화폐 강의!
자세하게 다룬 바이낸스 API 강의!
효과적인 완전 자동 가상화폐 트레이딩봇을 통한 스팟 거래와 선물거래 전략 학습!


Python 및 Binance API를 사용한 가상화폐 알고리즘 거래 강의를 선택해야 하는 이유
Python 및 Binance API를 사용한 가상화폐 알고리즘 거래 강의는 가능성, 희망, 모호함, 순수한 직감은 모두 배제한 사상 최초 100% 데이터를 기반으로 한 가상화폐 강의 입니다.
이 강의에서는 암호화폐 거래, 투자 성공사례를 함께 학습합니다!
바이낸스 API 강의중 가장 자세한 강의라고 할 수 있죠.
그렇다면 이 강의 최종적 목표는 무엇일까요? 바로 효과적인 완전 자동 가상화폐 트레이딩봇을 통한 스팟 거래와 선물거래 전략을 배우는 것입니다.


이 강의는 교과서라 할 수 있을 뿐만 아니라, (가상)화폐 거래에서 가장 흔히 발생하는 실수를 중점으로 다룹니다. 초보자들이 가장 실수를 많이 하는 분야가 바로 이 분야입니다. 왜일까요? 스킬도, 전문지식도, 경험도 부족하기 때문입니다. 과도한 자신감이나 직감에 너무 의존하는 것도 문제입니다. 재무학 이학석사와 CFA(공인재무분석사)라는 뛰어난 경력을 지닌 금융 전문가로써, 여러분께 전달드리고 싶은 말은 바로 이겁니다: 거래와 투자에 있어서 직감과 상식은 별 도움이 되지 않습니다. 그리고 직감에 따른 결정은 옳은 결정이 아닐 때가 많습니다!
이 강의는 가상화폐거래일 “뿐만 아니라” 다른 강의에선 볼 수 없었던 심도있는 파이썬 강의이기도 합니다. 파이썬으로 소프트웨어를 만들고, 실시간으로 가상서버(AWS)를 통해 운영해보세요!


Python 및 Binance API를 사용한 가상화폐 알고리즘 거래 강의를 구성
이 강의는 총 네 파트로 구성돼 있습니다:
파트 1: 거래, 바이낸스, 금융에서 파이썬의 기본
거래 vs 투자
스팟 거래 vs. 파생상품(선물) 거래
자산군으로써의 가상화폐에 대해 알아야 할 것들
거래의 기초: 시장가 주문, 지정가 주문, 수수료, 스프레드, 슬리피지, 시장심도 등
바이낸스와 바이낸스 API
파이썬과 판다스를 활용한 금융데이터분석
파트 2: 자동 가상화폐 스팟 거래
롱 온리(매수위주) 전략
향상된 바이앤홀드(매수 후 보유)전략
백테스팅, 최적화, 포워트테스팅 거래전략
거래 실행 및 자동화
클라우드 내 완전자동 트레이딩봇 생성(AWS)
실제 거래와 모의 거래
파트 3: 자동화된 가상화폐 선물거래
선물과 무기한 선물
롱숏 선물거래전략
마진거래(레버리지)
바이낸스 선물거래 API를 이용한 실제 거래와 모의 거래
파트 4 (부록): 파이썬 집중강의 (선택)
더도 말고 덜도 말고, 이 강의에 필요한 파이썬 코딩에 대한 모든것


강의에서 설치가 필요한 무료 소프트웨어를 안내 할 예정입니다.


베스트셀러 Udemy 강사 Alexander Hagmann이 전하는 한 마디
가상화폐 알고리즘 거래 ( Cryptocurrency Argorithmic Trading ) 종합강의에 오신 여러분을 모두 환영합니다!
이 강의 최종적 목표는 무엇일까요? 바로 효과적인 완전 자동 가상화폐 트레이딩봇을 통한 스팟 거래와 선물거래 전략을 배우는 것입니다.
지금 바로 수강하세요!
감사합니다. 그럼 강의에서 만나요!
-Alexander

courses.title: Learn How to Find Profitable NFT Projects.
courses.bio: The complete NFT course to get you started and profiting within this space. All you need to know to become an NFT expert
objectives: Start off by understanding what NFT's are and what value they can provide to their holders.
Learn how to find profitable NFT's through building your own network.
Find out how to successfully analyse NFT projects, how to pick up on the red flags and what you should be looking for when looking into projects.
Learn how to acquire valuable NFT projects easier and quicker than others.
Learn which platforms to use when analysing your own NFT projects and how these platforms will help you in doing so.
requirements: No specific skills are needed for this course. A basic understanding of the crypto and nft space will suffice.
courses.description:
This course was created with the intention of equipping any who complete it with the basic understanding of the NFT space. NFT's have become a household name and the space is experiencing massive adoption and it is for this reason that anyone who understands what they are and how to profit from them will become major players in a space that is still so early but contains massive potential.
This course starts off by teaching you, the NFT investor, what NFT's are and the true value behind owning one for your own.
Only after understanding the space can we learn how to find profitable projects earlier than any other and which platforms to use in doing exactly that. This is what section 3 will focus on.
Section 4 moves over to the process I follow when analysing and evaluating new and upcoming projects and the platforms I use when doing so. Here you will be provided with useful tips and techniques to use when analysing your own projects and how to find both the red flags and unique aspects offered by projects.
A detailed example will conclude this course, explaining the reasoning behind one of my own investments into an NFT project. This example is useful to understand exactly the thought process I go through when analysing projects and the questions I ask to determine if it is a profitable project or not.
target_audience: This course will help you realise the true value behind NFT's and gain a thorough understanding of the space.
If you are either looking to quick flip NFT projects or find projects that will provide you with long term value, this course will teach you how to do both.
This course will teach you how to build a network and find new and upcoming NFT projects that are showing the biggest potential.
Upon completing this course you will also be able to mint NFT's easier and quicker by using my tried and tested techniques and the platforms I use.

"비트코인 이외 블록체인의 실제 사용 사례는 블록체인에 대한 새로운 눈을 뜨게 해주었습니다. 또한 이를 통해 블록체인이 무엇이고 어떤 가능성을 가졌는지 이해하는 데 실제로 도움이 됐습니다. 좋고 더 크고 더 효율적인 결과의 탄생과 함께 비트코인의 바탕이 되는 기술의 잠재력과 그로 인한 혁신은 정말 놀랍고 흥미진진합니다.
본 강의를 통해 암호화폐 입문자부터 망설이며 걱정하던 이들까지 모든 사람들이 미래를 볼 수 있도록 도와주셔서 감사합니다. 우리는 한 번에 한 블록체인씩 세상을 바꾸고 있습니다. ^^"
- Jessie Yanger


"블록체인에 대한 지식을 공유하고 추가 자료를 제공해준 George에게 감사합니다. George의 강의는 확실히 많은 교훈을 담고 있어요. 그리고 흥미롭고 이해하기 쉬운 방식으로 강의를 진행해 줍니다. 확실히 이제 새로운 혁명의 시대로 가는 여정에 들어선 것 같습니다. 세계는 곧 블록체인으로 움직일 것입니다.”
- Pet Grabec


"수강 신청하길 잘한 것 같습니다. 수강료보다 훨씬 더 가치 있는 강의였습니다. 고마워요, George!"
- Muhamad Ghazali




[본 강의의 대상]
비트코인 이외 블록체인 기술이 사용되고 있는 다양한 사례를 알아보고 블록체인의 미래가 어디로 향하고 있는지 알고 싶으신가요?
그렇다면 이 강의는 당신을 위한 강의입니다!
저는 Udemy의 베스트셀러 강사 George Levy입니다. 170개국 이상의 다양한 국적의 수강생들을 대상으로 블록체인, 비트코인 및 암호화폐에 대한 강의를 하면서 40,000명 이상의 수강생들에게 만족스러운 평가를 받아왔습니다


[본 강의에서 학습할 주제]
‘블록체인 심화 과정: 비트코인 외의 활용 및 블록체인 기술 적용 사례’에서는 비트코인이 블록체인 기술을 활용한 한 가지 사례일 뿐인 이유와 블록체인이 다양한 분야에서 실질적인 결과를 이끌어내기 위해 어떻게 사용되고 있는지 차근차근 보여드리겠습니다.
현재 사용되고 있는 각종 플랫폼, 블록체인 기술이 나아가고 있는 방향, 블록체인이 발전함에 따라 앞서 나가기 위해 주의해야 할 영역에 대해서도 설명합니다.
본 강의는 계속해서 진행중이며 실질적인 결과를 도출하고 있는 블록체인 활용 사례들만 엄선하여 구성하였습니다.
과대광고, Vaporware 또는 공허한 약속 없이 비트코인 이외의 실제 블록체인 활용 사례를 소개합니다
수강 신청 시, 다양한 참고 자료를 제공해 드리며 강의를 들으면서 연습하고 학습하는 데 도움이 될 특별한 온라인 플랫폼을 무료로 이용하실 수 있습니다.


[여러분이 저를 선택하셔야 하는 이유]
Blockchain Institute of Technology의 공인 강사이자 최고의 암호화폐 및 미디어 출판물인 Bitsonline의 공동 설립자로서 저는 블록체인을 적용하여 세상을 변화시키는 솔루션을 만들고 있는 유수의 기업가들 및 개발자들과 직접 협력하고 있습니다. 초반 강의에서 보게 되시겠지만 저는 블록체인 분야의 수많은 주요 인물들과 함께 주기적으로 협력하고 있습니다.
블록체인 기술의 영향력을 확산시키고 성장을 돕는 것이 제 개인적인 사명이며, 본 강의를 통해 여러분이 이 값진 정보를 활용해 비트코인을 넘어 자신만의 블록체인 사용 사례를 만들어 보시길 진심으로 바랍니다.
이해하기 어렵고 처음 시작했을 때보다 더 혼란스럽게 하는 강의는 이제 그만 들으셔도 됩니다. 전 세계 수천 명의 학생들이 인정한 쉽고 명확한 제 강의로 시작해 보세요.
제 강의를 들으시는 수강생이라면 궁금하신 사항이나 더 자세히 배우고 싶은 내용을 저에게 직접 문의하실 수 있습니다.
또한 30일 이내 환불을 보장합니다.


[강의 커리큘럼]
본 강의에서는 각종 비즈니스 분야에 실제 적용되고 있는 사례를 살펴보고 사례별 블록체인 플랫폼과 작동 방식을 설명합니다.
과정을 마치면 비트코인 이외 블록체인 기술이 활용된 다양한 사례를 깊이 이해하고 블록체인 기술이 비트코인 이외도 다양한 분야에서 폭넓게 활용될 수 있음을 명확하게 이해하게 될 것입니다.
강의를 통해 배우고, 또 배운 것을 적용하게 될 것입니다


[본 강의에 포함된 보너스 자료]
맞춤 설계된 온라인 데모 블록체인 플랫폼 무료 이용
공개/비공개 블록체인 사용에 대한 PDF 가이드 (다운로드 및 인쇄 가능 버전)


비트코인 이외 블록체인 기술이 어떻게 활용되고 있는지 그리고 블록체인의 미래는 어디로 향하고 있는지 알아보고 남들보다 한발 먼저 기회를 잡으세요!


강의에서 뵙겠습니다!
감사합니다.


- George Levy
강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 내용을 남겨 주세요. 그래야 상세한 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)
target_audience: 비트코인을 넘어 블록체인 기술이 어떻게 적용되고 있는지 알고싶은 분
비트코인 이외의 영역에서 블록체인 기술을 활용하려는 사업가 및 기업가

objectives: Alım Ve Satım yapmadan önce neye bakmanız gerektiğinizi öğreneceksiniz.
Sinyallerin neyi ifade ettiğini, yükseliş habercisi hareketleri öğreneceksiniz.
Risk Yönetimi yaparak zararı minimum tutup, kazancı maksimuma çıkaracaksınız.
Eşsiz bir deneyim ile kripto paraların işleyişini daha iyi anlayacak, bu işten para kazanacaksınız.
requirements: Deneyim gerekmez. Sıfırdan öğretilecektir.
courses.description:
Bu kursu bitiren öğrencilerim, kendi başlarına günlük hayatta laptopunu alıp bir kafede, veya evde sakin bir ortamda rahatça analiz yapabilecek, bitcoinin nasıl işlediğini bilecek, değişik zaman dilimlerinde değişik formasyonlarla coinlerin yönleri hakkında yorum yapabilecektir.

Bu kurstan verim almak için her videoyu atlamadan izlemek gerekir. Videolar arasında bağlantılar vardır ve bir videoyu izlemeden diğerine geçmek hata olacaktır. Videolar izlenme sırasına göre konulmuştur. Önemli konular başlarda anlatılmış detayına ise ilerleyen derslerde girilmiştir.


Kursun en önemli özelliği dersin bitiminden sonra öğrencilerle canlı işlemlere bakılmasıdır. Bu sayede öğrenilen bilgiyi pekiştirmek mümkündür. Pratik yapmadan öğrencinin gelişimi mümkün değildir. Her ders sonunda öğrenci o dersle ilgili öğrendiğini bir grafikte (BTC veya ETH olması tavsiye edilir) denemeli, sonuca ulaşmaya çalışmalıdır. Anlamadığı noktaları ise öğrenci her zaman Kripto Buğra'ya Discord/İnstagram veya Udemy üzerinden ulaşarak sorabilecek, cevap alabilecektir.

Kursu bitiren öğrenciler Kripto Buğra'nın sonsuz desteğini kazanacaktır. Yaşam Boyu süren bu destekte özellikle piyasada zor günler yaşanırken piyasa hakkında yorumlar alabilecek, ellerindeki coinin durumunu Kripto Buğra'ya danışarak öğrenebilecektir.

Kursa 2 veya daha fazla arkadaşını davet eden öğrencilerimi VİP Al-Sat grubunda 1 aylık ağırlamaya karar verilmiştir. Bu süre davet edilen kişi sayısı arttıkça artabilir, kararı Kripto Buğra verecektir. Discord Al-Sat grubunun linkini bulmak için Youtube'da herhangi bir videonun açıklama kısmına bakılabilir.
target_audience: Elinde belli bir sermayesi olan ve cüzdanını büyütmek isteyen öğrenciler için birebir.

courses.description:
Hello, and welcome to this course to learn more about cryptocurrencies and blockchain, brought to you by Token Metrics.
Token Metrics is a cryptocurrency investment research firm that provides AI-based cryptocurrency ratings and price predictions.
This course is designed to give you a better understanding of Crypto and blockchain, and how you can make money with them.
Cryptocurrencies are the future as they provide a solution to a rising crisis in the global economy. Cryptocurrencies improve centralized financial systems with their decentralized nature and finite supply. As opposed to fiat, you own your own money and no one can lock you out of it.
We'll be covering a range of topics, from the basics of what cryptocurrencies and blockchain are, to more advanced concepts like investing.
By the end of this course, you'll have:
- Learned the basics of Cryptocurrencies and the technology behind them, Blockchain
- Dived deeper into the use cases of Crypto
- Explored more about money and its future
- Learned more about the Global Financial System and the role of Crypto in it
So whether you're a complete beginner or you already have some knowledge of these topics, you should be able to find something of value in this course.
target_audience: Everyone wanting to learn more about Crypto and Blockchain, and making money with them

BLOCKCHAIN PRACTICAL EXERCISES: MetaMask Web Wallet Setup - Step by Step Instruction
Blockchain Platforms and Key Features: Hyperledger - Multiple Blockchain Platforms and Tools

requirements: This is NOT a programming course, making it suitable for anyone—regardless of their technical background.
Perfect for those who are interested in building a career in blockchain and want to start with a strong foundation, including hands-on practical experience.
Whether you’re completely new to blockchain or want to develop core functional knowledge of business blockchains, this course will help you gain the confidence to explore advanced blockchain topics.
courses.description:
Blockchain Isn’t Just for Developers—It’s for Everyone.
Blockchain projects today require diverse roles, from Business Analysts and Product Managers to Project Managers and Domain Experts. You don’t need coding skills to understand blockchain, but you do need a strong foundation—and this course is designed to give you exactly that.
With thousands of non-coding job opportunities available across industries like banking, supply chain, healthcare, and even gaming, blockchain offers exciting career paths for professionals at all levels.
What You’ll Learn:
Blockchain Fundamentals, Simplified: Understand distributed ledgers, wallets, transactions, and consensus mechanisms.
Insights into Key Platforms: Explore features of Ethereum, Bitcoin, Hyperledger, Corda, Ripple, and more.
Emerging Blockchain Trends: Learn about NFTs, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), and blockchain’s role in the Metaverse.
Real-World Case Studies: Discover how blockchain is transforming industries with up-to-date examples.
Practical Tools and Hands-On Learning: Gain confidence with practical exercises, tools, and visual learning aids.
This Course Is Perfect For:
Non-technical professionals looking to explore blockchain.
Job seekers preparing for functional roles in blockchain projects.
Anyone who wants to build a strong foundation before diving into advanced topics like Web3, AI, or DeFi.
Equip yourself with the knowledge and confidence to thrive in the exciting world of blockchain. Whether you're a beginner or a professional exploring blockchain opportunities, this course will help you stay ahead.
target_audience: Ideal for individuals aiming to work as Business Analysts, Consultants, Process Consultants, Product Managers, Project Managers, Domain Experts, or similar roles in blockchain projects.
Perfect for those who are interviewing or planning to transition into functional roles in blockchain projects and need a clear understanding of key concepts.
Designed for anyone who wants to build a solid understanding of blockchain fundamentals and gain the confidence to explore advanced topics in the blockchain ecosystem.

requirements: Aucune connaissance particulière n'est nécessaire pour commencer ce cours
courses.description:
Mise en ligne : 29/06/2018

Vous êtes ici parce que vous souhaitez découvrir la méthode la plus rapide et la plus efficace pour investir sur les cryptomonnaies / cryptoassets et faire des bénéfices importants.
Ce cours vous apprendra comment acheter vos premières cryptos sur ce que j'appelle les "Portails d'Achats" (Coinbase, Kraken etc.) avant de les transférer sur les places de marchés de cryptos (Binance, Bittrex etc.) afin que vous puissiez commencer à investir immédiatement. L'objectif est surtout de vous montrer la simplicité du procédé d'investissement, et de vous enseigner la bonne méthode pour sélectionner les meilleures valeurs.

Vous êtes aussi ici parce que vous avez réalisé que cette année 2018 pourrait bien devenir l'année la plus fulgurante pour les cryptos.
Nous verrons ensemble comment faire en sorte de faire partie de ces investisseurs qui sont parvenus à réaliser des x100 sur UN SEUL investissement.

J'ai eu la chance de commencer à faire mes recherches sur les cryptos il y a deux ans et demi lorsque le marché commençait déjà à montrer les signes d'une des plus grandes innovations de notre époque. Étant expert de la donnée scientifique, je m'en suis servi pour pouvoir trouver les bonnes informations au bon moment, ce qui m'a permis de naviguer calmement dans un contexte d'informations très opaque, et de faire des gros ROI.
J'ai décidé de tourner ce cours le jour où j'en ai eu ASSEZ de constater que la grande majorité des informations qui transitent en ligne étaient biaisées et que mes amis et proches qui décidaient de se lancer sur les cryptos, finissaient pas prendre des mauvaises décisions d'investissements.

C'est après ce coup-de-gueule que j'ai constitué la structure de ce cours qui vous présentera comment créer correctement votre premier portefeuille, et vous montrerai au moins 5 techniques d'investissement dont 1 méthode d'analyse d'assets personnelle développée au cours de ces 2 dernières années.

Grâce à ce cours vous pourrez identifier le prochain coin qui crèvera le plafond et vous positionner dessus au meilleur moment.
Nous aborderons donc aussi toute une partie qui traitera de l'analyse technique sur les cryptos.

Lancez-vous sur ce marché avec ce cours dès que vous le pourrez, et vous réaliserez les bénéfices exceptionnels que vous attendez, car même au début 2018, de nombreux investissements auraient pu vu faire gagner beaucoup. Placez-vous en amont du marché, devancez-le et vous ferez des bénéfices colossaux.

Paramétrer votre portefeuille sécurisé
Identifier les meilleurs investissements, avec des potentiels de gains colossaux à la fois sur le court, moyen et long terme

requirements: Conhecimentos intermediários de Python (saber o que é if then else, for, while, funções, módulos).

courses.description:
Para ganhar dinheiro realizando trading com criptomoedas é preciso conhecimento, velocidade e controle emocional. Com o conhecimento você é capaz de traçar estratégias que determinam o momento certo para comprar e vender suas moedas. Com velocidade você acerta o timing para entrar e sair das operações sem deixar as oportunidades passarem e o Controle Emocional é fundamental para que o sentimento de medo ou ganância não lhe induza a tomar decisões erradas e precipitadas. São esses três fatores que um bot para trading automático traz para você e de forma amplificada... É Isso o que eu lhe Ensinarei DO ZERO a Fazer Nesse Curso!


Aprenda a desenvolver na linguagem Python robôs que negociam automaticamente criptoativos (Bitcoin, Ethreum, Dogecoin, etc) utilizando estratégias de negociação desenvolvidas por você.


Descubra como esses bots são planejados e codificados e passe a criar os seus próprios robôs negociadores.


Adquira uma importante vantagem competitiva frente a outras pessoas que realizam suas operações manualmente e maximize suas chances de vitória nesse mercado.


Use os conhecimentos fundamentais apresentados no curso para aplica-los em qualquer exchange e até mesmo para negociar ações na bolsa de valores... os princípios são os mesmos!


Você nunca mais enxergará o mercado de renda variável da mesma forma depois de fazer esse curso.
target_audience: Pessoas que possuem um conhecimento intermediário de Python e que desejam se aprofundar na utilização da linguagem para realizar Trade automático de criptomoedas criando bots.
Pessoas que desejam entender o mecanismo de criação de robôs negociadores de ativos de renda variável.

courses.title: NFT'ler Hakkında Her Şey (Kurs aktif değil)
courses.bio: NFT dünyası
objectives: NFT teknolojisinin temelleri ve geleceği hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.

Sıfırdan kendi koleksiyonunuzu nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğreneceksiniz.
Bir NFT koleksiyonunun nasıl pazarlanacağını ve pazarlama stratejilerini öğreneceksiniz.
NFT dünyasındaki dikkat edilmesi gereken en yaygın NFT dolandırıcılıklarına karşı güvenlik yöntemleri hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız

Kursumuza kaydolmak için NFT'leri ve altında yatan teknolojiyi öğrenmeye istekli olmak dışında herhangi bir gereklilik yoktur. Tek gereksinim, NFT dünyasına duyulan merak ve tutku.
Yeni teknolojilere ilgi duyuyorum ve geç olmadan keşfetmek istiyorum, bu alanda araştırma yapmayı seviyorum ve kazançlı fırsatlar sunan bu treni kaçırmak istemiyorum diyorsan doğru yerdesin!
courses.description:
Kurs aktif değildir. NFT dünyasına adım atan kişilerin aklındaki ilk soru, herkes tarafından internetten indirilebilen dijital sanat eserlerinin, nasıl olup da yüzlerce milyon dolara satıldığıdır. Kimi zaman bir .jpg yada .gif dosyasından, kimi zaman ise video ya da ses dosyasından oluşan ve herkesin erişebildiği bu dijital sanat eserleri, günümüz dünyasında birçok kişi için merak konusu haline geldi. Bu noktada, NFT'ler dijital varlıklara yatırım yapmanın yeni bir yolu olarak giderek daha da popüler hale geliyor.

courses.title: Spot the Next 10x Crypto
courses.bio: Analyze & Profit from Explosive Opportunities Before the Masses
objectives: How to research and identify high-potential cryptocurrencies before they go mainstream.
The fundamentals of blockchain technology and tokenomics that drive long-term value.
How to analyze market sentiment, community engagement, and development activity.
Strategies for evaluating whitepapers, roadmaps, and project teams for legitimacy and potential.
Risk management techniques to protect your portfolio while chasing high returns.

The Crypto Engine: What is Crypto and Why It Matters
Getting In the Game: How to Buy Crypto Without Getting Robbed
How to Tell If a Coin Has Potential or Is Just Hype
Making Moves in the Market: How to Make Money from Crypto
Tools, News & Examples: Why the News Moves the Price
The Website You Should Be Obsessing Over

requirements: Basic computer skills are enough.
courses.description:
The crypto market is full of hype, noise, and scams but it’s also the fastest-moving wealth creation machine of our time. The difference between those who make life-changing gains and those who get wrecked is the ability to identify the right opportunities before everyone else jumps in. In Spot the Next 10x Crypto, you’ll learn how to cut through the chaos and develop a razor-sharp process for spotting coins and projects with massive upside potential.
This course takes you step-by-step through the exact framework used by experienced traders and investors to detect early signals of breakout cryptos. You’ll learn how to analyze tokenomics, identify market trends, read on-chain data, and evaluate project teams and roadmaps. You’ll discover how to spot entry points, manage risk, and create a balanced portfolio that gives you exposure to moonshots without gambling your entire stack.
By the end of this course, you won’t be chasing pumps, you’ll be positioned before they happen. Whether you’re a beginner looking for a structured approach or an intermediate trader tired of emotional decisions, you’ll walk away with a proven, repeatable system for finding the next 10x crypto and the confidence to execute it.
Your next big win starts here.
target_audience: Crypto beginners who want to move beyond hype and speculation.
Traders looking to add long-term 10x potential projects to their strategies.
Anyone who’s tired of chasing trends too late and wants a repeatable process to find winners before the masses.

courses.bio: ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസി മാർക്കറ്റ്, ട്രേഡിംഗ്, നിക്ഷേപം എന്നിവ പഠിക്കാനുള്ള ഒരു സമ്പൂർണ്ണ വഴികാട്ടിയാണ് ഈ കോഴ്സ്.
objectives: ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി ട്രേഡിംങ് വഴി ഫുൾ ടൈം/ പാർട്ട് ടൈം വരുമാനം ഉണ്ടാക്കാം
എപ്പോൾ വാങ്ങണമെന്നും എപ്പോൾ ലാഭത്തിനായി ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി വിൽക്കണമെന്നും അറിയാൻ സാധിക്കും
നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ലാഭം വർദ്ധിപ്പിക്കാനും നഷ്ടം കുറയ്ക്കാനും കഴിയും
നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ചാർട്ടുകളും ടെക്നിക്കൽ ഇൻഡികേറ്ററുകളും മനസ്സിലാക്കാനും അവ ട്രേഡിംഗിനായി ഉപയോഗിക്കാനും കഴിയും
നഷ്ടം കുറയ്ക്കുന്നതിന് സ്റ്റോപ്പ് ലോസ്സ് എങ്ങനെ ഉപയോഗിക്കാമെന്നും നടപ്പിലാക്കാമെന്നും അറിയാം
മാർക്കെറ്റിൽ ലാഭത്തിനായി ട്രേഡ് ചെയ്യുന്നതിനുള്ള മികച്ച അവസരങ്ങൾ അറിയാം

ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസി ലോകത്തേക്ക് ഒരു ആമുഖം: 2021 ക്രിപ്റ്റോ ട്രേഡിങ്ങിന് പറ്റിയ ഏറ്റവും മികച്ച സമയമാവുന്നത് എന്ത് കൊണ്ട് ?
ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസി- നിർബന്ധമായും അറിഞ്ഞിരി: Crypto Currency - What it is actually?
ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസിയിൽ ശ്രദ്ധിക്കേണ്ട ഏറ്റവും പ്രധാനപ്പെട്ട കാര്യം
ട്രേഡിങ്ങ് അക്കൗണ്ട് തുടങ്ങാനുള്ള മാർഗ്ഗ: ക്രെഡിറ്റ് /ഡെബിറ്റ് കാർഡ് വഴി ബിനാൻസ് അക്കൗണ്ടിലേക്ക് പണമയക്കാം
P2P ട്രാൻസ്ഫർ പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്ന രീതി - ജനകീയമായ രീതി
ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസിയിലെ ട്രേഡിങ്ങ് തന്ത്രങ്: EARLY MOVERS - കുറഞ്ഞ റിസ്‌ക്കിൽ പരമാവധി ലാഭം
ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ നിന്ന് വരുമാനം ഉണ്ടാക്കാനുള്ള ഏറ്റവും നല്ല മാർഗ്ഗം
Swing Trading - മികച്ച ഷോർട്ട് ടെം തന്ത്രം
നഷ്ടങ്ങൾ എങ്ങനെ ഒഴിവാക്കാം: ഒരു ട്രേഡിൽ നിന്ന് എപ്പോഴാണ് എക്സിറ്റ് ചെയ്യേണ്ടത് ?
ടെക്നിക്കൽ അനാലിസിസ് : ട്രേഡിങ്ങിനു വേണ്: Relative Strength Index - ഈസിയായി വാങ്ങുകയും വിൽക്കുകയും ചെയ്യാം

requirements: നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഇന്റർനെറ്റ് ആക്‌സസ് ഉള്ള ഒരു സ്മാർട്ട്‌ഫോണോ കമ്പ്യൂട്ടറോ ഉണ്ടായിരിക്കണം
courses.description:
ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ ട്രേഡിങ്ങ് ചെയ്യുന്നതെങ്ങിനെ എന്ന് പഠിപ്പിക്കുന്ന കോഴ്സ്സിലേക്ക് സ്വാഗതം. എന്റെ പേര് ഉമർ അബ്ദുസ്സലാം. ആർട്ടിഫിഷ്യൽ ഇന്റലിജൻസ്, ബ്ലോക്ക്ചെയിൻ പോലെയുള്ള ലോകത്തെ മാറ്റിമറിക്കാൻ പോവുന്ന സാങ്കേതികവിദ്യകളെ കുറിച്ച് പഠിപ്പിക്കുന്ന ഇഡാപ്റ്റ് ലേർണിംഗ് ആപ്പിന്റെ ചീഫ് എക്സിക്യൂട്ടീവ് ഓഫീസറാണ്.


ബിറ്കോയിൻ പോലെയുള്ള ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളുടെ മൂല്യത്തിൽ വലിയ മുന്നേറ്റമുണ്ടായതായി വാർത്തകൾ നിങ്ങൾ ശ്രദ്ധിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ടാവും. വലിയ വരുമാന സാധ്യത വാഗ്‌ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ എങ്ങനെ നിക്ഷേപം നടത്താമെന്നും ഹ്രസ്വകാല ട്രേഡിങിനെ കുറിച്ചുമാണ് ഈ കൊഴ്സ്സിലൂടെ പഠിപ്പിക്കുക. എങ്ങനെ അക്കൗണ്ട് തുറക്കാമെന്നതിൽ തുടങ്ങി ട്രേഡിങിന് ആവശ്യമായ എല്ലാ കാര്യങ്ങളും ഈ കൊഴ്സ്സിൽ ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തിയിട്ടുണ്ട്. ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ നിന്ന് ഒരു വരുമാനമാർഗം എങ്ങനെ ഉണ്ടാക്കാം എന്നതാണ് കൊഴ്സ്സിന്റെ മുഖ്യ അജണ്ട.


ദീർഘകാല നിക്ഷേപമായും ഹ്രസ്വകാല ട്രേഡിങ്ങായും രണ്ടു രീതിയിൽ ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ നിന്ന് വരുമാനം ഉണ്ടാക്കാൻ സാധിക്കും. കുറഞ്ഞ സമയം കൊണ്ട് ലാഭം ഉണ്ടാക്കുന്നതെങ്ങനെയെന്നാണ് കോഴ്സ് പ്രധാനമായും ഫോക്കസ് ചെയ്യുന്നത്. അതായത് ഒരു നിശ്ചിത ലാഭം മാത്രം മുന്നിൽ കണ്ടു ആയ ലെവൽ എത്തിക്കഴിഞ്ഞാൽ കറൻസിയിൽ നിന്ന് എക്സിറ്റ് ചെയ്യുന്ന രീതിയാണിത്. ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ ചാഞ്ചാട്ടം അധികമാണെന്നതിനാൽ തന്നെ കൂടുതൽ സമയം ഒരു കറൻസിയിൽ നിൽക്കുന്നത് ചിലപ്പോൾ നഷ്ടസാധ്യത ഉണ്ടാക്കും. അതിനാൽ തന്നെ ഷോർട്ട് ടെം ട്രേഡിങ്ങ് വഴി നിശ്ചിത ലെവൽ എത്തിക്കഴിഞ്ഞാൽ പെട്ടെന്ന് എക്സിറ്റ് ചെയ്യുന്നത് പലപ്പോഴും നല്ലതാണ്.


ഈ മേഖലയിൽ നിങ്ങൾ ഒരു തുടക്കക്കാരനാണെങ്കിലും അഡ്വാൻസ്ഡ് ആണെങ്കിലും നിങ്ങൾക്ക് അറിയേണ്ടതെല്ലാം ഞാൻ ഈ കൊഴ്സ്സിൽ ഉൾക്കൊള്ളിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ട്.


നിക്ഷേപത്തിൽ നിന്ന് വ്യത്യസ്തമാണ് ട്രേഡിങ്ങ്. സ്റ്റോക്ക് മാർക്കറ്റിൽ മുൻപരിചയമുള്ളവർക്ക് ഇത് കൂടുതൽ വ്യക്തമായിരിക്കും. അടിസ്ഥാന ആശയത്തിൽ സാമ്യതയുണ്ടെങ്കിലും ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ അല്പം വ്യത്യാസങ്ങളുണ്ട്.


ട്രേഡിങിന് വേണ്ട സ്ട്രാറ്റജികൾ, എപ്പോഴാണ് ട്രേഡ് ചെയ്യാൻ ഏറ്റവും നല്ല സമയം, എങ്ങനെയാണ് ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിൽ നിന്ന് മികച്ച വരുമാനമുണ്ടാക്കാൻ സാധിക്കുക, ഹ്രസ്വകാല നിക്ഷേപങ്ങളിലെ ലാഭസാധ്യതകളെ സ്വാധീനിക്കുന്ന പ്രധാന ഘടകങ്ങൾ ഏതെല്ലാം, കറൻസികളുടെ മൂവേമെന്റുകളെ വിലയിരുത്താനാവുന്ന ടെക്നിക്കൽ ചാർട്ടുകൾ എങ്ങനെ മനസ്സിലാക്കാം എന്നിങ്ങനെയുള്ള കാര്യങ്ങളെല്ലാം ഈ കൊഴ്സ്സിലുണ്ട്. ടെക്നിക്കൽ ചാർട്ടുകൾ ഒബ്സർവ് ചെയ്താൽ കറൻസികളുടെ മുന്നോട്ട്പോക്ക് എങ്ങനെയായിരിക്കുമെന്ന് ഒരു പരിധി വരേയ്ക്കും നമുക്ക് പ്രവചിക്കാൻ പറ്റും. അത്കൊണ്ട് തന്നെ ഷോർട് ടെം ട്രേഡിങിൽ ടെക്നിക്കൽ ചാർട്ട് വളരെ പ്രധാനമാണ്. .


എത്രയൊക്കെ ശ്രദ്ധിച്ചാലും നമ്മൾ വാങ്ങിയ കറൻസി ചിലപ്പോൾ വിലയിൽ താഴെ പോവാൻ സാധ്യതയുണ്ട്, അത്തരം അവസരങ്ങളിൽ എങ്ങനെ റിസ്ക് മാനേജ് ചെയ്യാം , നഷ്ടം കുറക്കാനുള്ള വഴികൾ ഏതെല്ലാം എന്നിവയും കോഴ്സ്സിലുണ്ട്. .
ക്രിപ്റ്റോകറൻസികളെ എങ്ങനെ ഒരു വരുമാനമാർഗമായി മാറ്റാം എന്നതിന്റെ എല്ലാ ഭാഗവും ഈ കോഴ്സ്സിൽ കവർ ചെയ്യുന്നുണ്ട്. ലോകം മുഴുവൻ ഉറ്റുനോക്കുന്ന ഒരു വിപണിയാണ് ക്രിപ്റ്റോകറൻസികളുടേത്, ടെസ്ല പോലെയുള്ള കമ്പനികൾ നോർമൽ കറൻസികളെ കൂടാതെ ക്രിപ്റ്റോകറൻസികളും സ്വീകരിക്കുമെന്ന വാർത്തകളും ഈയിടെ പുറത്തുവന്നിരുന്നു. വരുന്ന നാളുകളിൽ ഈ വിപണി എന്തായാലും കൂടുതൽ ആക്റ്റീവ് ആകുമെന്നുറപ്പാണ്. ക്രിപ്റ്റോ കറൻസികളിലെ ട്രേഡിങ്ങ് എങ്ങനെയാണ് നടത്തുക എന്നതിൽ തുടങ്ങി ഈ മേഖലയുടെ മറ്റു സാധ്യതകളും പ്രധാന മുന്നേറ്റങ്ങളുമൊക്കെ ചർച്ച ചെയ്യപെടുന്നുണ്ട്.
target_audience: ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി ട്രേഡിംഗ് പഠിക്കാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും
ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി എന്താണെന്നും അത് എങ്ങനെ പ്രവർത്തിക്കുന്നുവെന്നും അറിയാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും
സാങ്കേതിക വിശകലനം പഠിക്കാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും
ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി ഐസിഒകളിൽ (ICO ) നിന്ന് വാങ്ങാനും ലാഭം നേടാനും ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും
ക്രിപ്‌റ്റോകറൻസി ട്രേഡിംഗിനായി മികച്ച തന്ത്രങ്ങൾ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും
ബിറ്റ്കോയിൻ, എതെറിയം അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ആൾട്ട് കോയിൻസ് മനസിലാക്കാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ആർക്കും

courses.title: Bitcoin - a compelling case for cryptocurrencies?
courses.bio: Understanding the arguments both for and against bitcoin and cryptocurrencies

Introduction: What is the impact of Money Printing?
Bitcoin & Cryptocurrencies - the future of Money?

requirements: None
courses.description:
Bitcoin - the future?  or a bubble?
Whether you are a bitcoin convert (a "coiner") or a bitcoin sceptic (a "no coiner"), understanding the core arguments is key in assessing whether this  asset class has 'intrinsic value' is important for every investor.   While we don't have a crystal ball, this workshop aims to unlock exactly what role bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies might play as the global economy develops.
Taking you on an historical journey through the history of money we will show how society adopted gold as a currency and how gold gave rise to the fiat currencies in use today.  We will try to uncover exactly what a dollar is worth, why gold retains its value (even today) and the advantages and disadvantages of fiat currencies.
We will look at how money is created today - by Commercial Banks using a process called Fractional Reserving - and Central Banks using a process called Quantitative Easing.  We will look at the effects of all this money printing, and whether Modern Monetary Theory (MMT) really is the 'new normal' for economic thinking.
Finally we will examine whether cryptocurrencies really are here to stay, or whether they are a passing phase that will soon be consigned to the dustbin of history.
I hope you find this workshop both informative and enjoyable!
target_audience: Any one who wants to understand Bitcoin and the world of Cryptocurrencies

courses.title: Bitcoin Trading Mastery: Implementing Trading Systems
courses.bio: Master 5 Proven Bitcoin Trading Strategies: Seasonality, Momentum, Trend Analysis, Halving Cycles & Risk Management
objectives: Master the fundamentals of technical analysis to identify profitable Bitcoin trading opportunities and implement effective entry/exit strategies.
Learn to develop and backtest automated Bitcoin trading systems using proven methodologies and risk management techniques.
Understand how to analyze market sentiment and on-chain metrics to anticipate major Bitcoin price movements before the crowd.
Build practical skills in using hardware wallets, secure exchanges, and 2FA to protect your Bitcoin trading capital from hacks and theft.
Develop expertise in using leverage responsibly and setting appropriate stop-losses to maximize returns while preserving capital.
Learn to identify and trade key Bitcoin chart patterns and indicators for high-probability setups across various market conditions and timeframes.
Master advanced risk management principles including position sizing, portfolio diversification, and capital allocation optimization.
Understand Bitcoin market cycles, halving events, and macroeconomic factors that influence long-term trading strategies.
Learn to implement dollar-cost averaging, swing trading, and trend-following strategies tailored to different market conditions.
Build practical skills in creating and executing a complete Bitcoin trading plan, from market analysis to position management.

Course Introduction: Introduction to the Bitcoin Trading Mastery course
Bitcoin Market Foundations: Evolution of Bitcoin Markets and Trading Landscape
Market Mechanics and Key Participants in Bitcoin Trading
Bitcoin Trading vs Investing - Strategy Selection Framework
Essential Tools and Platforms for Professional Bitcoin Trading
Strategic Trading Systems: TrendFusion - Combining Trend Indicators for Superior Performance
Pi Cycles Strategy - Mathematical Patterns in Bitcoin Markets
Advanced Trading Mastery: Trading Psychology - Developing the Bitcoin Trader’s Mindset
Scientific Risk and Money Management for Bitcoin Markets
Portfolio Construction with Multiple Bitcoin Strategies
Essential Bitcoin Knowledge for Professional Traders
Essential Trading Resources Building Your Bitcoin Knowledge Arsenal

requirements: No prior Bitcoin or trading experience required – this course is designed for both beginners and those with some market knowledge.
You'll need basic computer skills, internet access, and a free TradingView account to follow along with the strategies.
While a small trading budget is helpful for implementation, you can begin with paper trading to practice risk-free.
All technical concepts are explained from the ground up, making this accessible to anyone interested in systematic Bitcoin trading.
courses.description:
Discover the scientific approach to Bitcoin trading that transforms emotional decision-making into systematic success with five battle-tested strategies that have delivered extraordinary returns across multiple market cycles.
Are you tired of making impulsive Bitcoin trading decisions based on emotions, news headlines, or social media hype? This comprehensive course reveals the exact framework professional Bitcoin traders use to consistently profit in this volatile market, regardless of whether prices are surging or plummeting.
Moving beyond basic "buy low, sell high" advice, you'll master complete trading systems with precise entry/exit rules, position sizing guidelines, and risk management parameters calibrated specifically for Bitcoin's unique market dynamics.
What Makes This Course Different:
Unlike most trading courses that focus on subjective chart patterns or vague concepts, Bitcoin Trading Mastery provides five complete, mathematically-sound trading strategies with exact parameters and full Pine Script code. Each strategy has been rigorously backtested across Bitcoin's entire market history, with some producing returns exceeding 100 million percent while maintaining remarkably controlled drawdowns.
You'll learn not just what to trade, but why each strategy works within Bitcoin's unique market structure – from its programmed halving cycles to its on-chain metrics that provide insights unavailable in traditional markets.
What You'll Master:
• Complete Trading Strategies – Five professional-grade systems including Monthly Seasonality, MomentumMagic, TrendFusion, Bitcoin Halving, and Pi Cycles Strategy, each targeting different market conditions
• Cyclical Market Navigation – How to recognize and profit from Bitcoin's unique four-year halving cycles that create predictable market phases
• Professional Risk Management – Position sizing and drawdown control techniques specifically calibrated for cryptocurrency volatility
• Advanced Portfolio Construction – Methods for combining multiple strategies to create a robust trading approach that performs in all market conditions
• Psychological Framework – Practical techniques to develop the mindset required for disciplined, consistent execution during both bull and bear markets
• Integrated Analysis System – How to combine technical, on-chain, sentiment, and macro perspectives for comprehensive market understanding
• Complete Trading Infrastructure – Setting up your software, security, and execution environment for efficient and secure trading
Each module builds progressively on the previous one, creating a comprehensive understanding of Bitcoin trading from market foundations to advanced portfolio management. The strategies range from simple monthly approaches requiring minimal time commitment to more active systems that capture shorter-term opportunities.
Whether you're a complete beginner looking to start your trading journey, an experienced investor wanting to add active strategies to your Bitcoin holdings, or a traditional market veteran seeking to understand cryptocurrency dynamics, this course provides the complete blueprint to transform your approach to Bitcoin markets.
Replace gut feelings and FOMO with proven systems that perform in all market conditions. Join Bitcoin Trading Mastery today and gain the knowledge, tools, and confidence to trade Bitcoin like a professional.
target_audience: Aspiring Bitcoin traders seeking systematic strategies instead of emotional decision-making.
Complete beginners with no prior trading experience.
Traditional market investors curious about cryptocurrency trading.
Individuals who have experienced both wins and losses but lack a structured approach.
Long-term Bitcoin holders wanting to enhance returns through active management.
Data-driven professionals looking to apply analytical skills to cryptocurrency markets.
Anyone interested in understanding Bitcoin's unique market cycles.
Traders seeking consistent rather than sporadic profits from Bitcoin markets.

Dupa parcurgerea acestui curs, vei avea siguranta ca intelegi ce este si cum functioneaza BlockChain-ul si ca nu vei cadea in capcana de a fi prostit de anumite persoane care se ocupa cu tot felul de combinatii profitand de lispa de cunostinte fundamentale ale oamenilor si vei invata de asemena cum poti sa faci bani pe BlockChain. De asemenea vei economisi foarte mult timp, deoarece am pus in acest curs toate informatiile fundamentale de care ai tu nevoie, fara sa fi nevoit sa stai sa pierzi ore sau zile pe internet cautand informatii rasfirate.

Care sunt dezavantajele daca NU urmezi acest curs ?

courses.bio: The Future of Finance
objectives: In section 1 of this course you will learn about different types of Cryptocurrency. I will show you how to research and decipher between Coins and Tokens.
In section 2 of this Course you will learn about different Exchanges and how to use them. This will allow you to Buy and Sell Crypto at your leisure.
In section 3 of this Course you will learn about Crypto Wallets and Moving your Crypto which is key to your Crypto becoming Currency.
In section 4 of this Course you will learn Basic Trading principles. This knowledge will be key in learning to become a Trader.

Introduction: Coins and Tokens: Lecture 3: Market Cap and Circulating Supply

requirements: All you need for my course is a modern touch screen cell phone and a pad and pen for taking notes and writing down codes. I use a Galaxy Samsung A Tab also but it is not required. If you write down or have a safe place for all your codes and passwords when using Crypto Applications and Wallets you will make your life in Crypto really easy. If you lose your codes and passwords or they are compromised then your Crypto journey can be rough.
courses.description:
This a beginner course for anyone interested in Cryptocurrency. In this class I will show you different Coins and Tokens and show you how they work. I will also give you a basic understanding of Exchanges and how to use them. We will also go over Wallets and Security for the protection of your Crypto assets. Lastly I will give you a basic understanding of Trading and Trading systems. My class will be easy and I will do lots of Screencasting so can see all the ins and outs of Crypto Trading.


When you finish this class you will know how to Buy and Sell Cryptocurrency. You will know how to Trade for profit. My goal in this is to introduce you to the wider world of Crypto as there are many rocks to turn over and look under in the Crypto space with many gems to be found.
Section 1: We will go over at least 8 types of different Coins and Tokens so that you can familiarize yourself with different technologies in each Coin or Token and know how and what to research with them.
Section 2: We will go over Exchanges and how to use them. In this section we will touch on the benefits of using multiple exchanges.
Section 3: We will go over your internet security and wallet security when dealing with Digital Assets. We will also go over Wallet functionality and different types of Wallets for storing your Digital Assets.
Section 4: In this section we will go over Trading and Trading systems. In this section I will show you Crypto Brokerage by showing you how to Execute Orders. We will also go over basic charting and the use of some basic tools.
target_audience: This Course is for anyone who wants to learn about Cryptocurrency.

courses.description: En el presente curso aprenderán sobre cómo comenzar en el mundo del trading en criptomonedas, partiendo sobre la comprensión de las velas japonesas, para luego comenzar a invertir. Se explican indicadores técnicos para encontrar oportunidades de compra y luego venderlos, tales como medias móviles, RSI (Indice de fuerza relativa), Koncorde y Oscilador Estocastico. Continuando con la optimización del mismo, buscando las medias móviles y RSI adecuadas para cada instrumento financiero. Tambien se complementa con figuras del chartismo, entre ellos se encuentran los pisos, techos, canales, tringulos, hombro – cabeza – hombro y retrocesos de Fibonacci. Todo el curso se encuentra apoyado con practica real, utilizando la plataforma de trading mas famosa del mundo, TradingView. Luego vemos practica integral con todos los indicadores, para que el alumno pueda practicar por su cuenta y pueda salir invirtiendo, encontrando excelentes oportunidades de inversión. Finalizamos el mismo con una clase de money management, en el cual, el alumno podrá saber cuanto capital invertir y arriesgar su capital, a medida que vaya adquiriendo mayor experiencia, podrá mejorar sus trades en base a las operaciones que haya realizado. No es necesario conocimiento previo para poder realizar el curso, se aprende con la teoría y practica que brinda el curso. Destinado a inversores que empiecen de cero como inversores que quieren mejorar o complementar su análisis o trading.

courses.description:
[Wichtig: Dieser Kurs ist für Einsteiger absolut geeignet. Du erlernst alles in einfacher Sprache, sodass alle Anleitungen für dich verständlich sind.]
Kryptowährungen sind in aller Munde – und das nicht erst seit gestern. Dennoch spring der Mainstream erst langsam auf diesen Zug auf. Und das, obwohl die Top-Kryptowährungen im Schnitt erheblich mehr Prozente erzielen als äquivalente Top-Aktien.
Die entscheidende Frage, die du dir also stellen solltest, lautet: Möchtest auch du von Kryptowährungen profitieren?
Dann bist du in diesem Kurs genau richtig.
Denn: In diesem Kurs möchte ich dir kein Gezocke oder irgendeine Form der Spekulation näherbringen. Mein Anliegen ist, dir die optimalen Krypto-Strategien und Kryptowährungen an die Hand zu geben, sodass du auf großteils sicherem Wege gute Renditen erzielst und dein Geld für dich arbeiten lässt.
Dazu musst du natürlich erst einmal in diese Welt eintauchen und verstehen, was Kryptowährungen überhaupt sind, was eine Blockchain auszeichnet und welche Trends es unter den Kryptos gibt.
Anschließend werde ich dir live am Computer zeigen, wie ich Kryptowährungen kaufe und wie du das spielend leicht ebenso tun kannst – und noch 10€ in Bitcoin als Einstiegsbonus generieren kannst.
Und: Du kannst mit jedem Kauf von Kryptowährungen bares Geld in Form von Meilen und Punkten verdienen, die du für Reisen und Alltagseinkäufe nutzen kannst. Weiß kaum jemand, ist aber nützlich.
Bist du also bereit, das Thema "Kryptos" endlich anzugehen und deine Investments aufblühen zu lassen?
Dann schreibe dich in diesen Kurs ein und sichere dir deinen Platz. Ich freue mich, wenn wir gemeinsam deine Finanzen in Angriff nehmen und dein Investmentportfolio in Sachen Kryptowährungen nach Profi-Maß aufbauen.
Natürlich hast du eine lupenreine 30-tägige Geld-zurück-Garantie sowie meinen 24/7-Support per Udemy und WhatsApp / E-Mail.


Bis (hoffentlich) gleich!
Dein Alex Schreiner
target_audience: Jeder, der Kryptowährungen seriös nutzen möchte.

courses.description:
The digital world is advancing at an extraordinary pace, bringing with it a wave of new opportunities that were unimaginable just a few years ago. But as technology evolves, so do the threats that come with it. In order to protect our personal data and digital assets, we must stay one step ahead. Hackers, scams, financial pyramids, phishing attacks, ransomware, malware, data breaches, and more are constantly on the lookout for ways to compromise our hard-earned achievements.
Engaging with the Metaverse, digital environments, cryptocurrencies, web wallets, blockchain, and Web3 applications demands more than curiosity — it requires the right habits and a clear understanding of cybersecurity principles. Only then can we safely unlock the full potential of the internet.
My journey into the world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain began over seven years ago. During that time, I’ve experienced nearly every threat firsthand. Aware of just how dangerous these risks can be, I created this cybersecurity course on Udemy — priced as low as possible to make it accessible to everyone. With it, you can avoid costly mistakes and protect yourself from losing your life savings or the results of years of hard work.

We will guide you through the various types of cryptocurrencies, from Bitcoin, the pioneer, to other altcoins like Ethereum, Litecoin, and more, helping you understand the unique characteristics of each.

The course includes interactive exercises, real-world examples, and live trading demonstrations, ensuring you not only understand the concepts but also how to apply them in actual trading situations. We'll also provide access to up-to-date market insights, trends, and news to help you make well-informed decisions when trading or investing in cryptocurrencies.

My focus is being a friendly, relatable face in Bitcoin because I remember how scary it was first learning about it. There is almost too much information that can overwhelm you.

courses.description:
In diesem Kurs werden wir dich Schritt für Schritt in die Welt der Kryptowährungen einführen. Egal, ob du ein Neuling oder bereits Erfahrung im Bereich der digitalen Währungen hast, wir werden gemeinsam tief in die verschiedenen Aspekte und Grundlagen des Kryptowährungsmarktes eintauchen. Du wirst nicht nur die Funktionsweise von Kryptowährungen verstehen, sondern auch lernen, wie du diese effektiv kaufst, handelst und analysierst.


Bereit, in die Welt der Kryptowährungen einzutauchen und die Grundlagen sowie fortgeschrittene Techniken des Handels zu meistern?
Möchtest du die Unterschiede zwischen Kryptowährungen und traditionellen Finanzmärkten verstehen und wissen, wann du investieren solltest?
Interessierst du dich dafür, wie du die besten Kryptowährungen auswählst und schlechte Projekte erkennst?
Möchtest du erfahren, wie du strategische Entscheidungen im Kryptowährungshandel triffst, um deine Investitionen zu maximieren?


Dann ist dieser Kurs perfekt für dich geeignet!


In diesem umfassenden Kryptowährungskurs wirst du ALLE notwendigen Schritte kennenlernen, um deine Fähigkeiten im Bereich der digitalen Währungen zu entwickeln und zu perfektionieren. Wir werden von den Grundlagen der Kryptowährungen bis hin zur Bewertung und Analyse alle Aspekte ausführlich behandeln.


_______________________________________________________________________________________


Hier bekommst du einen kleinen Vorgeschmack auf das, was dich erwartet:


1. Was sind Kryptowährungen?
Im ersten Abschnitt werden wir dir erklären, was Kryptowährungen sind, wie sie funktionieren und warum sie eine revolutionäre Technologie darstellen. Wir werden die Grundlagen der Blockchain-Technologie und die wichtigsten Merkmale von Kryptowährungen besprechen.


2. Warum in Kryptowährungen investieren?
Du wirst verstehen, warum es sinnvoll sein kann, in Kryptowährungen zu investieren. Wir werden die potenziellen Vorteile und Risiken besprechen und dir zeigen, wie du fundierte Entscheidungen treffen kannst, um deine Investitionen abzusichern.


3. Vergleich zwischen Kryptowährungen und Fiat-Geld
In diesem Abschnitt vergleichen wir die traditionellen Fiat-Währungen mit Kryptowährungen. Du wirst lernen, was Fiat-Geld ist, wie es sich von Kryptowährungen unterscheidet und welche Vorteile die eine oder andere Währung bieten kann.


4. Kryptowährungen vs. Aktienmärkte
Wir werden untersuchen, wie sich Kryptowährungen im Vergleich zu traditionellen Aktienmärkten verhalten. Du wirst lernen, die beiden Anlageformen zu vergleichen und zu verstehen, welche Chancen und Risiken sie jeweils mit sich bringen.


5. Rohstoff-basierte Kryptowährungen
In diesem Abschnitt beschäftigen wir uns mit rohstoff-gestützten Kryptowährungen. Du wirst verstehen, wie diese Kryptowährungen funktionieren und welche Rolle sie im globalen Finanzsystem spielen können.


6. Möglichkeiten, Kryptowährungen zu kaufen
Du wirst lernen, wie du Kryptowährungen sicher und effizient kaufst. Wir werden verschiedene Methoden und Plattformen untersuchen, die dir beim Kauf von Kryptowährungen zur Verfügung stehen.


7. Die Wahl der richtigen Börse
Wir zeigen dir, wie du die richtige Börse auswählst, um Kryptowährungen zu handeln. Du wirst lernen, welche Faktoren du berücksichtigen solltest, um die beste Handelsplattform für deine Bedürfnisse zu finden.


8. Kategorien von Kryptowährungen
In diesem Abschnitt wirst du die verschiedenen Arten von Kryptowährungen kennenlernen. Du wirst verstehen, welche Unterschiede es gibt und wie du diese Informationen nutzen kannst, um kluge Anlageentscheidungen zu treffen.


9. Wie man schlechte Projekte erkennt
Wir konzentrieren uns darauf, wie du Betrug und schlecht konzipierte Kryptowährungsprojekte erkennst. Du wirst lernen, welche Warnsignale du beachten musst, um dein Geld sicher zu investieren.


10. Nützliche Webseiten für Marktanalysen
Wir stellen dir die besten Webseiten und Tools vor, die dir helfen, den Kryptowährungsmarkt zu analysieren. Du wirst lernen, wie du diese Ressourcen effektiv nutzen kannst, um fundierte Investitionsentscheidungen zu treffen.


11. Fundamentalanalyse eines Kryptowährungsprojekts
In diesem Abschnitt gehen wir tief in die Fundamentalanalyse eines Kryptowährungsprojekts ein. Du wirst lernen, wie du die langfristigen Erfolgsaussichten eines Projekts bewerten kannst.


12. Bestimmung des richtigen Einstiegszeitpunkts
Wir untersuchen, wie du den besten Zeitpunkt für den Einstieg in den Kryptowährungsmarkt bestimmen kannst. Du wirst lernen, Marktzyklen zu verstehen und sie zu deinem Vorteil zu nutzen.


13. Bestimmung des Austrittszeitpunkts
Hier lernst du, wann es am besten ist, deine Positionen zu verkaufen. Wir werden dir Strategien vorstellen, die dir helfen, deine Gewinne zu maximieren und Verluste zu minimieren.


14. Weiterführende Schritte nach dem Handel
Im letzten Abschnitt wirst du erfahren, was du nach dem Handel tun solltest. Wir werden über Portfolio-Management, Steuerfragen und weitere wichtige Überlegungen sprechen.


_______________________________________________________________________________________


Bereit, deine Reise in die Welt der Kryptowährungen zu starten? Dann zögere nicht und melde dich jetzt für diesen spannenden Kurs an, um zu erfahren, wie du deine Investitionen in digitale Währungen erfolgreich managen kannst!


Wir freuen uns auf dich!


Danke für dein Vertrauen & Beste Grüße


Alexander & Sascha
target_audience: Investoren und Trader: Sowohl Anfänger als auch erfahrene Investoren, die ihre Handelsstrategien verbessern und fundierte Entscheidungen im Kryptomarkt treffen wollen.
Einsteiger in Kryptowährungen: Personen, die keine oder nur wenig Erfahrung mit Bitcoin, Ethereum und anderen Kryptowährungen haben und fundiertes Wissen aufbauen möchten.

Bitcoin, a modern digital currency regarded as a cryptocurrency, was introduced in 2009 and has proved to be a lucrative investment opportunity. You've come here because you've done some analysis and are beginning to see the value and promise of cryptocurrencies! Since they've never heard about it or don't appreciate it, 99.9% of people do not participate in cryptocurrencies. We will show you the same
Trading Strategies that the Traders at the Montreal Trading Group's Proprietary Trading Firm have applied for the business in this course. This course covers not only the content needed to be accurate in trading but also how to view various forms of data in real-time in order to make the best trading decisions possible. This course will teach you everything you need to know about cryptocurrency, including how to understand Bitcoin, how to set up a safe wallet, and how to purchase Bitcoin and any other cryptocurrency on any exchange. Beginner traders also enter the market without the requisite skills and experience. As a consequence, in the hopes of better returns, they take excessive, costly, and needless risks. This course will give you a highly useful method for trading effectively and confidently in the market.
This course is appropriate for traders of all ages, including beginners, intermediates, and experienced traders. To be good, all you need is an open mind and a burning desire. The material in this course is oriented toward cryptocurrencies, but it can be applied to any kind of equity for day trading and swing trading: Stocks, futures, and commodities are examples of financial instruments.

courses.description:
Cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, NFT's & Altcoins reached mainstream popularity and adoption in 2021. There was a strong focus on accumulating crypto tokens and a fear of missing out on the newest coin. Millions of dollars were spent on NFT's like the Bored Ape Yacht Club collection. There has been a lack of focus on securing cryptocurrency assets and there has been an increase in cryptocurrency theft in 2022. In April 2022 popular Asian pop star Jay chou Jay lost more than $550,000 worth of top-notch NFTs including hired bored ape NFT. My metamask hot wallet was also recently hacked and I lost several thousand dollars of cryptocurrency assets.
This personal loss led me to deep dive and ramp up my cryptocurrency security efforts with the purchase of a cryptocurrency hardware wallet (Ledger Nano X) and learning to secure assets contained in hot wallets like Metamask through the use of a hardware wallet.
In this course you will learn valuable knowledge to protect your cryptocurrencies and NFT's held in hot wallets on multiple blockchains like Ethereum, Polygon, & Binance Smart Chain. Metamask hot wallet is the most popular wallet to connect to decentralized website and apps like Opensea, Uniswap, Rarible, Looksrare

La Tecnología Blockchain ha llegado para revolucionar el mundo que conocemos. El potencial de esta tecnología es tan grande que se espera que la demanda de expertos en este campo ascienda a más del millón para los próximos años.


Y ahora pregúntate si...
¿Quieres conocer la Tecnología Blockchain desde 0 hasta llegar a ser un experto en la materia?

Este es el motivo por el cual he creado este curso. El Bootcamp Completo de Blockchain de cero a experto tiene la ambición de transmitir desde cero todos los conocimientos necesarios para ser un auténtico experto en esta tecnología, aumentando y disparando el conocimiento actual.

requirements: Bu kursu almak için hiçbir ön bilgiye sahip olmanız gerekmemektedir.
courses.description:
Son yıllarda, özellikle de ülkemizde söz konusu kripto-paralar, ICO ve blockchain teknolojileri olduğunda, doğru bilgiye doğru şekilde ulaşabilmek neredeyse imkansız hale geldi.
Her gün medyada dikkat çekme veya karalama amacıyla gerçeklikle ilgisi olmayan art niyetli haberlere rastlıyoruz. Toplumun her kesiminden "sözde kripto-para veya blockchain uzmanları", içselleştirmedikleri daha ne olduğunu bile tam olarak özümseyemedikleri bu konularda bilhassa sosyal medya ve diğer mecralarda yalan/yanlış bilgilerle insanların kafasını karıştırmakta.
Bunlar da yetmezmiş gibi insanlık tarihi boyunca iyi olan, güzel olan ne varsa ona yapışıp; kendi gemisini yüzdürmeye çalışan art niyetli, dolandırıcı kişi ve grupların nispeten yeni gelişmekte olan bu ekosisteme bir zehir gibi yayılarak insanları aldatmaya çalışması da başka bir gerçeklik.
İşte bütün bunlar bizim misyonumuzu belirledi. Biz içerisinde yaşadığımız toplumun aklınızdaki soru işaretlerini ortadan kaldırmak, bulanık suların elimizden geldiğince berraklaşmasını sağlamak için böyle bir eğitimi Udemy aracılığıyla online olarak paylaştık.
Sorularınız olursa da cevaplamaya her zaman hazırız. Sosyal medyadan dilediğiniz zaman bize ulaşabilirsin. Eğitimde görüşmek üzere.
DijitalPara Teknoloji A.Ş. Kurucu Başkanı - Ali Sermet Taşdöğen
target_audience: Bitcoin felsefesini, kripto-paraları ve Blockchain'i doğru kaynaklardan öğrenmek isteyenler.
Kripto-paralara yatırım yapmak isteyen ancak kulaktan doğma bilgiler ile yatırımında ekstra riske girmek istemeyenler.
Madenciliğe (mining) başlamak için hem donanımsal hem finansal yönü olan; ayrıca gerçek hayattan uygulamalı bir eğitim almayı tercih edenler.
Al - sat ile trade yapma konusunda profesyonelce ilerlemeyi hedefleyenler.

Willkommen!: WICHTIG! Verliere nicht dein Geld!!!! Not your Keys, not your Coins
Was wirst du in diesem Kurs lernen?
Start mit dem Problem: Die Notenbanken u: Was bedeutet Lernen & bist auch du ein guter Lerner
Tipps die deine Altcoin Auswahl um den F: Folge den Entwicklern, die wissen welche Altcoins laufen
Bleiben die Entwickler wo sie sind?

Kritik? Der hohe Energieverbrauch von Bitcoin
