courses.title: Beginner's Guide to Bitcoin Altcoins and Cryptocurrencies
courses.bio: A brief introduction to the internet of value and the New Economy
requirements: No knowledge required!
courses.description:
What is Bitcoin? This a question that a lot of people have been asking lately, almost as much as "How do I buy Bitcoin?"
In this course you will learn all about the cryptocurrency market, how they work, the technology behind them and how coins derive value. By the end of this course you will understand the fundamentals of the economic revolution that is blockchain technology.
This course will consist of 8 lectures covering all the basics that you need to know about the cryptocurrency world. By the end of this course you will understand what cryptocurrencies are, how they work, why they have value and how to use them. Furthermore, you will receive a checklist so that you can analyze any other crypto token in the world.
target_audience: Anyone who is curious about Bitcoin or the rapidly growing cryptocurrency industry.

courses.title: Crypto Trading: Intro To Smart Money Analysis
courses.bio: Learn How To Trade Like The Whales
requirements: No Knowledge required.
courses.description: In this course we teach you how to analyze the cryptocurrency market using our smart money analysis concepts. Using those concepts you will be able to identify what the big players are doing in the market using the price action and follow their coattails. You will learn how to spot manipulation in the market and how to take advantage of it. You will also be able to avoid the traps that most retail traders fall into. What you learn in this course will be the exact opposite of what is taught in the retail world. These smart money concepts will not only help you in your crypto trading journey but they will also help you when trading any other market. This course is an introduction on how to trade like the smart money. By going through this course you will learn the basics but there is a lot more that goes into understanding how the whales trade in this market which is why we have the mastery course course for those who want to take their trading to the next level which is only available on our website. The content in that course is too valuable to be put anywhere else.
target_audience: Anyone looking to learn how to trade cryptocurrencies.
Anyone looking to improve their current trading knowledge.
Anyone looking to understand how whales trade.
Anyone looking to understand manipulation in the market.

courses.title: Fintech en México y Látino Ámerica
courses.bio: Innovación tecnológica disruptiva en servicios financieros
objectives: ¿Qué es Fintech?
Ecosistema Fintech a nivel Global, LATAM y México.
Ley Fintech en México. Regulación Fintech. Sandbox
Wallets Digitales y Crowdfunding
Criptoactivos
Tendencias Fintech
Principales empresas Fintech.

Módulo 1: Introducción: ¿Qué es Fintech?: Primeros casos Fintech y origen de la banca en el mundo
Principales ecosistemas Fintech y tamaño de la industria
Ejemplos de Fintechs exitosas en el mundo, en LATAM y en México
Módulo 2: Industria Financiera en México: Origen de la banca en México y LATAM y Primeros antecedentes bancarios en LATAM
¿Qué instituciones conforman el Sistema Financiera Mexicano? y Retos
Módulo 3: Boom tecnológico: tecnologías: ¿Qué es tecnología? y Cuarta Revolución Industrial
Tecnologías exponenciales y principales empresas tecnológicas
Módulo 4: Inclusión financiera en México: ¿Qué es inclusión financiera? Principales datos de inclusión financiera
Panorama Anual de Inclusión Financiera y Datos de inclusión financiera en LATAM
Módulo 5 – parte 1: Innovación y el sect: ¿Qué es innovación?, innovación tecnológica y empresas más innovadoras
Empresas innovadoras en México e innovación financiera
Módulo 6: Ley Fintech: ¿Por qué nace la Ley Fintech? y regulación, supervisión y sanción
Financiamiento Colectivo (IFC): definición, tipos y participantes
Fondos de Pago Electrónico y Activos Virtuales
Módulo 7: Crowdfunding: Instituciones de Fondeo Colectivo – Ley Fintech
Crowdfunding en diferentes partes del mundo y en México
Módulo 8: Wallets digitales: Dinero electrónico y ¿qué son las wallets digitales?
Ejemplos de wallets digitales y Ley Fintech: Instituciones de Fondos de Pago
Módulo 9: Criptomonedas y activos virtua: Criptoactivos: inicios, características y principales criptomonedas

requirements: Tener interés y curiosidad en aprender sobre Fintech
Tener interés y/o curiosidad en innovación tecnológica en servicios financieros
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderán los conceptos necesarios para entender que es Fintech, principales empresas, tendencias y modelos de negocio en México y Latino America. Así mismo aprenderás cuál es la regulación Fintech en México ("Ley Fintech") y cómo se está regulando al sector en Latino America. Se verán temas como Industria Financiera, Ecosistema Fintech, Wallets Digitales, Crowdfunding, Sanbox, entre otros.
Latino Ámerica se ha convertido en la región con mayor potencial y crecimiento en el sector Fintech a nivel global. Por su parte México, Brasil y Colombia lideran la industria Fintech de América Latina. México registra un crecimiento anual del 23% en promedio en el sector desde el 2016 y con casi 500 empresas Fintech, lo que lo ha posicionado como el líder indiscutible para la innovación financiera en América Latina. México no solo se ha convertido en un país atractivo para que las nuevas empresas mexicanas Fintech crezcan, sino que se ha convertido en el país latinoamericano que atrae a un mayor número de empresas extranjeras Fintech.
Se espera que en Latino América el sector Fintech siga en crecimiento y en proceso de consolidación. Lo anterior, ya que existen grandes problemas por resolver a través de la tecnología en el sector financiero tradicional.
target_audience: Profesionistas del sector financiero, abogados, contadores, consultores
Estudiantes universitarios, emprendedores, creativos
Cualquier persona interesa en aprender innovación tecnológica en servicios financieros
Interesados en aprender de Fintech

courses.title: Волны Эллиотта на Крипте.
courses.bio: Почему Волны Эллиотта лучше всего использовать на Крипте?
objectives: Практическое применение Волн Эллиотта на Криптовалюте
Как торговать используя Волны Эллиотта?
Какая криптовалюта даст иксы в 2022 году?
Как определить точку выхода на бычьем рынке?
requirements: Курс подойдет как новичкам, так и профессионалам.
courses.description:
В этом курсе вы узнаете:
Что такое Волны Эллиотта?
Как прогнозировать движения цены с помощью Волн?
Как торговать Криптовалютой, используя мотод Эллиотта?
Почему Волновая Теория Эллиотта отлично работает на Биткоине?
Вы узнаете, где входить, где ставить Стоп Лоссы и Тейк Профиты!
После прохождения курса, Вы поймете природу тех или иных движений на рынке, почему крупные игроки делают развод толпы и как не быть толпой, а примкнуть к тем трейдерам, которые зарабатывают на рынке Криптовалют. Так же Вы узнаете, что входить в третью волну в удлиняющейся третьей волне, - это самый лучший способ заработать на криптовалюте, т.к. Вы входите в самом начале импульсного движения.
В этом курсе я так же делаю особый акцент на Объемы, т.к. именно на них в первую очередь нужно ориентироваться при торговле. Я расскажу Вам как нужно анализировать график цены, где маркет мейкер устраивал ловушки для толпы и куда он будет гнать цену, чтобы забрать Ваши деньги. Зная, где у крупного игрока стоят ловушки, Вы легко сможете их обходить и наконец-то начнете зарабатывать, а не терять деньги на Криптовалюте.
Любое новое движение начинается с импульса. Иногда волновики делают огромную ошибку, полагая, что с "Тройки" может начаться сильный импульс. Это возможно лишь в том случае, если предыдущая 5 волна была усеченной.
Мы так же разберем с Вами:
- Удлинение в третьей волне
- На каком уровне заканчивается 4-я волна после удлиненной 3-ей волны?
- Как торговать после завершения формирования Диагональника в 5-ой волне?
Бонусом я так же записал Видео про волны Вульфа. Это бонусное видео, и Вы удивитесь, как хорошо работают Волны Вульфа на рынке Криптовалют!
target_audience: Трейдеры, которые хотят зарабатывать на Крипте

courses.title: A'dan Z'ye NFT
courses.bio: NFT Koleksiyonu Oluşturma, Kendi Akıllı Sözleşmelerinizi Yaratma, IPFS Depolama ve NFT Hakkında Bilgi Edinin
objectives: NFT, Blockchain, Metaverse vb. konularda bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.
1K, 5k, 10k gibi NFT koleksiyonlarının yazılımla nasıl oluşturulduğunu öğrenecek ve kendi koleksiyonlarınızı oluşturabileceksiniz.
Oluşturduğunuz NFT'lerin/koleksiyonların hangi platformlarda, nasıl yayınlanacağını öğreneceksiniz.
Smart Contract yani Akıllı Sözleşmeler konusunda bilgi sahibi olup kendi akıllı sözleşmelerinizi oluşturabilecek ve yayınlayabileceksiniz.
Akıllı sözleşmeleri websiteye entegre edip NFT/koleksiyonlarını kendi web sitenizden insanların nasıl mint edebileceğini öğreneceksiniz.
Opensea, Foundation, Rarible vb. NFT Marketleri hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.
IPFS hakkında bilgi sahibi olacak, koleksiyonlarınızın nasıl barındırılacağını öğreneceksiniz!
Metamask, Phantom vb. kripto cüzdanları hakkında bilgi sahibi olup, kurulumlarını gerçekleştirebileceksiniz.
Birebir uygulama örnekleriyle NFT ve Akıllı Sözleşme oluşturma, yayınlama konularında deneyim kazanacaksınız.
Kısaca NFT'ye sıfırdan başlayıp kendi NFT/koleksiyonlarınızı oluşturup satış yapmaya ve kazanç sağlamaya başlamak için gerekli tüm bilgileri bulacaksınız.

NFT Marketleri: Opensea | NFT Oluşturma, Listeleme ve Satışa Sunma
NFT/Koleksiyon Oluşturma: Yazılıma Layerları Yükleme ve Bağımlılıkları Kurma
Akıllı Sözleşme Oluşturuyoruz: IDE ile Akıllı Sözleşme Dağıtma: Remix
Akıllı Sözleşme Fonksiyonları ve Mint İşlemleri
Website Oluşturma ve Mint İşlemleri: Build Alma, Website Oluşturma ve Yayınlama

requirements: İnternet bağlantılı bilgisayar/telefon vb.
NFT, Blockchain ve Metaverse dünyasındaki yeni ve kazançlı fırsatları geç olmadan keşfetme becerisi
Hayalindeki dünyayı kurma ve istediği hayatı yaşama isteği
courses.description:
İnternetten kolayca indirilebilen ve milyonlarca dolara alıcı bulabilen bu kripto sanat eserleri hakkında ne bilmek isterdiniz? Bugün dünyada en çok merak edilen şeylerden biri, internetten kolayca indirilebilen bazen size anlamsızca gelebilen bir .jpg yada .gif dosyasından, bazen bir sesten, bazen de videodan ibaret bu dijital işlerin nasıl milyon dolarlara alıcı bulabildiği.

NFT dünyasına adım atarak geleceğine yatırım yapmak isteyen, vizyon sahibi, pasif gelir elde etmek isteyen ve NFT hakında detaylı bilgi edinmek, kendi koleksiyonunu yaratmak ve kendi akıllı sözleşmelerini oluşturup websitesinde yayınlamak isteyen herkes için Türkiye'de alanında ilk olan değerli ve kapsamlı bir kursla karşınızdayım.

Bu kursta sıfırdan başlayarak NFT'nin ne olduğunu anlamaya başlayacak, yazılımlarla kendi NFT/Koleksiyonlarınızı oluşturabilecek, kendi akıllı sözleşmelerinizi oluşturarak NFT dünyasında satış yapmaya başlayabileceksiniz.


Şimdi kendinize ve geleceğe yatırım yapma zamanı! NFT ve Metaverse dünyasındaki yeni ve kazançlı fırsatları geç olmadan keşfetmek istiyorsanız bu kurs tam da size göre!


Sorumluluk Reddi Beyanı: Her sektörde olduğu gibi bu alanda da her zaman risk mevcuttur. Kurs içerisindeki bilgiler hiçbir şekilde yatırım tavsiyesi değildir ve size kazanç yada satış garantisi vermez. Kursta verilen bilgilerle NFT oluşturma, platformlara kayıt olma, mint etme ve akıllı sözleşme oluşturma vb. gibi işlemlerinizin tüm sorumluluğu şahsınıza aittir. Özgün ve kendinize ait bir NFT/Koleksiyon oluşturmanın temelinde yaratıcılık, yetenek vb. gibi bir dizi sanatsal gereklilikler mevcuttur. Bu kursta NFT yaratma yada çizim konusunda bir eğitim yada içerik verilmemektedir.
target_audience: NFT, Blockchain ve Metaverse gibi geleceğin dünyasında detaylı bilgi edinmek isteyen herkes.

courses.title: Blockchain in Financial Services
courses.bio: Distributed Ledger Technology and Blockchain implications in the Financial Services

Why it matters for Financial Services: Why it matters for Financial Services

requirements: Basic knowledge of Financial Services industry
courses.description:
Distributed Ledger and Blockchain technologies present many opportunities that could transform the Financial Services industry and has the potential to drastically alter the way we interact and do business.
Distributed Ledgers technology (DLT) along with other emerging technologies will transform existing business models and create new ones. These changes create a great potential for fintech companies to enter the market by leveraging emerging technologies.
DLT and Blockchain could bring more efficiency, trust and transparency to the industry as well as improve user experience. For example, know your customer (KYC) process by reusing data collected by another trusted institution, accelerating x-border payments by removing intermediaries or by boosting Financial Inclusion based on low cost and highly scalable platforms.
At the same time as any other advanced technology, it comes with its own set of challenges and vulnerabilities.
Many players in Banking, Insurance and Cap Markets industries are currently studying and piloting the technology by running their own Proof of Concepts to confirm business cases for their business-specific.
There is a big raise of startups applying or analyzing DLT and Blockchain technology to solve business or consumer problems across Financial Services. These companies are innovating to push blockchain and crypto toward greater adoption and product maturity.
From this course you will learn the fundamentals of Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technology and why it can be a game-changer for the Financial Services industry. The course will be interesting for students, Financial Services professionals and entrepreneurs
target_audience: Students, Financial Services professionals and entrepreneurs.

courses.bio: Bitcoin is the first engineered monetary system to ever exist! This bestselling course will give a peek into the future.
objectives: Learn what money is, what functions it has and what the 6 properties of sound money are.

requirements: This course does not have any prerequisites. I know learning about bitcoin can be kind of scary because it gets complex. I designed this course as an entry level into bitcoin. It specifically simplifies these complex topics into a way that everyone can understand.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered what Bitcoin is? Are you intrigued by the concept of digital currency and the revolutionary nature of Bitcoin? Look no further than my comprehensive course, "Unlocking the Power of Bitcoin: A Step-by-Step Bitcoin guide." This course is designed to provide you with a thorough understanding of what money is, how money evolves and why bitcoin is the next evolution of money that will shape the future of finance and technology.
In this course, you will embark on a fascinating journey into the origins of money, exploring the history of monetary policy. We will cover everything from what money is to how our current monetary system operates and why bitcoin is such a disruptive technology in the traditional banking world. You can expect to learn about the underlying technology of bitcoin and the Indepth details of how it operates. We will cover the key features of Bitcoin, including mining, wallets, transactions, and the role of cryptography in ensuring its integrity.
Through engaging lectures, real-world examples you will gain an in depth understanding of the economic, social and technological implications of Bitcoin. By the end of this course, you will be equipped with the knowledge and confidence needed to navigate the complex world of cryptocurrency, make informed decisions about Bitcoin, and participate in the digital economy with ease.
Whether you're a novice looking to grasp the basics of Bitcoin or a seasoned Bitcoiner seeking to deepen your knowledge, "Unlocking the Power of Bitcoin: A Step-by-Step Bitcoin guide." offers a valuable learning experience that will empower you to harness the potential of this groundbreaking digital asset. Join us on this exciting exploration of Bitcoin and unlock the keys to the future of money!
target_audience: This course is intended for individuals that are outside the box thinkers. This course will be valuable to anyone wanting to venture into the world of bitcoin and understand what exactly bitcoin is. This course aims to challenge many of the worlds common understandings of what money is and introduce new ideas as to how money works.

courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao nosso super treinamento sobre criptomoedas e como ganhar dinheiro com elas! Se você está em busca de conhecimentos valiosos para aproveitar o potencial financeiro das criptomoedas, blockchain e tecnologias disruptivas, você está no lugar certo. Nosso treinamento é desenvolvido especialmente para aqueles que desejam entender e dominar os conceitos essenciais e as estratégias para obter lucros significativos nesse mercado em constante evolução.
Com o nosso programa, você aprenderá passo a passo como investir, negociar e lucrar com criptomoedas, incluindo Bitcoin, Ethereum, altcoins e muito mais. Abordaremos desde os fundamentos básicos até as técnicas avançadas de análise e gerenciamento de riscos. Nossos instrutores experientes e especialistas no assunto compartilharão insights valiosos sobre o mercado das criptomoedas, a tecnologia blockchain, as oportunidades de investimento e como maximizar seus retornos.
Ao longo do curso, mergulharemos em tópicos essenciais, como a compreensão da tecnologia blockchain e seu impacto revolucionário, a análise das diferentes criptomoedas e seus potenciais de crescimento, as estratégias de compra e venda, a construção de uma carteira diversificada, o uso de plataformas de negociação, e como aproveitar ao máximo as tendências de mercado e os lançamentos de novas criptomoedas.
Além disso, ofereceremos insights sobre como proteger suas criptomoedas de forma segura, exploraremos conceitos como NFTs, e discutiremos o futuro das criptomoedas e seu potencial impacto em diferentes setores da economia.
Nossa abordagem prática e orientada para resultados permitirá que você desenvolva as habilidades necessárias para tomar decisões informadas de investimento e aproveitar as oportunidades de ganhar dinheiro com criptomoedas. Você aprenderá a identificar tendências, utilizar ferramentas de análise técnica e fundamentalista, gerenciar seus investimentos de forma eficiente e entender os aspectos legais e tributários relacionados às criptomoedas.
Não importa se você é um iniciante absoluto ou já tem algum conhecimento prévio, nosso curso é projetado para atender às suas necessidades de aprendizado. Nossa missão é capacitar você a se tornar um investidor confiante e bem-sucedido no mercado de criptomoedas, oferecendo conhecimentos práticos, dicas valiosas e suporte contínuo ao longo de sua jornada.
Prepare-se para explorar as oportunidades emocionantes e lucrativas do mundo das criptomoedas. Junte-se a nós e dê os primeiros passos em direção a uma nova era financeira, onde você pode aproveitar o potencial de ganhos extraordinários com a tecnologia revolucionária das criptomoedas. Invista em si mesmo e no seu futuro financeiro. Inscreva-se agora em nosso curso e comece a trilhar o caminho para o sucesso nos mercados de criptomoedas!
target_audience: Este curso é uma oportunidade imperdível para qualquer pessoa que deseje transformar radicalmente sua vida e alcançar a liberdade financeira através do mercado de criptomoedas. Se você está insatisfeito com seu trabalho, com seus resultados do mercado tradicional, ou está em busca de uma nova oportunidade, este treinamento é especialmente para você. Aqui, você descobrirá estratégias poderosas que podem levar a lucros extraordinários no mercado de criptomoedas, o setor que oferece o maior potencial de crescimento e retorno do mundo. ¿Que aprenderás en este curso?

Description: Welcome to the ultimate guide on educating yourself about indicator strategies in trading! This education set consists of three detailed video courses designed to sharpen your skills and knowledge in leveraging key indicators for making informed trading decisions.
Course 1: "DEMA & Uptrends-Downtrends " In this first course, you will dive into the world of Cryptocurrency and within Double Exponential Moving Average (DEMA) and uptrends-downtrends. Learn how to effectively use DEMA to identify trend reversals, understand market dynamics, and optimize your trading strategy for better results.
Course 2: ''Pivot Standards & Pivot High-Low Points" In the second course, you will explore the power of pivot standards and pivot high-low points in enhancing your trading proficiency in cryptocurrency. Uncover the significance of pivot levels in predicting price movements in crypto trading, setting strategic entry and exit points, and maximizing profitability in your trades.
Course 3: "Market Bias & RSI Divergences" The final course in this set focuses on market bias and Relative Strength Index (RSI) divergences. Develop insights into interpreting market bias, utilizing RSI divergences to spot potential trend reversals in crypto technical analysis & cryptocurrency, and applying advanced strategies to stay ahead in the dynamic world of technical analysis.




Whether you are a beginner looking to build a strong foundation or an experienced trader seeking to refine your skills in technical analysis, wishing to create trading skills with combining trading indicators,  or wishing to develop yourself to make better decision about stock market technical analysis or crypto technical analysis in the world of cryptocurrency. Crypto technical analysis, stock market technical analysis, and many others will be thaught in this education set.  this education set is your gateway to mastering trading indicator strategies and unlocking new opportunities in the stock market, crypto market and forex market.

Enroll now and take your trading game to the next level!

Web3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, NFTs, DeFi, and the Metaverse, would you like to know what they are, and how they are linked? Would you like to be able to explore them and use them safely, but don’t know where to start?
welcome to this course Navigating and Using Web3 – Blockchain for everyday users


Web3, Blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, and the Metaverse have all made headlines in the last few years. With companies like Facebook rebranding to Meta & investing billions in the metaverse, and brands such as Gucci and Nike crushing it with NFTs, it's hard to escape from these terms. But I'm here to help you embrace them instead of escaping them so you can hop on this trend and not get left behind.
The aim of this course is to give you the skills needed to navigate and participate in web3 and use blockchain applications. This course is a practical hands-on course, with lots of demonstrations, along with live online Q&A classes and giveaways.
By the end of this course, you will have a better understanding of web3 & blockchain as we will explain the main concepts in an easy-to-understand way. You will learn how to select and set up a wallet and store digital items safely. You will learn how to use block explorers, how to buy and sell and transfer cryptocurrency, you will gain a better understanding of NFTs and DeFi and you will be equipped with the skills and confidence needed to interact with apps based on blockchain and web3


A Block of Crypto has been grant funded by the Solana Foundation to run this course. This means as a student, you get some extra benefits.  Such as regular live classes on Zoom to answer your questions and monthly NFT giveaways for just practicing what you learn.
target_audience: Beginner user of Web3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency and digital assets

courses.description:
La mineria de criptomonedas es una realidad, las criptomonedas son una realidad, la locura ha llegado tan lejos que a inicios del 2021 el hombre más rico del mundo: Elon Musk invirtió más de 1,500 millones de dólares en Bitcoin ¿Alguna otra razón para creer en el futuro de la economía digital basada en criptomonedas?


¡Bienvenido al curso más completo en minería de criptomonedas como Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin y cualquier altcoin!


¿Has escuchado sobre mineria de Bitcoin, de criptomonedas? ¿Has estado en platicas, foros o investigando por tu cuenta y no entiendes nada? Es muy fácil perderse ente tanta información y en el mundo de las criptomonedas un error puede llevar a mala información y estafas, así que por lo mismo estas en el mejor lugar en el que podrías estar justo ahora, así que ¡Tranquilo!
En este curso aprenderás todo lo necesario para comenzar en la mineria de criptomonedas, cubriremos temas desde los fundamentos de Blockchain, las generaciones como Bitcoin, Ethereum y Cardano, luego aprenderemos que es el Proof of Work, su importancia en la mineria de criptomonedas y en Bitcoin; continuaremos con los Hash  para después entrar en los equipos de mineria criptomonedas y conocer las pools de mineria como Antpool, Nanopool, Prohashing, Slushpool, Nicehash y mucho mas; veremos también la función de las Wallets de criptomonedas como Trezor, Exodus, Trust Wallet y finalmente tendremos una introducción a lo que existe más allá de la mineria de criptomonedas en Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, etc.


Objetivo final del curso
Al final del curso el objetivo es que te encuentres con la confianza de no perder la oportunidad de entrar al mundo de las criptomonedas, ya no estarás perdido en el tema, conocerás toda la ruta sobre minería de criptomonedas de 0 a 100 y tus decisiones en criptomonedas valdrán mucho más de lo que invertiste en este curso.


¿Qué mas tendrá este curso de Mineria de Criptomonedas?
Soporte continuo de la comunidad de estudiantes y del instructor
Actualizaciones continuas del curso con información de calidad y de ultimo momento
Acceso de por vida, una vez dentro del curso siempre lo podrás consultar tanto como quieras
Garantía de 30 días de rembolso, así que no tienes nada que temer ni perder, lanzate de una vez por todas al mundo de la mineria de criptomonedas


¿Porqué este curso vale tu tiempo?
En el mundo de las criptomonedas el tiempo es dinero, es lo más valioso que tenemos así que es más que importante administrarlo bien y es por eso que yo te he ayudado a juntar horas, días y meses de investigación en criptomonedas, blockchain, wallets, pools de mineria y equipos de mineria para que puedas en un solo curso practico aprender todo.

courses.title: Kriptovalute za početnike
courses.bio: praktični koraci
objectives: Što su kriptovalute i kako se razlikuju od klasičnog novca
Privatni i javni ključevi, odgovornost i sigurnost u radu s kriptovalutama
Što su kriptonovčanici, kojih sve vrsta ih ima, kako ih otvoriti i koristiti
Gdje i kako kupiti kriptovalutu - kriptomjenjačnice
Transfer kriptosredstava s mjenjačnice u svoj novčanik
Plaćanje i primanje kriptovaluta iz raznih novčanika

Povijest i budućnost kriptovaluta: Kriptovalute kao pokretač osobnih i društvenih promjena
Kriptonovčanici: Osobna odgovornost i sigurnost u baratanju kriptovalutama
Praksa s kriptonovčanicima: Druge mreže s kojima radi Metamask (primjer Polygon)
Kriptomjenjačnice: Registracija na kriptomjenjačnice, KYC i 2F sigurnost
Ako nemate ključeve, nemate ni novčiće
Kriptopraksa: Transfer Matica s Metamaska na Ledger
Slanje XLM-a preko Stellar web novčanika
Šitala Devi, Open Sea i kupovina i prodaja NFT-ova
Objašnjenje: Billfodl i riječi od četiri slova

requirements: Za svladavanje tečaja nije potrebno predznanje o kriptovalutama. Potrebne su samo osnovne vještine u radu s računalom i pametnim telefonom.
Većina kriptonovčanika su zapravo aplikacije koje možete preuzeti besplatno na odgovarajućim stranicama. Na tečaju ćete naučiti kako upotrebljavati nekoliko takvih novčanika.

Postoje i takozvani "hladni" novčanici (zasebni uređaji) koje morate kupiti. Tokom tečaja ćete naučiti kako raditi s Ledger Nano hladnim kriptonovčanicima. Taj dio tečaja (nekoliko lekcija) ima smisla jedino ako posjedujete Ledger Nano S ili Ledger Nano X uređaj.
Ovo NIJE tečaj na kojom ćete saznati u koju krptovalutu investirati niti ne obuhvaća financijske savjete.

Ako želite kupiti nešto kriptovalute morat ćete to učiniti preko posrednika, takozvanih kriptomjenjačnica. Tokom tečaja ćete naučiti kako to napraviti na najsigurniji mogući način na nekoliko najpoznatijih mjenjačnica: Coinbase, Binance i Bitrex. Registracija na te mjenjačnice podrazumijeva otvaranje računa na svoje ime, prolazak kroz KYC proceduru ("upoznavanje klijena") i sve zahtjeve koje pred financijske institucije postavljaju regulatorna tijela.
courses.description:
Čuli ste za kriptovalute, zar ne? Možda ste čuli da su mnogi ljudi zaradili mnogo novaca na njima, ali i da su mnogi jednako tko izgubili? Možda je do vas došao glas da se radi o vrlo naprednoj tehnologiji koja na neki način oblikuje budućnost?
Ako vas zanima o čemu se radi i kako na ispravan način ući u svijet kriptovaluta, onda je ovo tečaj za vas!
Da biste upotrebljavali kriptovalute potrebno vam je samo malo dobre volje za svladavnje osnova, a u načelu preduvijet za to je jedino korištenje računala. Ako se snalazite sa svojim mailovima, na društvenim mrežama ili aplikacijom na mobitelu kojom komunicirate sa svojom bankom, nema nikakvog problema da jednako tako uspješno kupujete, prodajete ili čuvate kriptovalute. Naravno, i za kriptovalute ćete koristiti posebne aplikacije (novčanike) koje su besplatne (osim ako se ne radi o zasebnim uređajima, takozvanim "tvrdim novčanicima") a za kupnju kritovaluta koristiti specijalizirane mjenjačnice na kojima možete otvoriti svoj račun.
Cilj ovog tečaja je da se u najkraćem mogućem vremenu osoposobite upravo za to. Bit će nešto teorije, ali u onoj mjeri u kojoj ju laici poput vas ili mene mogu razumjeti. Ona je neophodna za stvaranje opće slike koja zauzvrat omogućava razumijevanje i primjenu konkretnih postupaka.
U praksi čete naučiti:
• što su kriptovalute i kako se održavaju te kakvih sve vrsta kriptovaluta ima
• što su javni i privatni ključevi i kako treba s njima postupati (sigurnost i odgovornost)
• što su to kriptomjenjačnice i kako na njima kupiti kriptovalutu pomoću svoje kreditne kartice ili bankovnim transferom.
• što su kripto „novčanici“, kakvih sve vrsta ih ima, gdje ih i kako nabaviti te koji od njih su u praksi nasigurniji
• kako prepoznati prave kriptoprojekte od onih sumnjivih, odnosno kako prepoznati prevare u tom području


Nakon tečaja bit ćete praktično osposobljeni za korištenje kriptovaluta. Ovo je tečaj za početnike, pa nećemo ulaziti u detalje trgovanja kriptovalutama, ali ćemo spomenuti takozvane decentralizirane finacijske sustave, trenutno popularno područje NFT-a i metasvemira.
Nakon ovog tečaja za početnike bit ćete osposobljeni za plaćanje kriptovalutama i čuvanje kriptovaluta ukoliko ste zainteresirani za njihov investicijski dio.
target_audience: Tečaj je namjenjen svakome tko želi saznati kako u praksi raditi s kriptovalutama, odakle početi, gdje ih kupiti i kako ih čuvati.

requirements: Necessário ser usuário padrão de computador e Internet. Não é necessário conhecimentos avançados. Aprenderá no curso tudo que for necessário.
courses.description:
Curso prático (hands on) que ensina desde a fazer escolhas de componentes para um equipamento de mineração de criptomoedas até a montar, configurar e minerar várias criptomoedas.


Caso você tenha pouco ou nenhum conhecimento sobre criptomoedas visite a playlists do meu canal do youtube "Dinheiro Digital - Criptomoedas para Iniciantes" onde você encontrará  diversos mini cursos gratuitos.


Abaixo a relação de tópicos apresentados no curso.


MÓDULO DE INTRODUÇÃO E PLANEJAMENTO


Aula 1
- Como funciona a mineração.
- Como descobrir quais as moedas que podem ser mineradas e quais as melhores para minerar.


Aula 2
- Simuladores para saber qual o lucro que cada GPU dá antes de comprar uma.
- Onde comprar ASICs de mineração e simular os lucros.


Aula 3
- Custo/benefício de cada placa de vídeo (GPU).
- Tempo necessário minerando para um equipamento de mineração se pagar.
- Componentes necessário para montar uma RIG de mineração.
- Custo dos componentes para se montar uma RIG de mineração.


Aula 4
- Quais os componentes necessários para montar a RIG de mineração.
- Como escolher memória e processador correto para a placa mãe.
- Onde comprar mais barato os componentes para montar uma RIG de mineração.


Aula 5
- Verificando os componentes corretos suportados pela placa mãe escolhida.
- Verificando o manual da placa mãe para auxiliar na montagem da RIG.


Aula 6
- Verificando e separando os componentes para montar a RIG de mineração.


MÓDULO DE MONTAGEM DO EQUIPAMENTO


Aula 7
- Ligando o processador, o SSD, a memória RAM e o botão on-off na placa mãe.


Aula 8
- Ligando as placas de vídeo (GPUs) na placa mãe.
- Fazendo a alimentação elétrica da RIG com uma fonte de 1000w.


Aula 9
- Adicionando novas placas de vídeo (GPUs) na RIG.


Aula 10
- Expandindo a RIG unindo 2 fontes de 1000W como se fossem uma, via adaptador.
- Adicionando novas placas de vídeo GPUs.


MÓDULO DE CONFIGURAÇÃO


Aula 11
- Testando a RIG depois de montada.
- Acessando o SETUP (BIOS) para ver/ajustar propriedades da placa mãe.


Aula 12
- Gerando um pen drive de instalação do Windows para instalar na RIG.


Aula 13


- Instalação do Windows 10 na RIG.


Aula 14
- Instalação dos drivers das placas de vídeo (GPUs).
- Instalação do MSIAfterburner.


Aula 15
- Atualização do Windows 10.
- Instalação do driver do chipset da placa mãe.
- Criação de memória virtual.


MÓDULO DE MINERAÇÃO


Aula 16
- Minerando na pool da Nicehash e recebendo em Bitcoin.


Aula 17
- Criação de conta de mineração na pool da Binance.
- Criação de conta gratuita no site do Hive OS.
- Criação do pen drive com a última versão o Hive OS.
- Configuração da mineração pelo site do Hive OS.
- Inicialização da RIG via pen drive com Hive OS e acompanhamento da mineração.


Aula 18
- Overclock nas placas de vídeo via Hive OS para melhorar o desempenho da mineração.


Aula 19
- Minerando Raven (RVN) diretamente para uma wallet na Exchange Binance usando o software de mineração kawpowminer.


Aula 20
- Minerando ETH na pool da Binance, no Windows 10, usando o software de mineração GMiner.


Aula 21
- Overclock nas placas de vídeo (GPUs) usando o software MSIAfterburner no Windows 10.


Aula 22


- Recebendo o resultado da mineração na conta bancária.


Conteúdo adicional
- Onde saber como se minera outras dezenas de criptomoedas.
- Video tutorial mostrando como montar uma RIG de mineração passo a passo utilizando a placa mãe ASUS B250 Mining Expert e GPUs NVIDIA GTX 1080 Ti

courses.description:
BU EĞİTİMİN İÇERİĞİNİ BİTCOİN VE BORSA HAKKINDA DÜZENLİ MÜFREDAT HALİNE GETİRİP SİZLERLE PAYLAŞIYORUM. EN DÜŞÜK FİYATLA SATIŞA SUNULMUŞTUR. AYRICA PDF OLARAK HAZIRLADIĞIM BORSA DÖKÜMANINA DA ULAŞABİLECEK VE DİLEDİĞİNİZ SORULARI BANA BURADAN SORABİLECEKSİNİZ.
Bu eğitim İsmail Çimen tarafından piyasaya yeni giren veya girecek arkadaşlar için hazırlanmıştır. Bu eğitimle bitcoin ve altcoinlerin çıkmasını beklemenize gerek kalmadan bir sarraf edasıyla sürekli btc birikimi yapabileceksiniz. Sadece bir uygulama uzaktasınız. Hayırlı ve bol kazançlar dilerim.
Stresten uzak. Endişeden uzak. Paradan uzak. Patrondan uzak. Büyük Ailemiz ve Arkadaşlarımızla birlikte yaşayacağımız bir dünya organizasyonu kuruyoruz ve sevdiğimiz işi yapıyoruz.
2012 yılından bugüne network marketing yapıyorum, çok özel eğitim etkinliklerde bulundum ve tabi ki  100.000’den fazla kişiyle bilgi ve deneyimlerimi  paylaştım.
Blockchain teknolojisi, herkesin kodlarını görebildiği, bilgisayarına indirebildiği, ücretsiz kullanabildiği ve üzerine fonksiyonel uygulamalar geliştirebildiği, adına ’Değerlerin interneti’ diyebileceğimiz bir protokol.
Blockchain teknolojisi sayesinde devletlere, şirketlere veya kişilere, onların dürüst olacağı, iyi niyetli olacağı, güvenilir olacağı veya şeffaf olacağı konusunda güvenmemize gerek kalmayacak. Tüm işlemlerin toparlanıp blok şeklinde peş peşe kaydedildiği, sistemin devamlılığını sağlayan bilgisayarların tüm bu işlemleri onaylamadan sisteme dahil etmediği ve isteyen herkesin sisteme bilgisayarının işlemci gücü ile katılabildiği, katılırken de kazanç sağladığı global bir kayıt defteri uygulamasıdır Blockchain.
Blockchain uygulamaları her zaman bir kripto-para halini almayabilir; kurumsal veya kamusal uygulamalarda bile kullanılabilir.
Blockchain teknolojisinin potansiyeli üzerine düşündükçe, Türkiye’de bütünsel olarak hazırlanmış bir blockchain ve kripto-para eğitiminin olmadığını görmek beni bu eğitim programını hazırlamaya itti.
Kripto-paralarla ilgilenmiyorsanız bile Blockchain teknolojisinin global güveni oluşturmak için hangi elemanları kullandığını öğrenmek ve binlerce yıllık finansal öğrenimleri nasıl yeniden yorumladığını görmek için bile bu eğitime katılabilirsiniz.
Sorularınız için: udemy mesaj sistemini veya telegram grubumu kullanabilirsiniz.
Beni sosyal medya kanallarımda takip için. @ismailcimencom

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos
courses.description:
Esse curso vai te ensinar a analisar criptomoedas, para encontrar as melhores oportunidades de mercado e aumentar os seus retornos.  Ao longo do curso o investidor também aprenderá diversas estratégias para proteger seus investimentos e buscar maiores resultados.


O conteúdo será dividido em: alocação (parte 1) e análise (parte 2).
Na parte 1, entenderemos como planejar os investimentos, principais estratégias, quando comprar e quando vender, renda passiva, e claro, as principais formas de potencializar os ganhos e se proteger.
Na parte 2, começaremos o processo de análise, entendendo todos os passos para conhecer os bons e os maus ativos, além de aprender como antecipar altas e não cair em golpes.


Portanto, objetivo deste curso é ensinar os investidores a pensar por conta própria. Ao concluí-lo, você saberá encontrar oportunidades, analisar projetos, decidir a hora certa de comprar e vender, proteger seu capital, e muito mais.


E não se esqueça! Existem muitas oportunidades neste novo mercado, porém muitos riscos também, desde golpes e pirâmides até mesmo "falsos especialistas". Por conta disso, o investidor não pode depender de "recomendações" e deve sempre saber o que está fazendo e quais ativos está investindo.


Faça parte do mercado que mais cresce no mundo! Nos vemos no curso
target_audience: Para todo investidor, ou possível investidor, de criptomoedas que busca melhorar seus retornos.

courses.description:
Let's cut through all the noise and jargon associated with crypto and blockchain technology! In this course, we will take you from zero to hero so you can understand what crypto is, how it works, and how it will shake up our existing financial system! There are several different blockchains in the crypto space. In this course, we will focus on the Solana blockchain, as it is one of the fastest, cheapest and most user-friendly blockchains with a thriving community.


We will cover the basics of cryptocurrency, what is is and what we can do with it. Once that's covered, we're going to look at the Solana blockchain in more detail and put the theory into practice. By the end of this course, you should have a good understanding of crypto, the terminology, and you should be able to navigate the Solana Blockchain. You'll be all set up and ready to go! We will also send a free NFT to your crypto wallet, which you will learn how to set up during this course!


So whether you're a total newbie or you're wanting to explore some more of Solana's capabilities, this course is for you. So dive in, and let's get started!

courses.description:
This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the world of cryptocurrency, exploring its foundational principles, technologies, and real-world applications. Students will gain an in-depth understanding of how digital currencies, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, work, and how blockchain technology underpins these systems. The course begins with an overview of the history of money and the evolution of digital currencies, providing context for the emergence of decentralized finance.
Students will explore the core concepts of cryptocurrency, including cryptographic principles, decentralization, mining, consensus mechanisms, and the role of blockchain in securing transactions. They will also examine the various types of cryptocurrencies and tokens, along with their respective use cases, such as smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and non-fungible tokens (NFTs).
The course will also cover the broader ecosystem of cryptocurrency, including exchanges, wallets, and the regulatory landscape. Participants will learn about the risks and opportunities in the crypto market, including volatility, security challenges, and the potential for financial innovation. The course will delve into key trends such as decentralized finance (DeFi), stablecoins, and the growing interest in Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs).
Through case studies and real-world examples, students will understand how cryptocurrencies are being adopted in various industries, from finance and healthcare to gaming and supply chain management. Additionally, the course will provide practical guidance on how to safely buy, store, and trade cryptocurrencies.
By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in cryptocurrency and blockchain technology, enabling them to critically assess the impact of these innovations on the future of finance and global economies. This course is ideal for anyone interested in entering the world of cryptocurrency or enhancing their understanding of this rapidly evolving field.
target_audience: Beginners interested in learning about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.
Investors looking to understand the fundamentals of crypto assets before entering the market.
Tech enthusiasts curious about emerging technologies like blockchain and decentralized finance (DeFi).
Individuals seeking to diversify their investment portfolio with digital assets.
Entrepreneurs interested in incorporating cryptocurrencies into their business models.
Students studying finance, economics, or technology who want to explore digital currencies.
Professionals in the financial industry wanting to expand their knowledge of crypto markets.
People interested in securing their digital assets and learning about crypto wallets and security.
Anyone who wants to stay informed about the future of money and digital payments.
Individuals who want to learn how to use and trade cryptocurrencies safely and effectively.
This course is designed for anyone eager to understand and navigate the world of cryptocurrencies, whether for personal interest, investment, or career growth.

courses.description:
Depuis 2009, l’arrivée de la technologie Blockchain et des cryptomonnaies représente une évolution remarquable dans l’histoire d’Internet, ce qui révolutionné plusieurs domaines.
Cette formation sur les cryptomonnaies s’adresse à toute les personnes ayant les bases dans les cryptos, la DEFI, et les NFT et voulant approfondir leurs connaissances. Avec cette formation l'univers des cryptomonnaies et des NFT n'aura plus aucun secret pour vous.
Grâce à cette formation avancé sur les cryptomonnaies, vous allez pouvoir approfondir vos connaissances sur le Bitcoin et les Altcoins. Durant cette formation sur les cryptomonnaies, le formateur vous présentera plusieurs démonstrations pratiques et l'utilisation de logiciels avancés.
Vous allez apprendre à augmenter vos rendements dans la DEFI ainsi que les assurer. Une vidéo est entièrement consacrée à la création de boucle sur le protocole AAVE. Une autre à l'utilisation du Liquid Staking et des assurances dans la DEFI.
Ensemble nous allons décrypter l'univers avancé des NFT. Comment monitorer le Floor price des NFT ? Comment trouver les futurs projets tendance NFT ?
Vous voulez monitorer vos portefeuilles Crypto ? Grâce à cette formation vous allez apprendre à monitorer vos wallets sur la blockchain Ethereum , Polygon, Binance Smart Chain et Solana.
Vous cherchez plutôt des stratégies d'investissement . Nous verrons deux stratégies d'investissement avancé au cours de cette formation comme par exemple le rééquilibrage automatique.
Vous aimez la technique ? Nous plongerons ensemble au cœur dû Lightning Network , un Layer 2 sur Bitcoin !
Que vous traitiez des cryptos, du Forex, des actions, des matières premières, des options, des ETF... ce cours vous donnera une vue complète sur le trading de futures. Nous verrons également une stratégie avancé pour faire de l'arbitrage dans la DEFI avec l'utilisation de flash loans !
Enfin nous parlerons de sécurité dans le monde des Cryptomonnaies, comme le Multisig, l'utilisation d'une Yubikey, la révocation de smartcontracts . Comment fonctionne une Dust Attack et comment s'en protéger.

courses.title: Krypto Academy - Beginner zum Tradingprofi (Kryptowährungen)
courses.bio: Lerne in wenigen Tagen alles über Kryptowährungen wie Bitcoin & Altcoins. Du erhältst eine kompetente Komplettanleitung!
objectives: Grundverständnis Kryptowährungen, 1:1 Anleitungen wie man sich auf allen gängigen Plattformen anmeldet, Tradingstrategien, Informationsbeschaffung
Am Ende des Kurses, bist du in der Lage sofort und mit eigenem Verständnis erfolgreich mit Kryptowährungen zu handeln

Verständnis von BTC und Alternativwährun: Proof of work und Proof of stake erklärt

requirements: Du benötigst keine Vorkenntnisse! Einfach anschauen, nachmachen und selbst durchstarten.
Essentiell sind ein PC-Zugang mit Internetanschluss sowie etwas Geld um handeln zu können (die Menge liegt in deinem eigenen Ermessen)
courses.description:
Beschreibung

Du bist auf der Suche nach einer einfachen und schnellen Aufklärung sowie Einführung, in die Welt der Kryptowährungen?
Du hast es satt, auf unterschiedlichen Kanälen und zum Teil Englisch-Sprachigen Webseiten dir Halbwahrheiten anzuhören?
Vertrauen und Sicherheit!
Dann heiße ich dich hiermit herzlich Willkommen zur Krypto Academy! Dann hier bist du genau richtig! Uns liegt es sehr am Herzen das du sicher und vor allem erfolgreich mit Kryptowährungen handeln kannst.
Deswegen begleiten wir dich, in einem der umfangreichsten Kryptowährungskurse, komplett durch alle relevanten Themen die mit Kryptowährungen zu tun haben.
Wir nehmen dich an die Hand und bewältigen alle wichtigen Aufgaben gemeinsam. Du erhältst sogar 365 Tage im Jahr kostenlosen Support (nur für begrenzte Zeit), indem du in unsere geschlossene Whatsapp-Gruppe kommst. Somit sind wir immer für dich da und helfen dir wo es nur geht.


Unser komplettes Wissen für dich!
In über 12 Modulen, die in logischer Reihenfolge aufgebaut sind, lernst du viel über die Entstehung und Funktion der Kryptowährungen, um ein gewisses Grundverständnis zu schaffen. Du wirst innerhalb weniger Minuten verstehen was die Blockchain ist und wie sie funktioniert -> alles leicht mit Präsentationen und Bildern erklärt.


1:1 Praxisanleitungen
Außerdem gehe ich mit dir alle Registrierungen auf allen bekannten Plattformen durch. Du siehst alles live 1:1 auf meinem Screen und kannst es zeitgleich nachmachen. Neben der Registrierung zeige ich dir nicht nur auf einer Plattform, wie in anderen Kursen, sondern auf allen gängigen Plattformen wie man sich dort erfolgreich registriert und auch handelt.
ich zeige dir wie du Scam-Coins erkennst und gute Kryptowährungen aussuchen kannst. Du erfährst welche Strategien es gibt und welche Sinn machen.
Kryptowährungen sicher aufbewahren
Die Aufbewahrung deiner Coins sollte nicht zu kurz kommen, deswegen zeige ich dir, wie du deine Coins sicher vor Dieben und Hackern beschützt.
Thema Steuer und Auszahlung
Nachdem du erfolgreich getradet hast, kommt auch irgendwann eventuell die Steuer! Wie, wann und ob überhaupt erkläre ich dir!
Ich zeige dir wie du kinderleicht deine Kryptowährungen wieder in € umwandeln kannst.
ICO
Schon mal was von ICO gehört? Ich erkläre dir was du hierzu wissen musst.
BONUS -> Exkurs Mining
Du bekommst aktuell noch ein BONUS-Modul geschenkt. Ich verrate dir welche ersten Schritte notwendig sind, damit du selbst anfangen kannst zu minen!


Die Facts:
12 Module die wirklich alle Themenbereiche abdecken
alles leicht und verständlich erklärt
1:1 Anleitungen zum nachmachen
365 Tage-Support mit persönlicher Whatsapp-Gruppe
Zugang zur geschlossenen Kryptogeflüstergruppe auf Facebook


Werde noch heute ein Teil der Krypto Academy!
Viel Spaß und ein erfolgreiches Trading wünscht euch,


Andreas May und die Krypto Academy
target_audience: An alle die sich für Kryptowährungen interessieren und alles gebündelt leicht und vor allem verständlich erklärt haben möchten

Binance Vadeli İşlemler İçin Kapsamlı Alım Satım Rehberi
Başlangıç seviyesinde kullanıcılar için A'dan Z'ye her şeyi öğrenebileceğiniz bu kursu siz değerli öğrencilerim için hazırladım. Borsada 10 yıldır faaliyet göstermekte olup TL bazında milyon kazanç elde ettim ve çoğu zamanda binlerce dolar para kaybettim. Gelinen süreçte beni en çok yoran ise kendi kendime öğrenme süreci oldu. Bu süreçte eşime, çocuğuma ve tüm aile fertlerime bana her konu ve konumda göstermiş oldukları tahammülden ötürü teşekkür ediyorum. Sizlere bu kursu hazırlamamın sebebi geçmiş olduğum tüm bu süreci kayda alarak ekranda anlatmak istemem ve benim yapmış olduğum aynı hataları yapmamanız açısından bir uyarı niteliğindedir. Borsada gerçekten para kazanabilirsiniz ve -olabilir- para kaybedebilirsiniz ama en önemlisi sizin zihinsel açıdan dinç olarak sağ salim ayakta kalabilmenizdir. Çelik gibi bir iradeye sahip olmalısınız. Bu ticareti yapabilirsiniz. Sadece çalışın ve öğrenmeye gayret gösterin! Hatalarınızdan ders alın ve adım adım ilerleyin. Gerisi kendiliğinden olacaktır...

courses.bio: أقصر دورة في هذه المنصة تتحدث عن موضوع العملات الرقمية المشفرة
objectives: تعريف العملات الرقمية المشفرة ومشاريعها
شرح مفهوم المنصة والمحفظة

requirements: ورقة وقلم لتسجيل الملاحظات
courses.description:
هذه الدورة مقدمة من مؤسسة د.سام للخدمات الاستشارية والتعليمية التابعة لمجموعة البسام. وهي من إعداد أ.بسام موسى. وهذه الدورة هي عصارة جهود وخبرات لمدة ساعات وايام وليالي طويلة في عام ٢٠٢١م
هذه أقصر دورة في هذه المنصة تتحدث عن موضوع العملات الرقمية المشفرة فهي دورة مختصرة أتحدث فيها عن تجربتي المتواضعة في هذا السوق واشارك تجربتي معكم. انصحكم بمتابعة هذه الدورة قبل أن تبدأوا في شراء العملات لانها ستساعدكم على اتخاذ القرار إما بدخول هذا السوق أو تركه. في هذه الدورة اعطيكم نبذة مختصرة عن العملات الرقمية المشفرة ومشاريعها، وطرق الحصول عليها كما اشرح المفاهيم الاساسية مثل المنصة والمحفظة و اوضح لكم اسباب عدم اسقرار السوق بالإضافة إلى مواضيع مهمة ذات علاقة.


نبذة عن المدرب:
أ. بسام هو متخصص في اللغات، مدرّس معتمد، مترجم محترف، مدرب تطوير مهني، ومستشار تربوي وتعليمي بخبرة تمتد لأكثر من 15 عامًا في مجالات التعليم والتدريب وتصميم المناهج. يحمل شهادة بكالوريوس في التربية والآداب – قسم اللغة الإنجليزية، بالإضافة إلى دبلوم في اللغة الإنجليزية التجارية، ما منحه قاعدة قوية في تقديم المعرفة بأسلوب يجمع بين الأكاديمية والتطبيق العملي.


عمل أ. بسام في عدد من أبرز المعاهد والمراكز التدريبية المحلية والدولية، وكان عنصرًا فاعلًا في تطويرها ورفع كفاءتها، من بينها: مركز نوران، المعهد الكندي، المعهد الفرنسي الأمريكي، نيوهورايزن، الجامعة اللبنانية، ومركز أبديت للتدريب والاستشارات. خلال مسيرته المهنية، قام بتدريب أكثر من 9,000 متعلم في مجالات متعددة، لاسيما اللغة الإنجليزية، كما أسهم في تأهيل أكثر من 35 معلمًا وتأهيلهم لمجال التدريس الاحترافي.


من أبرز إنجازاته تصميم منهج متخصص لصالح المعهد الوطني للعلوم الإدارية في محافظة عدن، بما يتوافق مع معايير الجودة والكفاءة التعليمية. كما عمل في عدد من المنظمات الدولية غير الحكومية، منها: منظمة الهجرة الدولية (IOM)، المجلس الدنماركي لمساندة اللاجئين (DRC)، هيئة الأعمال الخيرية (Human Appeal International)، ومنظمة ميرسي كور الأمريكية (Mercy Corps)، حيث شغل مناصب قيادية في برامج كبرى تعنى بالتعليم والتنمية المجتمعية.


حاليًا، يُقدم أ. بسام دورات تدريبية احترافية بالتعاون مع جهات ومؤسسات تعليمية متعددة، كما ينشر محتواه عبر منصات تعليمية عالمية، ويشرف على عمل مجموعة البسام في مجالات التدريب والتطوير.
وبفضل الله، فقد تجاوز عدد الطلاب المسجلين في دوراته على منصة يوديمي أكثر من 16,000 طالب حتى مايو 2025، مما يعكس مدى الثقة والتقدير الذي يحظى به من المتعلمين حول العالم.
target_audience: من يريد الحصول على معلومات حول العملات الرقمية المشفرة في وقت قصير جداً
من ليس لديه أي فكرة حول العملات الرقمية المشفرة
الأشخاص الذين يريدون دخول سوق العملات الرقمية المشفرة ولا يعرفون الكيفية
المحتارون في قرار دخول سوق العملات الرقمية المشفرة

courses.title: The Basics of Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency and NFTs
courses.bio: Learn key concepts of Bitcoin, Cryptocurrencies and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) - as easy as 1,2,3!

Welcome to the course!: Welcome to The Basics of Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency and NFTs!
A look at what lies ahead...
Get Started With Some Free bitcoin
BLOCK 1: Bitcoin: What we will cover in this block
Why has Bitcoin changed the world?
BLOCK 2: Cryptocurrency: What we will cover in this block.
BLOCK 3: NFTs: What we will cover in this block.

requirements: This course has no prerequisites and is ideal for anyone who wants to learn about Bitcoin, Cryptocurrencies and NFT Tokens!
courses.description:
Do you want to learn the basics of Bitcoin?
Are you interested in knowing about the cryptocurrency market which has Billions of dollars traded worldwide daily?
Would you like to understand what Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) are and why they are so valuable?
If the answer to any of these questions is Yes, then this course is for you!
The terms Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency and NFT Tokens are becoming more and more present in all of our lives and blockchain, the underlying technology that makes it all possible,  is one of the most valuable technologies that has ever existed.

It's well known by now that Bitcoin and the cryptocurrency revolution are here, and that together with NFTs, they are generating billions of dollars in wealth worldwide.

This course has been designed to introduce anyone to key basics concepts of Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency and NFT Tokens and you do not need any previous experience to understand the contents of this course.

To make the course easy for anyone at any level of experience, the course has been divided into three blocks:


BLOCK 1 - Bitcoin: You will learn basic concepts of the most valuable cryptocurrency on the market: Bitcoin.
BLOCK 2 - Cryptocurrencies: You will learn what cryptocurrencies are and why they are so popular worldwide.
BLOCK 3 - NFT Tokens: You will be introduced to the world of NFT Tokens and you will see their potential.


Once you finish the course you will have learned very important, basic concepts and essential elements of Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency and NFT Tokens.

What are you wating for? We look forward to seeing you and sharing this valuable information with you.

Enroll and join us in class to learn about Bitcoin, cryptocurrency and NFTs!


See you inside!


George Levy and Joan Amengual
target_audience: People interested in learning about Bitcoin, Cryptocurrencies and NFT Tokens.

courses.title: Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas
courses.bio: Aprenda o que é a tecnologia blockchain, o que são criptomoedas e como utilizar a tecnologia para novos negócios
objectives: Conceitos técnicos básicos sobre blockchain
Conceitos técnicos básicos sobre criptomoedas
Como garantir a segurança de criptomoedas
Como aplicar a tecnologia blockchain em negócios de sucesso
requirements: Não há pré-requisito, mas o aluno poderá ter um melhor aproveitamento caso tenha conhecimento básico sobre tecnologia em geral
courses.description:
Se você sempre ouviu falar sobre blockchain, mas tem dúvidas a respeito do conceito, este curso é para você.
Se você sempre ouviu falar em criptomoedas, bitcoin, ethereum ou smart contracto, mas nunca soube explicar muito bem o que é isto, este curso é para você.
Bem vindo ao Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas!
O Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas surge com o objetivo de apresentar para você, de uma vez por todas, conceitos básicos a respeito da tecnologia blockchain e das criptomoedas.
Muitas pessoas ficam em dúvida a respeito destes termos. O que é uma blockchain? O que são criptomoedas? Porque alguns ganham tanto e outros perdem muito com isso? Vale a pena conhecer mais sobre o tema?
A resposta só pode ser uma só: sim, vale muito a pena saber mais a respeito da tecnologia blockchain. Especialmente porque as criptomoedas é apenas uma das possíveis aplicações para a tecnologia.
É para sanar este tipo de dúvida que resolvi montar o Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas. A proposta é a de apresentar estes conceitos para você de maneira simples e direta, inclusive com insights sobre possíveis usos da tecnologia blockchain para negócios.
Para quem é o Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas
O Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas é direcionado a todos aqueles que querem aprender mais sobre a tecnologia blockchain, as criptomoedas e outros usos da tecnologia.
A estrutura do Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas
O Curso ABNT NBR 14724 está dividido em 3 partes principais.
Na primeira parte irei apresentar para você de maneira simples, mas eficaz, os principais conceitos técnicos que fundamentam a tecnologia blockchain.
Na segunda parte irei explicar para você o que é o bitcoin, suas principais características, como obtê-lo e como garantir a segurança de suas moedas digitais.
Na terceira parte falarei especificamente sobre altcoins, o que são, bem como o que são as ICOs, a diferença entre utility tokens e Security tokens, e ainda o que são os tão falados smart contracts.
Inscreva-se agora no Curso básico sobre blockchain e criptomoedas!
target_audience: Todos aqueles que queiram saber o que é a tecnologia blockchain
Todos aqueles que queiram saber o que são as criptomoedas e como operá-las
Todos aqueles que acreditam que a tecnologia blockchain vão além das criptomoedas
Todos aqueles que querem buscar novas formas de fazer negócio com base na tecnologia blockchain
Todos aqueles que são naturalmente curiosos e querem aprender mais sobre um dos principais temas da atualidade

courses.title: NFT Flipping Course (Mass Bidding, Sniping, Auto-Buying)
courses.bio: In this course focus on flipping NFTs with different methods such as Bidding, Sniping, Auto-Buying based on Rarity.

Analysing NFT Projects: Charts & Graphs for Analysing Data Visually
Flipping NFTs: Sniping Rares from an Already Revealed Collection

requirements: I won't be teaching about what the NFTs are, you should at least have a basic understanding of NFTs, this is not a total beginners' course.
courses.description:
Welcome to the NFT flipping course. In this course I will be giving you guys my own techniques for flipping NFTs. I will be using NFTinit for most the analysis, however, I will focus on free utilities of the software. I won't be talking about what NFTs are or how blockchain works, we will rather focus on data analysis on NFTs and NFT projects to shape our flipping strategies.
I am going to explain various strategies and methods including mass bidding, trait and rarity based bidding, reveal sniping, sniping with auto-buying, and a little bit about minting.
We will also spend time on analysis on visualizated data and charts such as floor strength, historical price analysis, holder analysis, blue chip comparisons, active listings / delistings, sales & ranking analysis on real time data, setting notifications and much more.
NFTs are an ever evolving world, the material in this course will be enough to get you started however, you will have to keep yourself updated and constantly do your own research. It personally took me months to understand the dynamics, with this course you will probably not be making some of the mistakes I did in the past but keep in mind that there is a learning curve and every single decision when you buy an NFT will have a financial impact on your, either positive or negative.
This course is probably not for absolute beginners, you would probably still get a lot of information, however, the terminologies might be confusing if you haven't heard of NFTs before. I'd suggest at least having basic information on NFTs before jumping in.
The Content is for informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on our Udemy or different channels constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by NFTinit or Yiğit Tuna (course instructor) or any third party service provider to buy or sell any securities or other financial instruments in this or in in any other jurisdiction in which such solicitation or offer would be unlawful under the securities laws of such jurisdiction.
target_audience: Traders who are interested in flipping NFTs based on analytical indicators.

courses.description:
Welcome to the course, it will be a fun and very exciting journey with you all.
What is a cryptocurrency?
A cryptocurrency is a digital or virtual currency that uses cryptography for security. A cryptocurrency is difficult to counterfeit because of this security feature. Many cryptocurrencies are decentralized systems based on blockchain technology, a distributed ledger enforced by a disparate network of computers. A defining feature of a cryptocurrency, and arguably its biggest allure, is its organic nature; it is not issued by any central authority, rendering it theoretically immune to government interference or manipulation.
The first blockchain-based cryptocurrency was Bitcoin, which still remains the most popular and most valuable. Today, there are thousands of alternate cryptocurrencies with various functions or specifications. Some of these are clones of Bitcoin while others are forks or new cryptocurrencies that split off from an already existing one.
In this course, I will walk you through a bunch of basic stuff that would build on a solid foundation for your crypto journey.
I will explain in detail...
What on Earth is a cryptocurrency?
Why do we need one?
What is a Blockchain?
What is a Bitcoin?
What is a Smart Contract?
Why Bitcoin is the king of the market now?
Why Bitcoin is the ocean of everything on crypto now?
What is a Metaverse?
What is an NFT?
How to use all of them together and with ease?
Well, it is just the beginning of everything that is loaded in the course, once you complete this Cryptocurrency Fundamentals Course you will know
How does the crypto market work?
What are the basics of cryptos?
How do Bitcoin works?
How does Blockchain work?
Why cryptos are the next big thing?
I can't wait to see you in the course.


See you inside,
Your #1 fan,
Manas

? Construindo um aplicativo Web 3.0 com o Next JS

Grade Curricular:
Introdução
Configurando o NextJS
Adicionar barra de navegação
Adicionar herói
Configurar autenticação de metamask com NextJS
Criar página de coleção NFT
Adicionar página de detalhes NFT
Configure a compra da listagem direta de NFT's usando NextJS e Thirdweb
Sobre as tencnologias:
Thirdweb
Ferramenta para a criação de aplicativos web3 de maneira automatizada. Implementação de recursos web3 para desenvolvedores. Geração de  NFTs sem código. — Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche e muito mais.
Opensea
Um mercado livre de taxas para NFTs no Polygon. Criação, compra, venda e leilão de NFTs na blockchain Polygon sem pagar nenhuma taxa de gás.
Metamask


MetaMask é uma carteira de criptomoeda de software usada para interagir com o blockchain Ethereum. Ele permite que os usuários acessem sua carteira Ethereum por meio de uma extensão do navegador ou aplicativo móvel, que pode então ser usado para interagir com aplicativos


A carteira permitirá que o usuário pague o gás e o preço de venda para mintar uma NFT de nossa coleção no ThirdWeb
Presumimos que você já tenha a extensão de carteira Metamask instalada em seu navegador. Se você fizer isso, o Metamask injeta um objeto ethereum no objeto de janela global do seu navegador. Estaremos acessando window.ethereum para executar a maior parte de nossa funcionalidade pelo ThirdWeb
Há muitos benefícios na utilização dos NFTs. Mas aqui vamos destacar a oportunidade de fazer contato de negócios com diversas pessoas do mundo inteiro, já que as vendas são feitas totalmente online.
Além disso, outro benefício é que o ativo digital é uma peça única e, por isso, pode se valorizar ainda mais com o passar dos anos.

Iniciantes em Javascript e Next JS

courses.description:
O curso aborda tecnicamente o blockchain Hyperledger Besu.
Você vai entender porque esta plataforma foi escolhida para o piloto do Real Digital (DREX) pelo Banco Central, entre outros projetos.
Será detalhado seu funcionamento, protocolos de consenso, tipos de transações, API, privacidade, permissionamento, bootnodes, validadores, e muito mais.
O Hyperledger Besu permite tanto a criação de redes privadas, como ser usado como cliente de conexão à redes públicas compatíveis com a EVM, como a Ethereum. Dedicaremos diversas aulas a cada um destes tipos de rede. Na parte prática do treinamento vamos criar diversas redes privadas, passo a passo. Nos conectaremos também à testnet Goerli do Ethereum e entendermos como nos conectar a mainnet
Materiais de referência rápida estarão disponiveis em PDF para download, para te ajudar no dia-a-dia.
Ao fim de cada seção você terá um resumo do que foi ensinado e testes de múltipla escolha para ajudar a fixar o conteúdo. Poste suas eventuais dúvidas na plataforma do curso e eu responderei o mais breve possível.
O conteúdo deste curso foi elaborado a partir de abril de 2023 (Besu versão 23.1.2) e será constantemente atualizado conforme haja evolução relevante nas próximas versões. E você terá acesso automaticamente sem custo extra.
Te aguardo no curso!

courses.description:
The world of cryptocurrency is much bigger than just Bitcoin. From smart contract platforms like Ethereum and Solana to viral memecoins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu, there's an entire universe of digital assets shaping the future of finance, tech, and online communities.
In this beginner-friendly course, you'll explore two of the most exciting and misunderstood segments of the crypto space: altcoins and memecoins. Whether you're a new investor, a curious learner, or an aspiring blockchain entrepreneur, this course will help you understand the major types of crypto assets, how they function, and what makes some projects succeed while others fade away.


LEARN ABOUT THESE MAJOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES
To understand memecoins, you must understand the larger cryptocurrencies first. So we'll start by explaining the purpose and function of BTC, XRP, SOL, ETH, and stablecoins.
After that, we'll explore smaller and more speculative kinds of cryptocurrency investments.


WHAT YOU WILL LEARN


What defines an altcoin and how it differs from Bitcoin
The core use cases and technology behind top altcoins like Ethereum, Solana, and XRP
What are memecoins and how they gain value (hype, community, and speculation)
Key differences between utility coins, governance tokens, and meme tokens
The history and evolution of popular memecoins: Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, PEPE, and more
How to evaluate new crypto projects for potential value or risk
The role of tokenomics, community support, and virality in memecoin growth
Practical tips to avoid scams and understand the hype cycles of memecoins


WHO THIS COURSE IS FOR


Anyone new to crypto wanting to go beyond Bitcoin
Crypto investors exploring opportunities in altcoins or memecoins
Entrepreneurs curious about launching their own token
Analysts or students wanting to understand market dynamics in digital assets
Developers or marketers in the Web3 space


WHY TAKE THIS COURSE


Altcoins offer groundbreaking innovations in finance, decentralized apps, and blockchain scalability. Memecoins, while often dismissed as jokes, have captured the imagination of millions and generated real financial returns — often driven by community, humor, and online culture. Understanding both gives you a full view of what’s really happening in crypto.
This course delivers clear explanations, real examples, and practical insights without needing a technical background. You'll finish the course with a solid understanding of what makes altcoins valuable, what makes memecoins popular, and how to think critically about the next token you hear about on social media.


Invest in your future! Enroll today!

courses.title: Using the Bitcoin Cycle for Financial Freedom & Retirement
courses.bio: You are not too late for your financial dreams, you just need to follow the Cycles and Invest correctly
requirements: Basic Financial Knowledge. No need to be a Financial Analyst
Know basics of investing such as Stocks or ETFs
Have a computer or phone to visit websites to get up to date with Prices
courses.description:
Are you too late to have a good retirement? Did you start investing late? Are you to young to enjoy financial freedom?


I am here to tell you that it is NOT TOO LATE.  All your dreams are within your reach.  There is a way to reach your financial goals and it is REPEATABLE.  But this is in a new space involving Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies.  And when there are new technological developments - such as Decentralized Finance Defi and Non Fungible Tokens NFTs - then there are massive opportunities to meet financial goals.


The largest Cryptocurrency Bitcoin goes through a halving cycle every four years and this is when it's price and the price of other cryptocurrencies increase, some even following parabolic moves.  You need to understand the seasons and place SMALL investments to maximise BIG returns while minimising risk. In this short course under 1 hour, I tell you how! I will describe to you what Bitcoin, the role of Altcoins in our quest for retirement and freedom, and the seasons we need to look out for.


This includes the KEY DATE of the Bitcoin halving so you are well and truly prepared! And in leading to that date, I will also tell you how you can prepare now.
target_audience: Working people and business owners who want a good retirement
Young people who want to achieve financial freedom
People who want to know the paradox of making lots of money with low risk
People seeking knowledge in Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies

Doğru zamanda doğru yerde olmak için büyük resmi doğru okumak gerekir .Kursumu alın ve başarının anahtarını çevirin göreceksiniz bütün kapalı kapılar aralanacak ve gözünüzdeki sis perdesi kalkacaktır.

requirements: Basic knowledge in crypto is helpful but not necessary

courses.description:
As a cryptocurrency trainer, I am proposing a comprehensive course on securing a crypto wallet and transferring tokens from an exchange to a wallet. I am an action-oriented trainer, I will demonstrate the precise steps you need to take in order to achieve success.
This course provides a thorough understanding of the different types of wallets available, including hardware and software wallets. We will explore the pros and cons of each type, helping you make informed decisions about which wallet suits your needs best.
Security best practices: We will delve into the best practices for securing your wallet and protecting your assets. This includes setting up strong passwords and keeping your private keys safe.
Hands-on experience: The course offers practical, hands-on experience in setting up wallets and transferring tokens between exchanges and wallets. You'll gain the confidence and skills needed to manage your cryptocurrency securely.
Avoid common pitfalls: We will discuss common mistakes and pitfalls in wallet security and how to avoid them. This knowledge will help protect you from scams, hacks, and other threats in the crypto space.
Stay updated: This course covers the latest trends, technologies, and security measures in the world of cryptocurrency wallets. As the crypto landscape is constantly evolving, staying informed is crucial to maintaining the security of your assets.
The knowledge and skills gained in this course will empower you to take control of your cryptocurrency assets, ensuring their safety and ultimately protecting your investment. By understanding how to secure your wallet and transfer tokens properly, you minimize the risk of losing your valuable assets.
target_audience: If you have some crypto, this course will really help you manage and secure them

courses.description:
"Maestro Bot ile Finansal Özgürlüğe Yolculuk : En Yeni Tokenleri Keşfedin ve Kar Etmeyi Öğrenin!"


Kripto para dünyası hızla evriliyor ve yeni dijital varlıklar her gün ortaya çıkıyor. Finansal özgürlüğünüzü inşa etmek ve kripto dünyasında başarılı olmak için bu değişimlere ayak uydurmak önemlidir. İşte tam da bu noktada "Maestro Bot Finansal Özgürlüğe Yolculuk" kursumuz devreye giriyor.
Bu özel kurs, katılımcılarına kripto piyasasında bir adım önde olmayı ve en yeni tokenleri keşfetmeyi öğretmeye odaklanmaktadır. "Maestro Bot" adlı güçlü araç ile, piyasada hızla yükselen ve potansiyel kazançlar sunan yeni tokenleri tanımanın ve bu fırsatları değerlendirmenin yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Kursun İçeriği:


Kripto Dünyasına Giriş: Kripto paraların temel anlayışı ve neden bu kadar önemli olduklarını öğrenin.
Maestro Bot Nedir ve Nasıl Kullanılır: Maestro Bot'un temel işlevleri ve kullanımı hakkında kapsamlı bir rehberlik.
Yeni Tokenleri Tanıma: Kripto piyasasında yeni ve potansiyel olarak kazançlı olan tokenleri nasıl tanıyacağınızı öğrenin.
Hızlı Alım-Satım Stratejileri: Maestro Bot'u kullanarak hızlıca alım-satım yapmanın inceliklerini öğrenin.
Risk Yönetimi ve Portföy Çeşitlendirmesi: Kazançlarınızı maksimize etmek için riski nasıl yöneteceğinizi ve portföyünüzü nasıl çeşitlendireceğinizi keşfedin.
Kripto Yatırımı İçin İleri Düzey Stratejiler: Profesyonel yatırımcıların kullanabileceği karmaşık stratejileri inceleyin.


Kursun Sonunda:
Bu kursu tamamladığınızda, kripto piyasasının iç işleyişini daha iyi anlayacak ve yeni tokenleri keşfedip kar etme konusunda kendinize güveneceksiniz. Maestro Bot ile kripto yatırımlarınızı optimize ederek finansal özgürlüğünüzü inşa etmeye bir adım daha yaklaşacaksınız.
Unutmayın ki kripto yatırımları risk içerir ve doğru bilgiye ve stratejilere sahip olmak başarınızı etkileyebilir. Bu kurs, size bu alanda güven kazanmanız ve en iyi sonuçları elde etmeniz için gereken araçları sunar.
Şimdi katılın ve finansal özgürlüğünüzü inşa etmeye başlayın!

courses.description:
¿Te interesa el mundo del Bitcoin pero no sabes por dónde empezar? ¿Te gustaría invertir con seguridad, evitar estafas y aprender a hacer trading con criptomonedas? Este curso está diseñado para ti.
Aquí aprenderás desde cero qué es el Bitcoin, cómo funciona, y por qué está transformando la economía global. Te mostraré cómo elegir una wallet segura, adquirir tus primeros bitcoins con tu moneda local, y realizar compras reales usando criptomonedas.
Además, conocerás los principales documentales y recursos confiables que te darán contexto y visión. Te enseñaré a identificar sitios web y empresas seguras para invertir, y lo más importante: cómo reconocer señales claras de estafas o fraudes (SCAM) para que no pongas en riesgo tu dinero.
Si quieres ir un paso más allá, también aprenderás a hacer trading con Bitcoin, interpretar velas japonesas, aplicar análisis técnico, y desarrollar estrategias para saber cuándo comprar y cuándo vender, sin dejarte llevar por las emociones.
Este curso es completamente en español, fácil de seguir, y está pensado tanto para principiantes como para personas que ya han escuchado de criptomonedas pero aún no se sienten seguras para actuar.
Inscríbete hoy y da tu primer paso hacia el futuro financiero con confianza y claridad.
¡Empieza ahora y transforma tu relación con el dinero digital!
target_audience: personas de cualquier edad que deseen entender, utilizar e invertir en Bitcoin y criptomonedas de forma segura, práctica y con fundamentos sólidos

Introducción: ¡Échale un vistazo al APP hoy mismo!

Creación y transferencia de fondos entre Wallets

Despliegue: Despliegue del front end en flutter v 4.75.521

requirements: Saber conceptos de programación es recomendado.
Conocimientos básicos de Flutter y NodeJS (Podrás levantar todo el entorno aun si eres novato)
courses.description:
En este curso aprenderás a desplegar una APP altamente administrable con NodeJS y Flutter, utilizaremos la librería Solana Pay (librería oficial de solana) para poder aceptar pagos con criptomonedas en la blockchain de Solana.


Se implementará el flujo idónea de cobros y pagos en criptomonedas sin tener que pagar comisiones de APIS externos, ya que el control de los pagos serán totalmente descentralizados y quedarán bajo tu control.


Aprenderás a comprar criptomonedas de forma legal y sencilla, usando tu tarjeta de crédito. Y sin el temor a ser estafado.


Aprenderás a crear una billetera descentralizada y transferir tus fondos para que tu seas el propietario de tus propias claves privadas (Serás el verdadero propietario de tus criptomonedas).


Veremos cómo generar un código QR de cobro válido en la blockchain de solana. Y poder mostrarlo en una APP o Página web (Sistema multiplataforma) hecha con flutter.


Además podrás almacenar los códigos QR generados en una base de datos en la nube (Firebase Firestore) para evitarte pagos de servidores en tanto te mantengas por debajo del límite gratuito (Suficiente si lo usas de forma personal).


Aprenderás también a cómo verificar si se realizó el pago correctamente y recuperar la información cuando la necesites.


Solana Pay es un protocolo abierto para que los desarrolladores desarrollen y personalicen, con criterios de pago descentralizados.


Muchos expertos consideran que Solana (SOL) Pay es la próxima innovación en el campo del procesamiento de pagos, ya que facilita los pagos y tiene en cuenta los tokens no fungibles (NFT) y Web3


La idea de este curso es crear un servidor diferente que proporcione servicios RESTfull a nuestra APP en Flutter y los almacene en una base de datos en la nube Firebase Firestore y publicar el back end usando Firebase Functions y así ahorrarnos pagos por uso de servidores.


El resultado final nos dejará un código reutilizable para tus próximos proyectos. Y nos dejará una idea clara para construir una APP completa de pagos con criptomonedas.
target_audience: Desarrolladores que deseen su propia APP de cobros con criptomonedas
Desarrolladores de Flutter
Desarrolladores que deseen levantar servicios RESTfull en NodeJS y desplegarlos en Firebase Functions
Entusiastas de la Web 3

courses.description:
Criei este curso voltado para Iniciantes com as informações necessárias para que você consiga iniciar seus investimentos no mundo das criptomoedas de forma rápida e segura.

Os grandes diferenciais deste curso são:
Abordagem prática em mais de 90% do curso
Aulas objetivas e dinâmicas
Linguagem financeira usada de forma simples para fácil compreensão
Uso do Bitcoin no seu dia a dia
Dicas para investir em novas moedas digitais (ICO)
E muito mais!
Neste curso abordo o tema de criptomoedas com foco no Bitcoin (BTC) por ser a principal moeda digital. Porem com os conhecimentos adquiridos você conseguirá comprar e guardar com segurança outras moedas digitais da mesma forma.

O futuro do dinheiro físico está mudando rapidamente com o avanço das plataformas descentralizadas, as criptomoedas irão mudar o mundo e impactar nossas vidas pessoais e profissionais, vão mudar em breve os meios de pagamentos atuais. Empresas como Microsoft e Dell dentre outras já adotaram o Bitcoin como meio de pagamento.
