courses.description:
¿Te intimidan las nuevas formas de interacción humana digitalizada?
¿Quieres aprender sobre el nuevo mundo digital que Facebook quiere crear llamado Metaverso?
¿Quieres aprender cuál será la aplicación de la tecnología Blockchain en el Metaverso?

¡Si la respuesta a alguna de estas preguntas es Sí, entonces este curso es para ti!
El metaverso o metauniverso es un concepto que denota la siguiente generación de internet, que describe una experiencia inmersiva y multisensorial en el uso aplicado de diversos dispositivos y desarrollos tecnológicos en internet.
Facebook, la red social con más de 3.000 millones de usuarios, se dispone a la creación de un nuevo mundo de interacción humana, donde todo aquello que te imagines será posible, el Metaverso.
Este curso es único, pues ha sido diseñado para qué entiendas y aprendas cuál es el potencial de esta nueva tecnología y cómo se van a aplicar tecnologías como la Realidad Aumentada, la Realidad Virtual y la Tecnología Blockchain.

Introducción al Metaverso: Evolución a la Web 3.0 y oportunidad de mercado del Metaverso
Tecnologías envueltas en el Metaverso: Realidad Aumentada (RA), Realidad Virtual (RM), Realidad Mixta (RM) y Inteligencia Artificial (IA)

courses.title: Richard Wychoff e o ciclo de mercado
courses.bio: Aprenda de maneira prática e objetiva
objectives: Richard Wychoff foi um dos grandes mestres da bolsa de valores em seu tempo. praticamente pode ser considerado o pai do tape reading. através de seus estudos ele percebeu que o mercado de capitais de desenvolve em ciclos pré determinados. aprenda comigo como identificar essas fases do ciclo de mercado no intuito de melhorar suas entradas no mundo do trade
requirements: Não. Este curso é do básico ao avançado. Totalmente objetivo voltado para o resultado.
courses.description:
- A bolsa de valores nada mais é do que um grande balcão de negócios, cujo o único objetivo é a obtenção de lucros.
- Os grandes players ( bancos, fundo de pensões) manipulam o mercado de capitais para obterem lucro, e eles fazem isso dentro de uma sistemática operacional chamada por Richard Wychoff de ciclo de mercado.
- aprenda como o estudo da estrutura de manipulação do mercado fará com que você entenda como se movimento o preço te salvaguardando de cair em armadilhas e principalmente melhorando seu operacional e suas entradas no trade.
- De maneira brilhante Wychoff mapeou e organizou o ciclo de mercado, classificando-o em fase e etapas. Tudo muito didático e intuitivo. O trader que conhece a estrutura de manipulação do mercado possui uma vantagem competitiva analítica, pois esse conhecimento é pouquíssimo difundido no brasil.
- Este curso contem 6h15min de conteúdo gravado dividido entre 10 aulas.


-observação legal: a empresa santo trader, preza a qualidade da informação e atesta a apuração de todo o conteúdo produzido por sua equipe, ressaltando, no entanto, que não faz qualquer tipo de recomendação de investimento, não se responsabilizando por perdas, danos (diretos, indiretos e incidentais), custos e lucros cessantes, pois a bolsa de valores é um mercado de renda variável, portanto de risco.
target_audience: Todos os interessados a adquirirem um conhecimento sólido e de qualidade no intuito de se tornarem operadores profissionais do Mercado Financeiro

courses.description:
Welcome to this course where you'll learn how to get started with Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency.
You can get started within minutes, even if you have ZERO prior experience.
The process you'll learn in this course will take you step by step into the cryptocurrency world.
You'll see easy to follow tutorials that you can follow along to buy your first cryptocurrency, whether it's Bitcoin, Ethereum, or even Polkadot.
Getting started with crypto can seem overwhelming at first, but I've made sure that this simple course will make your first steps easy and frictionless.
In this course, there's no technical talk and no technical challenges, just simple tutorials for ordinary people to follow.


About me:
My name is Johannes. I'm a 27-year old guy from Sweden. I entered the cryptocurrency world by investing in Bitcoin in late 2019 and have been educating myself about it every day ever since. My primary business is not in Crypto or Blockchain, but I'm starting to look into a crypto career more and more.
In late 2020 and early 2021, the cryptocurrency space has been in a huge uptrend and more and more beginners are now joining the space. This is one of the reasons I've created this simple course to help people who want to get started.
I'm personally a huge believer in crypto and think this is a system for the future of money and finance. You don't have to be crazy or nerdy to enter the crypto world as most people would say. I feel it's becoming more of an obligation to educate yourself about what the future of finance and money might look like.


Enjoy!

courses.bio: Day trades are fun and all, but the real profit is made by being on the right side of the market for a bigger duration

courses.description:
Learn how to trade like a professional investor! No matter how much experience you have with the financial or crypto markets, you can trust us to teach you the fundamentals of technical analysis and get you started on the right track. In this trading course, we will walk through all the important skills and the body of knowledge required for managing your own account. From market knowledge to trading and technical analysis strategies, this course covers all the major topics a new trader needs to know:
- Crypto terminology (FUD, FOMO, HODL and more)
- Basic trading rules (simple guide of 5 very important advices for all newbies)
- Market cycles (Wyckoff theory, economic cycles, how to determine bull and bear market conditions
- How crypto cycles are different than a normal economic cycle
- Trading patterns (bullish and bearish candlestick formations, triangle formations)
- Divergences (bullish, bearish and hidden divergences and how to use them in terms of crypto trading)
- Moving averages and volume (MA50, MA100 and MA200, Golden and death crosses)
- Advanced trading indicators (Williams Alligator tool, Keltner channel, Directional movement index, Fear & Greed crypto index)
- Crypto astrology (deep diving into moon phases, Gann cycles and more)
- Trading strategies (10 highly profitable and easy to understand crypto trading strategies that everyone can use in their daily trading routine)

requirements: Наш курс построен для людей с полного нуля, до уверенного арбитражника.
courses.description:
Всем привет, с вами команда KRAK AI
На этом курсе мы научим вас P2P Арбитражу, арбитражу в криптовалюте. Покажем как наша команда зарабатывает на рынке криптовалют.
Понадобится только выход в интернет, и ничего больше. Мы команда KRAK AI зарекомендованна индустрией с 2015 года.


Что такое P2P?
Рынок криптовалют относительно молод и только развивается, постоянно притягивая новых инвесторов. В скором будущем не останется стран без своей национальной цифровой валюты. Купля-продажа криптоактивов растёт день ото дня. Именно на этих операциях мы и научим вас зарабатывать.


P2P - один из самых простых способов заработка на криптовалюте. В двух словах Р2Р - это рынок, где есть продавцы и есть покупатели.
Основные преимущества Р2Р: туда просто зайти, а для старта понадобятся лишь небольшие вложения. Ну и конечно знания, которые мы готовы вам передать.


СКОЛЬКО МОЖНО ЗАРАБОТАТЬ?
В целом, всё будет зависеть от вашей личной вовлеченности в процесс. А если конкретно, от количества времени, которые вы готовы проводить за сделками, и вашего бюджета.

Первое время после обучения уверенно можно зарабатывать как два-три процента от суммы стартового капитала. Дальше больше. Но зависеть будет только от вас! От вашей активности и сумм, которые вы готовы вложить в работу с Р2Р.


ЧТО ГОВОРИТ ЗАКОН?
Для тех, кто еще сомневается..
О криптовалюте существует множество мифов. Самый страшный о том, что криптовалюта якобы под запретом, а за любые операции, будь то покупка или продажа, предусмотрена уголовная ответственность.
На самом деле, инвестиции в криптовалюту разрешено проводить через биржу как иностранную финансовую
инфраструктуру.
Сама валюта и владение ею законом не запрещены.


ЧТО НУЖНО ДЛЯ ЗАРАБОТКА?
Для того, чтобы начать зарабатывать в Р2Р, ничего особо сложного не нужно. Любое устройство с интернетом (хоть смартфон) и знания (вместе с конкретными инструментами и таблицами для работы), которые вы получите на нашем курсе.
Хотите научиться зарабатывать на криптовалюте - приходите к нам на курс. Остальное берём на себя.
У вас точно получится!


Основатель проекта “KRAK AI” - Andrey Fateev
Опыт работы с криптовалютой — 6 лет;
Ежемесячный доход — более 2 миллиона рублей;
Стаж наставничества — 4 года.
Образование:
Six Sigma Green Belt
Certification
Louisiana State University:
Master’s in Information Systems & Decision Sciences — Analytics (Аналитик Агрегатных Данных)
Louisiana State University:
Bachelor of Science in

Koleksiyon oluşturmadan önce belirlenmesi gereken metotlardan, hangi süreçlerin ne şekilde ilerletilmesi gerektiğinden, NFT Tasarımı ve Akıllı Kontratlar (Smart Contract) hakkında vereceğimiz bilgilerin ardından kendi projelerinizi oluşturup, paylaşabilir duruma geleceksiniz.

requirements: Avoir un intérêt pour la crypto et un désir d'améliorer/changer sa vie financièrement

courses.description:
Cette formation va vous permettre de vous lancer avec confiance dans la crypto grâce a mes connaissances depuis 2 ans que j'ai pu acquérir. Vous allez être en mesure de ne pas commettre les même erreurs coûteuses que plusieurs personne rencontre dans ce merveilleux monde de la crypto qui est encore loin d'être parfait. En rejoignant ce cours, vous allez pouvoir élever votre niveau de connaissance personnel de beaucoup et apprendre les rudiments de la crypto. Apprendre avec un formateur est beaucoup plus facile que d'essayer de faire tout par soi même. Joignez vous immédiatement à ce cours complet de A à Z sur la crypto et commencez dès AJD votre ascension!
Ce cours va vous éviter beaucoup de problèmes si vous le suivez au complet et vous placer sur la bonne voie comme j'ai réussi à faire depuis le 31 août 2021 quand j'ai quitté mon emploi pour travailler à temps plein dans la crypto. Plusieurs personnes m'écrivent pour me raconter les malheurs qu'ils rencontrent au fur et à mesure de leur apprentissage dans le domaine de la crypto par manque de connaissances et c'est pour cette raison que je trouve essentiel de faire ce cours.
Vous allez être en mesure de ne pas perdre votre crypto monnaie avec de simple technique de base. Je vais vous montrer comment trouver de bon projets crypto dans lequel investir avec une technique facile et détaillée. La DeFi (Finance Décentralisé) vous semble impossible ? je vais faire en sorte de vous simplifié le tout et vous expliqué le danger associé avec le web 3 pour ne pas vous faire avoir.
On entend tous parlé de SCAMS de nos jours et cette pratique est encore très présente dans la crypto. Je vais vous guider le mieux possible pour ne pas tomber dans les griffes des voleurs qui sont sans pitiés. Le Day Trading vous intéresse ? Parfais, j'ai un technique avancé de Day Trading que je vais vous enseigné que je maîtrise et qui fonctionne. Vous vous demander ou acheter et vendre votre crypto ? Je suis là pour vous montrer la façon de procéder avec le site d'échange (Binance). Choisir le bon portefeuille à utiliser pour garder votre crypto dans un endroit sur n'est pas évident. Je vous montre tout ce dont vous devez savoir pour choisir le meilleur. J'aborde légèrement les taxes sur la crypto et pourquoi vous devriez parler avec un fiscaliste comptable.
Faire fructifier sa crypto pour générer des revenus passifs vous semble impossible ? J'ai la solution pour vous! Quelle est l'avenir des DAO ? On va voir ensemble le potentiel et les raisons pour lesquelles les DAO sont là pour rester. Je vous explique la vie en tant qu'investisseur dans la crypto et pourquoi il est important de bien être organiser pour êtres en mesure de continuer dans la bonne direction. Vous ne savez pas comment faire pour vendre votre crypto et la changer en fiat pour la retirer dans votre comte bancaire ? Je vous montre comment.
Les fameux Nodes et tout ce qui en est relier expliquer de manière simple et concrète vous sera enseigné et est-ce que on peut vraiment gagner de l'argent avec et en vivre ? Vous aimez les projets risqué ? Doit on les éviter ? On va voir plusieurs exemple de profile et type de personnes qui y a adhères. Une fois pour tout, je vais vous montrer les nombreuses blockchain qui existent et comment s'y retrouver pour ne pas envoyer de fonds au mauvais endroits. Le monde du Metaverse et tout ce qui s'y rattache et les opportunités pour y gagner de l'argent sera aussi au menu. Le Play To Earn (P2E) et sa popularité croissante qui augmente très rapidement est un sujet auquel je vais vous parler. Aussi, comment de simple personne font pour y gagner des revenus passifs à chaque jour. Et pour finir, à quoi sert les NFT et ont il un avenir ?
target_audience: Ce cours est pour n'importe quelle personne qui désire se lancer dans la crypto peu importe son niveau

requirements: None
courses.description:
Welcome to the first community built BItcoin course! This course serves as a central point of introduction to Bitcoin for anyone interested. It assumes no special skills or knowledge nor experience in computer science. All are welcome and the course shall forever be free under a creative commons license.
The course is divided into several sections. The Core Lecture Path serves as a comprehensive introduction for beginners on all relevant topics necessary to have a deep understanding of Bitcoin including why Bitcoins have value, why they can be used for anonymous transactions, the current economy of Bitcoins, how they are made and distributed as well as speculation.
The bonus lecture path addresses specific questions students have asked and are not necessary for to satisfy the goals of the course. Feel free to request a bonus lecture at any time! Finally, there are dedicated tracks for more in-depth analysis of the theoretical concepts of Bitcoin alongside the software that makes makes Bitcoin work well.

Bitcoin or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Crypto by Charles Hoskinson is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

No special background is required or expected
Future Lectures will Cover Special Topics as Requested by the Course Community

Криптовалюты - это просто. Мой курс отвечает на самые фундаментальные вопросы о структуре и использовании криптовалют. Для вас этот курс станет прочным фундаментом в понимании криптовалютного рынка. Он также поможет защитить вас от мошенников и повысит вашу финансовую грамотность.

Вы поймете, как работают криптовалюты, кто их создает и что делает их уникальными. Вы узнаете, как заработать на криптовалютах, что такое блокчейн и почему он может изменить мир? Так же Вы научитесь создавать криптовалютный портфель. Узнаете, как безопасно покупать, продавать и хранить криптовалюту. Я расскажу о том, как именно криптовалютные кошельки хранят вашу криптовалюту. Вы узнаете в каких криптокошельках лучше всего хранить ту или иную криптовалюту, узнаете о различных способах хранения криптовалюты. Научитесь конвертировать криптовалюту в фиатную валюту. Я пошагово и с наглядным примером расскажу, как купить криптовалюту.  Вы познакомитесь с интерфейсом топовых криптовалютных бирж. Научитесь анализировать графики криптовалют. Разберётесь во многих базовых вопросах, типа, чем отличается токен от коина или какие типы стейблкоинов существуют в мире криптовалют и многое другое. Прямо сейчас в моем курсе.

courses.description:
Ce cours explique tout ce dont vous avez besoin de connaître sur les cryptomonnaies et comment accéder aux meilleures opportunités de cette industrie. Depuis la création de la crypto-monnaie, les personnes qui ne savent presque rien à ce sujet sont prêtes à payer pour savoir comment cela fonctionne.
L’industrie de la monnaie numérique a connu une grande affluence de cryptos au fil des ans et d’autres sont actuellement en cours de développement. Vous en apprendrez davantage sur l’une des technologies les plus récentes de l’industrie: le métavers. Le métavers est en train de devenir la prochaine grande chose dans l’histoire de l’humanité offrant différents avantages aux gens quel que soit leur niveau d’expérience. C’est un pont entre la réalité physique et la réalité virtuelle, et il révolutionne actuellement beaucoup de nos activités en tant qu’humains. Ce développement technologique a eu un impact positif sur des domaines tels que le divertissement, la médecine, l’éducation et bien d’autres. Ce cours vous éclairera sur les utilisations possibles de cette technologie et sur la façon dont vous pouvez les exploiter.
L’une des nombreuses choses que vous apprendrez est l’introduction générale à l’argent traditionnel que nous connaissons tous, en outre, vous en apprendrez davantage sur le contexte et l’origine de Bitcoin. En cours de route, vous apprendrez comment le Bitcoin, les Altcoins, les Meme coins, la DeFi, les NFTs et le Metaverse fonctionnent tous et pourquoi la blockchain est d’une grande importance en matière de crypto.
Vous en apprendrez également davantage sur les différents aspects de l’exploitation minière et du trading de crypto-monnaie, ainsi que sur les stratégies et tactiques impliquées pour vous aider à croître, à créer et à accumuler de la richesse. Nous ne pouvons pas parler de crypto-monnaies sans mentionner les portefeuilles cryptographiques, leur applicabilités, les différents types que nous avons, ainsi que la façon de les utiliser.
Pourquoi choisir ce cours?
Adapté aux débutants: Le cours a des instructeurs professionnels qui sont bien aguerris et qui connaissent le savoir-faire de Bitcoin et sont toujours disponibles pour vous mettre à travers le processus d’apprentissage.
Aucun codage n’est nécessaire pour apprendre comment fonctionne Bitcoin et comment vous pouvez l’utiliser à votre avantage, tout ce qui est exigé de vous est votre temps, votre dévouement et un bon téléphone avec accès à Internet.


Rejoignez-nous dans la Masterclass Crypto Ultime: Métavers, Opportunités, NFT, Meme Coins, DeFi, Bitcoin, Altcoins, Mining, et bien plus encore!
Si vous cherchez à prendre le train en marche de la tendance actuelle de la crypto-monnaie et que vous ne savez pas comment vous y prendre, alors ce cours est pour vous. Ce cours explique les tactiques de travail et les principes de la crypto-monnaie et de ses différents composants. Ce cours est tout ce dont vous avez besoin!
target_audience: Les développeurs et les entrepreneurs Web qui sont prêts à élargir leurs frontières commerciales et qui sont enclins à savoir comment Bitcoin et Blockchain affecteront le monde des affaires

courses.description:
Kripto paralar, temeli 2008 yılında Satoshi Nakamoto kod isimli kişi/grup tarafından ortaya atılan "Bitcoin: Eşten-eşe Elektronik Nakit Ödeme Sistemi" isimli makale ile atılmıştır. O yıllardan günümüze bitcoin giderek değer kazanmış ve Dünya çapında bir çok kişinin ilgisi çekmiştir. Bu sürede kripto para nedir, kripto para ne demek gibi soruların sayısı artmıştır. Eğitimimizde ayrıntılı bir şekilde kripto paralar nelerdir diye açıklamamış olmamıza rağmen kısaca bahsetmek gerekirse; kripto paralar bir tür dijital para türüdür.
Bitcoin dışında alternatif kripto paraların üretilmesi ile kripto para sayısı binler ile ifade edilmeye başlanmıştır. Bu durumda oldukça yoğun olan bir kripto para piyasasını ortaya çıkarmıştır. Binlerce kripto paranın arasından hangi kripto paraya yatırım yapılabileceği ya da hangi kripto paranın sahtekarlık içerebileceği merak konusu olmuştur. Benzer bir şekilde bir kripto paralar için alım-satım fiyatlarının tespiti merak edilmiştir. Tüm bu sorularınızın cevabını "Kripto Paralarda Teknik Analiz ve Temel Analiz Eğitimi" isimli kursumuzda bulabilecek ve uygulayabileceksiniz.
Hangi kripto paraya yatırım yapabileceğimizi ve hangi fiyattan alınıp satılacağını belirlemek için kripto para analiz çalışmaları oldukça önemlidir. Bu alanda yeni yatırım yapacak yatırımcıların da mutlaka kripto para analiz eğitimi alması gerekmektedir. Ben de bu eğitimde hem kripto para teknik analiz eğitimi hem de kripto para temel analiz eğitimi konularını bir araya getirdim ve sizin için başlangıç seviyesine uygun bir eğitim hazırladım.
Peki bu kripto para eğitiminde sizi neler bekliyor?
- BlockChain, kripto para ve bitcoin gibi kavramlara yabancı olan, kripto paraların işleyişini-amacını bilmeyen yeni yatırımcılar için kripto paralar nelerdir konusundan itibaren giriş bölümü
- Kolay bir şekilde bitcoin almak ve kripto para almak isteyen yatırımcılar için kripto para nasıl alınır sorusunun cevabının yer aldığı ayrıntılı kripto para borsası kullanımları
- Coin haberleri, kripto para haberleri incelenerek bir kripto paranın gelecek için trend (düşüş-yükseliş) tahmini
- Kripto paralar üzerinde teknik analiz yöntemleri (Diğer yatırım araçlarından farklı olarak yılın her günü 24 saat işlem gören kripto para piyasasında standart teknik analiz uygulamalarını kullanmak yanlış sonuçlar doğurabilmektedir.)
- Bir kripto paranın gelecek vaadedip vaadetmediği ya da sahtekarlık içerip içermediği gibi önemli bir karar almanız için kripto paralarda temel analiz yöntemleri
- Ve çok daha fazlası teorik+uygulama çalışmaları ile bu eğitimde sizlerle!
Eğitim boyunca tüm konuların işlendiği sunum dosyası da size kripto para eğitimi pdf olarak  verilecektir.


Oldukça küçük bir geçmişe sahip olan kripto para dünyasında yerinizi almak için hala geç değil. Bir çok kripto para sert yükselişler yaşamış olsa dahi hala prim yapmamış ve geleceği parlak kripto paralar vardır. Ve günümüzde insanlık için büyük problemlere çözüm üretmek amacıyla yeni kripto paralar da oluşturulmaktadır. Bu bağlamda kripto para piyasasına girmek için hiç bir zaman erken değildir. Unutmayın 2010 yılında 10 bin bitcoin ile 41 dolarlık pizza alan Florida'da yaşayan Laszlo Hanyecz, bu parayı nakit olarak verip 10 bin bitcoini elinde tutsaydı; şu an da serveti 600.000.000 $ (1 BTC = 60000 $ olarak hesaplanmıştır) olacaktı. Peki 10 sene sonra 1 bitcoinin 600 bin $ olmaması için bir sebep var mı? Yıllar öncesinde büyük kurumların (Google, Facebook vb.) ve devletlerin (ABD, İran vb) blockchain ve kriptıo paralara savaşlar açmıştı. Ancak günümüzde bu kurumlar kendi kripto parasını üretmek için çalışmalarda bulunuyor. Aynı şekilde bazı devletler kendi kripto parasını çıkartıyor, bazısı da mevcut kripto para piyasasına uyum sağlamak için teknolojik adımlar atıyor. Bunun yanında bir çok kurum ve şirket ise çalışmalarını blockchain sistemine taşıyor. Teknolojinin blockchain kayması ile kripto paralara ilgi daha da çoğalacaktır. Ancak bu gelişimde hangi kripto paranın kazandıracağını hangi kripto paranın yok olacağını kripto para eğitimi ile tespit edebilirsiniz.
target_audience: Kripto paralara yatırım yapan ya da yapacak ve minimum risk ile maksimum kazanç isteyen yatırımcılara yönelik.

courses.title: Understanding Bitcoin: A Beginner's Guide
courses.bio: Get youself Orange Pilled in 1 hour about Bitcoin, Lightning, Blockchain, Distributed Ledger and Proof of Work Consensus
requirements: Beginner Level
No prerequisites necessary
courses.description:
In this course, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of Bitcoin, the world's first decentralized digital currency, and its underlying technology the blockchain. Bitcoin has been a game-changer in the financial world, and its importance and impact on today's economy cannot be overstated. This course will help you grasp the essentials of Bitcoin, its workings, and how you can acquire, use, and invest in it safely.
We delve into the basics of Bitcoin, where you will learn how Bitcoin works, the technology behind it, and its infrastructure. I will introduce you to blockchain technology and explain how it supports Bitcoin. You will also learn about Bitcoin mining, the role of miners in the Bitcoin network, and the process of creating new Bitcoins.
The course then moves on to acquiring and using Bitcoin, where you will learn how to buy it, choose a Bitcoin wallet, select a exchange, and go through the purchasing process. We will also cover sending and receiving Bitcoin, and how to spend and invest in Bitcoin safely.
In the final section of the course, I will discuss the risks and security measures associated with Bitcoin. You will learn about the potential risks of Bitcoin, such as price volatility, regulatory risks, and security risks. I will also provide you with security measures to protect your Bitcoin wallet, safe trading practices, and how to invest in Bitcoin safely.
Lastly, the course concludes with a discussion on the future of Bitcoin, where we will explore current trends and innovations in Bitcoin technology and potential future developments. We will recap the key learning points of the course and encourage further study and engagement with Bitcoin.
Join me in this exciting journey of understanding Bitcoin and its underlying technology, and learn how you can safely acquire, use, and invest in this groundbreaking digital currency!
target_audience: People interested in alternative currencies: This includes individuals who are curious about exploring financial options beyond traditional banks and fiat currencies.
Tech-savvy individuals: Those comfortable with technology and the internet would be more receptive to understanding the digital aspects of Bitcoin and blockchain technology.
Investors: People interested in potentially growing their wealth might be drawn to Bitcoin's potential as an investment, despite its volatility.
Financially independent thinkers: Individuals who value control over their finances and want to explore decentralized options might find Bitcoin appealing.
Globally minded individuals: People who travel frequently or conduct international business may be interested in the borderless nature of Bitcoin transactions.

courses.title: Bitcoin, Blockchain y Criptomonedas: La guía completa
courses.bio: Tu guía completa para empezar a invertir en bitcoin, blockchain y criptomonedas
objectives: Aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber para invertir en Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin y otras criptomonedas.
Tendrás acceso sin límites 24 horas del día, 7 días por semana en tu smartphone, tablet o computadora a más de 22 horas de videoclases.
Aprenderás qué son las criptomonedas y qué las distingue de las monedas “fiat” como el dólar, el peso o el euro.
Te enterarás de cómo surgió Bitcoin, la criptomoneda más antigua.
Descubrirás cómo funciona la tecnología blockchain que está en la base de todas las criptomonedas.
Desarrollarás un método para distinguir las criptomonedas que valen la pena de las que no valen la pena.
Dominarás la historia de las principales criptomonedas como Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum y Monero.
Descubrirás cuáles son los términos técnicos que debes ser al entrar al mercado de criptomonedas y dónde obtener la mejor información sobre criptomonedas.
Aprenderás qué es una ICO (oferta inicial de criptomonedas) y cómo aprovechar las ICOs.
Adquirirás los conocimientos para evaluar una ICO, como la del Gram, la criptomonedas de la aplicación de mensajeo Telegram.
Aprenderás qué son las criptomonedas, cómo comprarlas, cómo almacenarlas de manera segura y cómo distinguir entre las criptomonedas que vale la pena tener y las que no valen la pena.
Tendrás una base sólida para que participes de forma inteligente, segura y bien informada en el boom de Bitcoin y otras criptomonedas.

courses.description:
Este é um caminho sem volta.
Entenda porque você não pode ficar de fora dessa nova tendência tecnológica e porque os NFTs tem muito a agregar para a humanidade. Você vai conseguir entender desde os conceitos mais básicos até o funcionamento por trás do NFT. Você aprenderá inclusive como criar um NFT, comprar e vender NFTs e possibilidades de renda com NFTs.
No curso será abordado, dentre outros temas:
- Fungibilidade
- Comportamento humano
- O que pode ser vendido em forma de NFT
- Cryptokitties?
- Blockchain, Ethereum e como funcionam os NFTs
- Mercado de NFTs
- Como fazer seu NFT

- Jogos NFTs (NFT games)
- Jogue para ganhar ("play to earn")
- Axie Infinity
- Metaverso
Os NFTs são hoje uma tecnologia derivada da rede de blockchain. Da mesma forma que as criptomoedas tem revolucionado o sistema de pagamentos e investimentos, os NFTs tem um potencial enorme de revolucionar o mundo de contratos, artístico, jurídico e de transferência de propriedade, seja ela física, intelectual, seja uma obra ou uma area do corpo humano. Além de abrir uma vasta nova gama de possibilidades.
O curso é feito em linguagem de simples entendimento. Além de aprender você será capaz de explicar o funcionamento dos NFTs para quem você quiser.
De um upgrade em seu conhecimento!

courses.description:
Hace años, Bitcoin fue objeto de burla y mitificación, hoy ha marcado un nuevo Estándar. Con Bitcoin, se dieron otros adelantos tecnológicos, entre ellos las Finanzas Descentralizadas o DeFi.
Las Defi optimizan la manera en la que podemos ahorrar y ofrecen muchos más beneficios que los bancos tradicionales. Miles han ganado cientos de dólares simplemente por saber manejar estas tecnologías de forma segura.
Si tienes visión, sabrás que este cambio de paradigma es una gran oportunidad. En este curso te enseñamos a manejar la Banca Descentralizada de manera responsable para que obtengas unos mejores rendimientos por tu dinero y aproveches al máximo este cambio de paradigma, sin morir en el intento.
En el curso aprenderás sobre:
Por qué esta tecnología es importante y tiene futuro.
Qué fundamenta las Finanzas Descentralizadas o DeFi.
Abrir y manejar billeteras descentralizadas. En especial METAMASK.
Cambiar criptomonedas dentro de cualquier ecosistema.
Obtendrás criterios para elaborar un PLAN responsable de Finanzas Descentralizadas.
Recibirás criterios para manejar ESTRATEGIAS adaptables a las condiciones de mercado.
Opciones de PORTAFOLIO según tu nivel de riesgo.
Cómo funciona la blockchain y cómo puedes ganar haciendo STAKING.
Entenderás lo que es un LIQUIDITY POOL y cómo puedes sacar ganancia de ellos.
Conocerás protocolos donde podrás depositar tus monedas y ganar un INTERESES similares a como funciona una cuenta de ahorros.
Observaremos ejemplos de APALANCAMIENTO y cómo puede multiplicar nuestras ganancias.
¡La tecnología avanza rápido y las oportunidades se van de igual manera, no pierdas más tiempo y aprende a mejorar tus ingresos con esta tecnología!
Te espero ya en el curso!

courses.description:
In 2009 : 1 bitcoin = 2 cents
In 2017 January : 1 bitcoin = $700

Hold on,
In 2017 October (same year) : 1 Bitcoin = $6000

Which means if you had invested 2 cents in 2009, your 2 cents will be now worth $6,000.
Also if you invested $700 in January 2017, by October  your $700 would have grown to $6,000 .
So imagine that you invested $1,000 in bitcoin then :)

This course aims at explaining the whole concept to you, this is not a course you wish to put aside because the whole blockchain cryptocurrency sphere is blowing up by the day. People who didn't get to learn about it few months ago are regretting now.

Like in all my courses, you are 100% sure of coming off this course a much wiser in these new technologies and equipped at making financial decisions that will transform your life in few months.

Don't miss out on the cryptocurrency and blockchain revolution. Join us on this exciting journey and empower yourself with the knowledge and skills needed to thrive in the digital economy. Enroll in "Crypto Unveiled" today and start building a brighter financial future.
Ready to get started? Click the "Enroll Now" button and embark on your crypto adventure!

courses.description:
Want to catch the next $PNUT or $PWEASE before it goes viral?
This course is your ultimate guide to mastering the fast-paced, high-risk, high-reward world of meme coin day trading—even if you're starting from scratch.
Whether you're curious about how people find explosive tokens early, or you’ve been rugged one too many times and want to trade smarter—this course is built for you.


Imagine waking up to the next big meme coin pump and actually having the tools, instincts, and street smarts to catch it—rather than just watching from the sidelines. That’s exactly what we’re building in “Meme Coin Day Trading: Trade Like a Pro Across Blockchains.” This isn’t a dusty lecture on market theory; it’s your hands-on playbook for spotting, sniping, and safely riding the wildest, most volatile tokens in crypto.


We start with de-mystifying the on-chain jungle. You'll be able to read liquidity pools like you read a swimming pool: know when LP is deep enough not to crush slippage, and check if those devs have locked the pool or left the backdoor wide open for a rug pull. We'll show you how to search for mint freeze, sense hidden honeypots, and read holder distribution so you're never the last bag holder when whales dump.


And then we jump into the toolbelt—AI sidekicks and real-time scanners taking care of the heavy lifting. We'll take you through Dexscreener and DEXTools "New Pairs Scanner," zapping false breakouts with Photon's honeypot detector, reflecting smart-money moves via Nova's AI alerts, and tracking KOL (Key Opinion Leader) hype on GMGN. You’ll know not just which meme coins are trending, but when whales and influencers are loading up or threatening to “mooooon” (and when they’re about to “dump and rug”).


On the trading floor, you’ll master short-term strategies—from fair-launch sniping on pump to breakout scalping on Raydium.
You'll see how to calibrate the perfect slippage tolerance, make bridges carry tokens cross-chain in search of lowest fees, and disassemble huge orders into micro-buys to sidestep FOMO pitfalls. Every lesson is loaded with real-world examples: dipping after a 200% run-up, scaling out at 2×–5× goals, and concealing a "moon bag" for the long ride.


Risk management is not an afterthought, it's baked in. You'll get a bulletproof red-flag check process—zero tolerance for unlocked liquidity or uncurbed dev privileges.
What You’ll Learn:
Spot and Analyse New Memecoins: Use on-chain metrics (LP depth, mint freeze, holder count...) and scanners (Dexscreener, DEXTools, ...).
Set Up and Swap: Connect wallets (MetaMask, Phantom, Keplr, ...), tweak slippage/gas, and bridge assets via Jupiter or Base Bridge.
Execute High-Prob Short-Term Plays: Sniping launches, riding volume spikes, breakout scalping, arbitrage, and smart-money copy trading.
Avoid Scams & Rug Pulls: Detect honeypots, unlocked liquidity, fake contract impersonations, and pump-and-dump schemes.
Use AI Alerts & Whale Watching: Automate signals with BullX, Nova, and GMGN to catch the next wave without staring at charts.
Master Risk Controls: Place stop-losses, diversify portfolios, and lock in profits at key multipliers (2×, 5×, 10×).
Develop Your Trading Edge: Build a personalized trading journal, refine your strategies, and trade with confidence in any market condition.
Who This Course Is For:
Beginners who want to enter meme coin trading with real knowledge
Traders looking to sharpen their skills with on-chain tools and scanners
Crypto enthusiasts seeking low mcap gems and early alpha
Anyone who wants to avoid scams and trade with confidence
Ready to trade smarter, move faster, and dodge the scams? Enroll now and turn chaotic meme coin mania into your personal profit playground.




***DISCLAIMER***
This course is for educational purposes only. Meme coin trading is very risky, and you should only invest money you can afford to lose. This course does not provide financial advice.
target_audience: Anyone who will love to bag the next 10×> gem

courses.description:
Würdest du gerne mehr über Kryptowährungen wissen und nicht immer nur an der Oberfläche kratzen? Und würdest du gerne mehr über Themen wie Mining, Dezentralisierung, Protokolle und Applikationen lernen? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau richtig für dich!
In diesem Kurs wirst du alles Rund um das Thema Kryptowährungen lernen. Dieser Kurs ist vor allen Dingen darauf ausgelegt die Theorie hinter der Applikation zu erklären und selbst einen Beginner zu einem Experten im Bereich der Kryptowährungen zu machen.
Folgende Dinge wirst du in diesem Kurs im Detail lernen:
Technische Grundlagen von Kryptowährungen - Was sind Kryptowährungen eigentlich, wie funktioniert eine Blockchain und worin besteht der Unterschied zwischen Bitcoin, Ehereum und Altcoins? Wir werden außerdem über die Geschichte des Geldes sprechen und warum digitale Währungen eigentlich gar nicht so unbekannt sind.
Dezentralisierung und Consensus - In diesem Teil des Kurses werden wir uns mit der Bedeutung von Konsens innerhalb einer Blockchain beschäftigen. Wir werden diesbezüglich auch über den Proof of work, importance und stake sprechen. Du wirst, nachdem du das Kapitel abgeschlossen hast, ganz genau wissen wie neue Blöcke in einer Blockchain generiert werden.
Mining und Mining Computer - Wir werden in diesem Teil des Kurses über drei Arten von Mining sprechen, nämlich CPU, GPU und ASIC Mining. Außerdem erhältst du von mir eine Schritt für Schritt Anleitung zum Aufbau deiner eigenen Krypto Mine, ich werde dir zeigen welche Chips du brauchst, Kühler und vieles mehr.
Wallets - Damit du deine Investments sicher verstauen kannst, brauchst du ein Wallet. In diesem Teil des Kurses wirst du mit vier unterschiedlichen Wallets vertraut gemacht, nämlich Paper, Mind, Soft und Hard Wallet, wir werden über Ledger sprechen und vieles mehr.
Forks - Sicherlich hast du schon einmal von dem Begriff Fork etwas gehört und nein ich spreche hierbei nicht über Gabeln, sondern über Forks in der Welt der Kryptowährungen. Du wirst Schritt für Schritt lernen wie eine Fork funktioniert und am Beispiel Bitcoin lernen welche Implikationen eine Soft und Hard Fork mit sich bringt.
Attacken auf Blockchains - Wir werden diesbezüglich über 51% Attacken, Mining Attacken und Sybil Attacken sprechen. Du wirst lernen wie fragil als auch standhaft eine Blockchain sein kann.
Coins & Tokens - Am Ende des Kurses werden wir dann uns noch einmal mit den unterschiedlichsten Coins und Tokens beschäftigen. Du wirst über Private Coins, Tainted Coins und vieles mehr lernen. Nachdem du dieses Kapitel abgeschlossen hast, wirst du nicht nur die Kryptowelt besser kennen sondern fähig sein bessere Trading Entscheidungen zu treffen.
Folgende Dinge wirst du können wenn du diesen Kurs abgeschlossen hast:
Verstehe wie Kryptowährungen und Blockchains funktionieren
Lerne Smart Contracts, das ERC20 Protokoll, Tainted Coins und Private Coins kennen
Gründe deine eigene Krypto Mine und lerne CPU, GPU und ASIC Mining kennen
Lerne den Wert einer Kryptowährung zu berechnen/schätzen
Verstehe wie man Scam Coins identifiziert durch eine systematische Herangehensweise
Lerne ICOs zu traden und interessante ICO Investmentmöglichkeiten zu identifizieren
Sei fähig zwischen Ethereum, Ethereum Classic und der Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) zu differenzieren
Worauf wartest du also noch? Schreibe dich noch heute in diesen Kryptowährungen Meisterkurs ein!
Du hast nichts zu verlieren. Ich freue mich auf dich!
Beste Grüße,
Leon Chaudhari
- Dozent -

courses.description:
La Rivoluzione Finanziaria è Qui...
Sei pronto a sbloccare le porte di un futuro finanziario decentralizzato? La blockchain non è più solo una parola d'ordine, è la spina dorsale della più grande rivoluzione digitale dai tempi di internet. Il nostro corso su Udemy ti guiderà attraverso questo megatrend, fornendoti le conoscenze essenziali per comprendere e prosperare nel mondo delle criptovalute.


Decifra l'Ecosistema Cripto: Dalla Blockchain agli NFT


Questo corso è la tua mappa per navigare un territorio in continua evoluzione. Imparerai:
Cos'è la blockchain: Scopri la tecnologia alla base di ogni transazione decentralizzata e come sta ridefinendo la fiducia e la trasparenza.
Il valore di Bitcoin: Comprendi il ruolo del pioniere delle criptovalute e il suo impatto sull'economia globale.
Ethereum e le Altcoin: Esplora le opportunità offerte dalle valute digitali alternative e dalle piattaforme che abilitano contratti intelligenti e applicazioni decentralizzate.
NFT: Arte, Proprietà e Oltre: Entra nel mondo dei token non fungibili e scopri come stanno trasformando il concetto di arte, collezionismo e proprietà digitale.
Comprendi le basi per investire con successo...


Il mercato delle criptovalute è giovane, volatile e ricco di opportunità. Questo corso ti fornirà le strategie per affrontarlo con consapevolezza:
Comprendere il potenziale di crescita: Il mercato delle criptovalute è ancora in fase di espansione, offrendo un vasto margine per rendimenti significativi.

Gestione del rischio: Acquisisci la mentalità giusta per investire in un settore ad alto rischio ma con potenziale elevato. courses.description:
Bienvenido al curso de "Análisis Fundamental de Criptomonedas", una guía completa diseñada para inversores novatos y experimentados que desean profundizar en el mundo de las inversiones en criptodivisas. Este curso te equipará con las herramientas y estrategias necesarias para tomar decisiones de inversión informadas y rentables.
Este curso está diseñado tanto para principiantes como para inversores experimentados en criptomonedas que buscan mejorar sus habilidades de análisis y toma de decisiones. No importa tu nivel de experiencia previo; te proporcionaremos todos los conocimientos y recursos necesarios para tener éxito en el mercado de criptomonedas.
¿Qué aprenderás en este curso?
- Aprenderás a encontrar las mejores ideas de inversión en el mundo de las criptomonedas

- Sabrás analizar el Marketing y el Branding de un proyecto de criptomonedas, para predecir si el proyecto llegará tanto a los grandes inversores como a las masas
- Aprenderás a cómo analizar un análisis On Chain de una criptomoneda de una forma simple pero detallada
¡Empieza tu viaje hacia el éxito en la inversión en criptomonedas hoy mismo!
Inscríbete en el curso y comienza a construir o mejorar tu cartera de inversiones en criptomonedas con el conocimiento y la confianza que necesitas.

requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse erforderlich. Der Kurs eignet sich für Anfänger.
courses.description:
Dieser Kurs ist dein umfassender Leitfaden in die Welt der Kryptowährungen. Du wirst lernen, wie Kryptowährungen funktionieren, ein Konto auf einer sicheren Börse einrichtest und Kryptowährungen sicher in Wallets aufbewahrst. Ich lege besonderen Wert auf die Krypto-Sicherheit und den Schutz deiner digitalen Vermögenswerte, damit du mit Vertrauen in den Kryptowährungsmarkt einsteigen kannst.


Zu den Hauptthemen des Kurses gehören:


Einführung in die wichtigsten Kryptowährungen: Verstehe die Unterschiede zwischen Bitcoin, Ethereum und anderen bedeutenden Altcoins.
Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen: Lerne, wie du ein Konto auf führenden Kryptobörsen erstellst und deine ersten Kryptowährungen sicher kaufst und verkaufst.
Sicherer Umgang mit Kryptowährungen: Erfahre, wie du digitale Vermögenswerte sicher aufbewahrst, indem du Software- und Hardware-Wallets einrichtest und verwendest.
Wichtige Sicherheitsmaßnahmen: Lerne, wie du dich vor Betrug, Hacks und anderen Bedrohungen schützt, um sicherzustellen, dass deine Kryptowährungen stets sicher bleiben.
Am Ende jedes Abschnitts findest du Quizzes, um dein Verständnis zu vertiefen und sicherzustellen, dass du die wichtigsten Konzepte beherrschst.
Egal, ob du völliger Anfänger oder bereits mit der Materie vertraut bist, dieser Kurs vermittelt dir das notwendige Wissen, um sicher in den Kryptowährungsmarkt einzusteigen. Du wirst lernen, wie du Kryptowährungen sicher kaufst, verkaufst und versendest. Zusätzlich erhältst du praktische Tipps und Best Practices, um deine Investitionen langfristig zu sichern. Am Ende dieses Kurses wirst du die grundlegenden Konzepte verstehen und bereit sein, in dieser spannenden und schnell wachsenden Branche erfolgreich zu agieren.
_______________________________________________________________________________
Hier bekommst du einen kleinen Vorgeschmack auf das, was dich erwartet:


1. Einführung in Kryptowährungen
Ich heiße dich herzlich willkommen und gebe dir einen Überblick darüber, was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet. Du wirst die Grundlagen und die Geschichte der Kryptowährungen kennenlernen, die Blockchain-Technologie verstehen und erfahren, warum es sich lohnt, in Kryptowährungen zu investieren.


2. Einrichtung eines Kryptowährungskontos
In diesem Abschnitt zeige ich dir Schritt für Schritt, wie du ein Konto auf einer Kryptobörse einrichtest. Du lernst, worauf du bei der Auswahl einer sicheren Börse achten musst, wie du dich registrierst und verifizierst und welche Sicherheitsmaßnahmen, wie KYC und Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung (2FA), wichtig sind.


3. Kauf von Kryptowährungen
Hier lernst du, wie du Kryptowährungen sicher kaufst und verkaufst. Ich erkläre dir, wie du Fiat-Währungen auf dein Konto einzahlst, wie du CoinGecko und CoinMarketCap zur Marktanalyse nutzt und wie du Markt- und Limit-Orders platzierst. Zusätzlich zeige ich dir Strategien wie das Dollar-Cost-Averaging (DCA) und wie du über Broker, ETFs und ETNs Kryptowährungen kaufen kannst.


4. Nutzung von Wallets
Dieser Abschnitt behandelt alles, was du über die sicheren Aufbewahrungsmethoden für Kryptowährungen wissen musst. Du erhältst eine Übersicht über verschiedene Wallet-Typen, lernst die Unterschiede zwischen Software- und Hardware-Wallets kennen, und ich zeige dir, wie du deine Wallets sicher einrichtest und deine Seed Phrases schützt. Best Practices und zusätzliche Tipps sorgen dafür, dass deine Kryptowährungen sicher verwaltet werden.


5. Übertragung von Kryptowährungen
In diesem Abschnitt zeige ich dir, wie du Kryptowährungen sicher zwischen Börsen und Wallets überträgst. Du lernst, wie du häufige Fehler vermeidest, Bitcoin sicher auf ein Ledger Wallet überträgst und wie du bei Bedarf deine Kryptowährungen zurück auf eine Börse überführst.


6. Zusammenfassung und nächste Schritte
Zum Abschluss des Kurses fasse ich die wichtigsten Punkte zusammen und gebe dir Empfehlungen für deine nächsten Schritte. Du wirst gut vorbereitet sein, um selbstständig in die Welt der Kryptowährungen einzutauchen.


7. FAQ
Im letzten Abschnitt beantworte ich häufig gestellte Fragen rund um Kryptowährungen. Du erfährst unter anderem, welche Risiken beim Handel bestehen, wie du deine privaten Schlüssel und Seed Phrases sicherst, wie du legitime Kryptowährungsprojekte erkennst und vieles mehr. Dieser Abschnitt ist besonders hilfreich, um deine Kenntnisse zu vertiefen und offene Fragen zu klären.
_______________________________________________________________________________


Bereit, deine Reise in die Welt der Kryptowährungen zu starten? Dann melde dich jetzt für diesen umfassenden Kurs an und lerne, wie du sicher und erfolgreich in Kryptowährungen investieren kannst!


Ich freue mich darauf, dich im Kurs zu sehen!


Danke für dein Vertrauen & bis gleich im Kurs


Lukas


Hinweis: Die Inhalte im Video dienen ausschließlich zur allgemeinen Information, sind ohne Gewähr und keine Empfehlung zum Kauf oder Verkauf von Kryptowährungen. Das Video stellt ausdrücklich keine Anlageberatung im Sinne des WpHG oder professionelle Beratung dar. Eine Haftung für die Richtigkeit aller Angaben kann nicht übernommen werden. Du entscheidest selber, was du machst. Der Handel mit Kryptowährungen ist mit hohen Risiken verbunden, einschließlich signifikanter Verluste bis hin zum Totalverlust. Durch die Nutzung der Inhalte dieses Kurses bestätigst du, dass du diesen Disclaimer zur Kenntnis genommen hast und mit den Bedingungen einverstanden bist.

This course is designed to give you a better understanding of interacting with cryptocurrencies, and their many use cases that keep on growing in number.
Cryptocurrencies are bought and sold on exchanges and can also be used to purchase goods and services. Because cryptocurrencies are not regulated by governments or financial institutions, they are highly volatile, which means their prices can fluctuate greatly. requirements: Tradingview ya da benzeri alım-satım grafik programlarını kullanabilmek, fibonacci aracını kullanabilmek.
courses.description:
Piyasalar dalgalar halinde ilerler ve bu dalgalanmalar sonucu harmonik formasyonlar oluşabilir. Harmonik formasyonlar teknik analizin en önemli parçalarından biridir. Trend tersine oluşacak hareketleri teyit etmek için kullanılabilirler. Bu şekilde alım satım noktaları çok daha kesin olarak belirlenebilir. Yarasa ve Gartley formasyonları öğrenmesi en kolay formasyonlardır. Hareketler daha sakin ve yataydır. Kelebek, crab ve deep crab formasyonlarının ise son dalgaları agresiftir. Shark formasyonu ise kendi içerisinde hem aşağı hem de yukarı yönlü agresiftir.
Harmonik formasyonlar benim alım satım yaparken en sık kullandığım yöntemlerden biridir. Bunun nedeni fiyatların aşağı ya da yukarı yönde olası dönüş bölgelerinin kurallarının belirli olmasıdır. Bu sayede belirli ilkeleri uygulayarak harmonik formasyonlar çizilerek alım satım bölgeleri belirlenir ve yine kurallar dahilinde hedefler beklenir ve yine stop seviyeleri netlikle belirlenir.
Harmonik formasyonların yatay piyasada daha sık oluştuğu ve daha iyi çalıştığı gözlemlense de agresif haraketlerde fiyatların nereye gidebileceği ve hangi bölgelerden dönüş yapabileceği harmonik formasyonlar kullanılarak belirlenebilir. Çünkü alt zaman dilimlerinde harmonik formasyon ararken fiyatlar agresifleşerek piyasanın yataylığını bozabilir ancak üst zaman dilimlerinde piyasa hala yatay olarak gözlemlenebilir bu zaman dilimlerinde de aslında harmonik formasyonlar oluşuyor olabilir.
Tüm bunlara hakim olabilmek için bu kursta harmonik formasyonların ön şartı olan AB=CD ve Yarasa, Gartley, Kelebek, Crab, Deep Crab ve Shark harmonik formasyonlarını öğreneceksiniz.
target_audience: Kripto para borsalarında, Forex piyasasında ve ulusal borsalarda alım satım yapmak isteyen herkes içindir.

courses.description:
このコースでは仮想通貨（暗号資産）の仕組みと取引方法を学びます。


※ 私はITエンジニア向けの講義も提供していますが、こちらの講義はITエンジニアに限らず、全ての方を対象とした講義となっています。


ビットコインの現在価格（2021年4月）は600万円を超え、1年前の同時期と比較すると数倍以上の価格となっております。金融資産として注目度の高まっているビットコインですが、過去に仮想通貨取引所がハッキングされたり、価格変動が激しいなど、仮想通貨の投資に躊躇される方も多いのではないかと思います。講師は仮想通貨取引所での勤務経験があり、その知見を踏まえて、仮想通貨の将来性・魅力・投資方法などを解説していきたいと考えています。


ポイント１：仮想通貨の基礎を学べます
ビットコイン・イーサリアム・リップルなど様々な仮想通貨が世の中には存在していますが、そもそも「仮想通貨とは一体何なのか？」という質問に回答したいと思います。また、取引を行う上での最低限の基礎知識も提供します。


ポイント２：取引所で口座を作成して仮想通貨を取引する方法が学べる
仮想通貨取引所にて口座を作成して、ビットコイン等の仮想通貨の取引を行う手法を学びます。また、仮想通貨・板取引の基礎知識に関しても解説しています。様々な投資スタイル（ドルコスト平均法の考え方を使って長期投資、短期売買を繰り返して利益を獲得するetc)に関して言及していきます。
target_audience: ビットコインやその他の仮想通貨の投資に興味のある方。

Price Action Trading Strategies: The Price Action Strategy That Makes Trading Look Easy!
Price Action Trading Was Hard, Until I Found This "Momentum Tactic"
PriceAction Trading Becomes Easy When You Apply This Break Of Structure Strategy
The Price Action Trading Strategy That Outperforms Any Indicator

This Volume Price Action Trading Strategy Will Halve Your Losses

Game-Changing Break & Retest Trading Strategy To Avoid 82.3% Of False Signals

requirements: Basic candlestick literacy (OHLC) and common FX terms (pip/point/lot/spread) — a quick refresher is included at the start of the course.

courses.description:
Forex Price Action: What No One Tells You is a hands-on course on reading pure price behavior and making decisions without relying on indicators. We’ll cover market structure & Break of Structure (BOS), the momentum tactic, break–retest, line-chart price action, Volume/SMC basics, and how to avoid S/R traps. You’ll also learn to use Smoothed EMA/Heiken Ashi and 21/55 MAs as context filters (not blind signals) for both day trading and swing.
Key modules:
What makes Price Action feel “easy”: a practical framework to cut noise & keep discipline.
Momentum tactic: knowing when momentum is sufficient to consider entries.
BOS & Break–Retest: confirm trend and filter most false signals.
Line-Chart Price Action: remove wick noise to see structure clearly.
Volume + PA / SMC for beginners: liquidity, where traps often occur.
Elliott Wave with PA clues: pragmatic, non-mystical usage.
Aggressive PA for day trading: when to act and when to stand aside.
Context filters with Smoothed EMA, Heiken Ashi, and 21/55 MAs.
By the end, you can:
Identify swing highs/lows, read structure, and set directional bias.
Draw/validate quality S/R and apply break–retest/rejections with candle confirmations.
Filter false breakouts (liquidity grabs) and avoid S/R manipulation.
Build an entry checklist, manage risk with R:R 1:2–1:3, and manage trades (BE/partials).
Who it’s for: beginners to intermediate traders seeking pure Price Action on FX/XAUUSD for intraday or swing.
Requirements:
Basic candlestick literacy (OHLC) & common FX terms (pip/point/lot/spread) — quick refresher included.
Commit 30–60 minutes/day for 2–4 weeks to practice, journal, and review case studies.
Practice on a demo account until your checklist is consistent; educational only, not financial advice.


Important Note on AI Usage


This course includes the use of artificial intelligence (AI) tools to generate visual aids, illustrations, and some supporting content. AI is used strictly as an educational enhancement to help explain trading concepts more clearly and make the lessons more engaging. All core trading knowledge, strategies, and explanations are provided and reviewed by the instructor.
target_audience: Beginners to intermediate (0–2 years) who want pure Price Action (candles + structure) with fewer indicators.
Trading skills at all levels. From beginner to advanced

courses.title: What is cryptocurrency
courses.bio: Cryptocurrency lesson
courses.description:
Cryptocurrency is a digital or virtual form of currency that uses cryptography for secure financial transactions, control the creation of new units, and verify the transfer of assets. It is decentralized and operates on a technology called blockchain, which is a distributed ledger that records all transactions across multiple computers or nodes.
One of the most well-known cryptocurrencies is Bitcoin, which was created in 2009 by an anonymous person or group of people using the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto. Bitcoin introduced the concept of a peer-to-peer electronic cash system, allowing users to send and receive payments directly without the need for intermediaries like banks.
Cryptocurrencies are typically based on cryptographic principles that secure transactions, control the creation of new units, and verify the transfer of assets. The transactions are recorded on the blockchain, which is a public ledger accessible to all participants in the network. This ensures transparency and prevents the double-spending problem, where the same digital currency is spent more than once.
Unlike traditional fiat currencies issued by governments, cryptocurrencies are not controlled by any central authority. They are governed by a consensus mechanism, often based on proof-of-work or proof-of-stake algorithms, which determine how new units are created and transactions are validated.
Cryptocurrencies offer several advantages over traditional financial systems. They enable fast and borderless transactions, eliminating the need for intermediaries and reducing transaction costs. They also provide financial inclusion by allowing anyone with internet access to participate in the global economy, even those without access to traditional banking services.
Moreover, cryptocurrencies have gained popularity as an investment asset class. Many people buy and hold cryptocurrencies with the expectation that their value will increase over time. However, it's important to note that the cryptocurrency market is highly volatile and subject to significant price fluctuations.
Since the creation of Bitcoin, thousands of other cryptocurrencies, often referred to as altcoins, have emerged. These alternative cryptocurrencies aim to solve different problems or offer additional features beyond those provided by Bitcoin. Examples of popular altcoins include Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin, and many others.
While cryptocurrencies have gained mainstream recognition and acceptance, they also face challenges and controversies. Regulatory concerns, security risks, scalability issues, and environmental impact are some of the areas that require further exploration and development.
Overall, cryptocurrencies have transformed the way we perceive and interact with money and have the potential to revolutionize various industries, including finance, supply chain management, and decentralized applications (dApps). However, it is crucial to approach cryptocurrencies with caution, conduct thorough research, and understand the risks associated with this emerging technology.
target_audience: For begginers and for everybody who have experience

requirements: No experience with Bitcoin or crypto, you will learn everything.
courses.description:
How to buy the crypto coin.


Cryptocurrencies are digital assets that trade on a 24/7 global market. If you're thinking about adding cryptocurrencies like bitcoin or Ethereum to your investment portfolio, you have several options for doing so.


Cryptocurrency is a unit of measure. It is a digital token that can be transferred from one party to another, but not duplicated.


Understanding cryptocurrency basics
What is cryptocurrency?
Cryptocurrencies are digital currencies (digital representations of value) that are secured using cryptography. Interested parties can use them to purchase goods and services. Past that, they enable individuals to make transactions without the interference of third-party intermediaries.


How does cryptocurrency work?
Unlike physical fiat currencies (e.g., the U.S. dollar), cryptocurrencies make use of decentralized networks, and their transactions are generally recorded on the blockchain, which is an immutable, decentralized ledger.


The first known blockchain was rolled out for use with bitcoin, the first digital currency to scale. This blockchain was designed to be immutable (meaning transactions cannot be reversed or deleted) and decentralized (meaning its records are stored on many different computers) in order to safeguard against fraud and also boost transparency.


Every bitcoin transaction that has taken place in the more than 15 years since the digital currency network has existed has been logged on the network's blockchain.
target_audience: Beginner with buying a crypto coin.

requirements: Feeling curious about money but don't know where to start? Perfect! This course assumes no prior experience and is built for beginners. Just bring your awesome curiosity!
courses.description:
Have you ever looked at the money in your pocket and felt like you're missing a crucial piece of the puzzle? This isn't just a course; it's your all-access pass to the hidden history of global finance and its powerful impact on your everyday life.
We begin by ripping open centuries of monetary history. Journey from ancient bartering systems and commodities like gold and salt, to the rise of powerful paper currencies under controlling systems. You'll uncover pivotal moments when centralized power, like that wielded by colonial companies and governments, silently shaped entire economies. Discover the dramatic stories of devastating hyperinflation, where money truly became worthless, and reveal why entire nations were excluded from crucial global financial decisions, their voices silenced.
Then, brace yourself: the revolution begins. We pivot to the heart of the digital age: blockchain technology and Bitcoin. This is where you unlock the secrets. You'll gain an exclusive peek into exactly how a completely new kind of digital money is 'mined' into existence through a global, high-stakes competition. Understand why Bitcoin's supply is mathematically guaranteed to be scarce through built-in events like 'halving,' making it uniquely resistant to traditional inflation. Learn the practical steps to truly secure your own digital fortune, exploring different types of crypto wallets – from convenient 'hot' options to ultra-secure 'cold' storage – and grasp the critical importance of your private keys.
This journey also tackles the burning question: Is Bitcoin a dangerous fraud, or the ultimate path to financial liberation? We'll expose why skepticism initially took hold, and then delve into the powerful shifts, such as massive institutional investments from firms like BlackRock and evolving global regulations in key regions like the US, UK, and UAE, that are fundamentally reshaping Bitcoin's perception from the fringes to the mainstream. Understand its true value beyond daily transactions and why its unique 'owner-less' nature, born from the mystery of Satoshi Nakamoto's anonymity, truly empowers you by removing disempowering intermediaries.
By the end of this course, you won't just use money; you'll understand its hidden forces. You'll possess the confidence and knowledge to navigate, and even actively participate in, the dynamic future of money. Are you ready to decode global finance, challenge traditional power, and finally unlock your digital economic independence?

The Bitcoin trading course will teach you to trade Bitcoin in both directions. You will learn to take profits when the price is going up and when the price is going down.
In this course, Petko Aleksandrov - Head Trader in Trading Academy,  will provide you with the cryptocurrency Never losing formula that he has calculated for Bitcoin trading and the other cryptocurrencies.
This formula can be modified for any trading asset, but it works just brilliant with Bitcoin. No matter, you are a beginner or advanced trader or do not have any experience in Bitcoin trading. You are just curious about the cryptocurrencies that everybody is talking about. Mr. Aleksandrov will go through each step and show you all you need to know in detail to trade cryptocurrencies, especially Bitcoin, without losses.
The Mentor will share a fantastic formula that he calls the "Never losing formula," which you can use to handle your losing trades with Bitcoin trading in a way that you will always end up on profit or worst case scenario on 0. Also, you will see live examples of Bitcoin trading.
In this course, Petko teaches a simple Bitcoin trading course using price action analysis, and with 2-3 simple drawings over the chart, you will know where and when you need to enter the market.


What will you learn in this Bitcoin trading course?
the most critical levels for the Bitcoin price, which improves a lot the trading
where and when you need to avoid buying the cryptocurrency to avoid losses
how to recognize the trend, which is an essential part of the Bitcoin trading course
use trend lines and counter-trend lines as great places to recognize upcoming moves
the Never Losing Formula, which protects the traders from having any losses
trade the Bitcoin even when the price is going down and take profits when it gets cheaper
how to be on the profitable side in both directions by eliminating the losses
Petko Aleksandrov will provide you with many examples where he demonstrates the complete system. There are examples of positive and negative markets (long trades and short trades). Also, he shows examples of how traders should use the formula properly and how to exit the negative trades in the worst case on zero.


"Buying at the right time and place, and taking your profit, just when the others are buying, will make you a winner," says Mr. Aleksandrov in the course.
That is why in this Bitcoin trading course, you will see him having $200 of Take Profit on each trade, which is just enough, according to him.


Contents and Overview
This course aims at teaching traders how to eliminate the losses in their trading accounts. This way, adding even a tiny profit will build the account consistent with the time.
You will start with the basics of recognizing the major trend direction and using it as a filter for the entries. By combining the trend with the essential levels as support and resistance, you will have an idea when you can trade the Bitcoin and in what direction.
You will learn about the trend lines as powerful tools that help to identify the upcoming moves. Also, the counter-trend lines give the trader great entry points, and you will see live examples with those.
So you can quickly start trading with this Bitcoin trading course. In the course, you learn how to analyze the chart and place pending orders in the right spot. This way, you will not wait in front of the screen for the moment of the entry.
By the end of this Bitcoin trading course, you will examine many examples of the trading system, which will help you understand better its concept and application.


Who is the instructor?
After University, Petko Aleksandrov graduated from the London Academy for trading, where he developed his trading strategies with surprising profits. He was invited to stay as a mentor, but he decided to move on his own with cryptocurrency and algorithmic trading because he already knew that this was the future. During the last year, over 15 000 students joined his courses.
The Bitcoin trading course is a result of many tests and trading before it was presented in this online course.
Petko believes that the only profitable traders are not the ones that are the most knowledgeable, but the ones that are not greedy and have no fear to trade.
He established Trading Academy, where he teaches algorithmic Bitcoin trading to avoid the two feelings in the students - fear and greed. Also, he has manual courses like the Bitcoin trading course,  where he depends on mathematically proven formulas and robust statistics and researches.


Make sure to practice the formula first on Demo/Virtual account before using it with real funds. It is vital to master the system.

The best thing - you receive lifetime access, which means that all improvements of the Bitcoin trading course from Petko you will have at the moment!
